MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Cleaning, the cleaning, lots of cleaning～♪❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Cleaning, the cleaning, lots of cleaning～♪❞

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからない鼻歌を歌いながら、葉留佳さんは雑巾がけをしに向こうへ行ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: While humming an out-of-whack tune to herself, Haruka-san mopped her way off across the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: While humming an out-of-whack tune to herself, Haruka-san mopped her way off across the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わけわからん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't get it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't get it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「しかし、何か妙に楽しそうだな、三枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But somehow, Saigusa looks like she's having such a good time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But somehow, Saigusa looks like she's having such a good time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば廊下掃除のことしかり、こと掃除に関しては文句を言いながらも実際『マメ』だな、葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Now that he mentioned it, even though she complained, Haruka-san was always willing to get the job done. A tough nut, indeed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now that he mentioned it, even though she complained, Haruka-san was always willing to get the job done. A tough nut, indeed.

MESSAGE.JP: …例の整備委員会の活動もそうだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, that was probably expected of a maintenance committee member.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, that was probably expected of a maintenance committee member.

MESSAGE.JP: パリパリ…ボリボリ…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Crunch*crunch*... *Munch*munch*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crunch*crunch*... *Munch*munch*...

MESSAGE.JP: パリ、ボリボリ…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Crunch*, *munch*munch*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crunch*, *munch*munch*...

MESSAGE.JP: ボリパリボリパリ…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Crunchy*munchy*crunchy*munchy*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crunchy*munchy*crunchy*munchy*...

MESSAGE.JP: みんな無言で、皿うどんを食べることに集中している。
MESSAGE.EN: No one said anything as we all concentrated on eating the crispy udon.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one said anything as we all concentrated on eating the crispy udon.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はー、食った、食った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Haah, I'm totally stuffed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Haah, I'm totally stuffed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ご利用ありがとうございましたぁーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thank you for your patronage!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thank you for your patronage!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「げぇっ、三枝ぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Geh, Saigusa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Geh, Saigusa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは、真人くんそのリアクション、意外と気に入ってるでしょ？　でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, you're really attached to that reaction, aren't you, Masato-kun? Aren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, you're really attached to that reaction, aren't you, Masato-kun? Aren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…まぁな。ちょっと知的だろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Pretty much. Doesn't it make me sound intellectual?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Pretty much. Doesn't it make me sound intellectual?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はっは、知的とな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Haha, that's so intellectual.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Haha, that's so intellectual.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾にだけ受けた！
MESSAGE.EN: He went along with it!
MESSAGE.Translation: He went along with it!

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あほだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んだよ、てめーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは後ろ手を組んで笑っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san clasped her hands behind her back and laughed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san clasped her hands behind her back and laughed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もうお仕事は終わったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have you finished work already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have you finished work already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「大体はね。あとは机拭いておしまいだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Pretty much. Now I just need to wipe the tables and I'm done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Pretty much. Now I just need to wipe the tables and I'm done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃね、バイバイ、ガイズ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anyway, bai bai, gaizu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anyway, bai bai, gaizu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小さく手を振ると、葉留佳さんは厨房に消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Waving her small hand, Haruka-san vanished into the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Waving her small hand, Haruka-san vanished into the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「行くぞ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Let's go, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Let's go, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。待ってよ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah. Wait up, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah. Wait up, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は学食を出ていくみんなを慌てて追ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to leave in a flurry to catch up to the others leaving the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to leave in a flurry to catch up to the others leaving the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 授業が早めに終わったので、急いでパンを買いに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: Class had ended early so I rushed to buy some bread.
MESSAGE.Translation: Class had ended early so I rushed to buy some bread.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ？
MESSAGE.EN: Huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh?

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下でしゃがみこんでいる葉留佳さんを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the corridor I saw Haruka-san crouching down in a hunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the corridor I saw Haruka-san crouching down in a hunch.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「弱ったなぁ、どうしようかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh man, what should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh man, what should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？　葉留佳さん、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Haruka-san, what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Haruka-san, what's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、理樹くんー。やはー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, Riki-kun. Yaha～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, Riki-kun. Yaha～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゃがみこんでいる葉留佳さんの前には小さな女の子。
MESSAGE.EN: In front of the kneeling Haruka-san there was a little girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: In front of the kneeling Haruka-san there was a little girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 幼稚園児ぐらいだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: She was probably kindergarten aged.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was probably kindergarten aged.

MESSAGE.JP: 小学校低学年ぐらいかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Or possibly an early grade-schooler.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or possibly an early grade-schooler.

MESSAGE.JP: すみれ色のリボンがついた麦わら帽子をかぶった、白いワンピースの女の子。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl was wearing a white one-piece dress, and a straw hat with a violet ribbon on her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl was wearing a white one-piece dress, and a straw hat with a violet ribbon on her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さい子の年齢は外見からはわかりづらい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Judging a little girl's age by her appearance is hard...
MESSAGE.Translation: Judging a little girl's age by her appearance is hard...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの、この子？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's with the kid?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's with the kid?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うーん、なんだか知らないけど校舎内歩いてたからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm, I don't really know. She was just walking around in the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm, I don't really know. She was just walking around in the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「家族とはぐれたのかなーって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wondered if she has gotten separated from her family.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wondered if she has gotten separated from her family.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなの？　ええと、誰かとはぐれたのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that right? Are you looking for someone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that right? Are you looking for someone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 警戒しているのか、その子はじーっと僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: The little girl stared up at me with a guarded look.
MESSAGE.Translation: The little girl stared up at me with a guarded look.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「警戒してるんだよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She's probably feeling shy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She's probably feeling shy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子は困ったような顔をして葉留佳さんを見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl then looked at Haruka-san with a troubled face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl then looked at Haruka-san with a troubled face.

MESSAGE.JP: その時だった。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment...
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「あーー！　目標、発見！　発見しましたーッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Ahh! Target discovered! I have visual!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Ahh! Target discovered! I have visual!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 厄介なことになりそうな気配がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like trouble was on the way...
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like trouble was on the way...

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「ちょ、ちょっと見て！　三枝葉留佳が子供連れてるみたいです！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝Wait, look! Haruka Saigusa is being accompanied by a child!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝Wait, look! Haruka Saigusa is being accompanied by a child!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「ま、まさか神聖なる学び舎で、不純異性交遊の結晶をお披露目!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝You, you can't mean she's openly flaunting her sexual deviance on our sacred school grounds!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝You, you can't mean she's openly flaunting her sexual deviance on our sacred school grounds!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「な、なんてことを…っ！　許すまじ風紀の乱れ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Wh... What are you doing! Making a mockery of public morals!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Wh... What are you doing! Making a mockery of public morals!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鋭いホイッスルの音。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a sharp whistling sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a sharp whistling sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「確保ーッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Secure her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Secure her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわー、すごくややこしい事態に発展しそうだね。あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwa-, looks like things are going to get pretty complicated, doesn't it. Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwa-, looks like things are going to get pretty complicated, doesn't it. Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「発展しそう、じゃなくって発展してるのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're not ❛going to,❜ they already are!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're not ❛going to,❜ they already are!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笑ってる場合じゃないよっ、葉留佳さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is no time for laughing, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is no time for laughing, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こ、この子のこともあるし、どうするのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, and this kid, what are we going to do with her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, and this kid, what are we going to do with her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とりあえず」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝First of all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝First of all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First of all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First of all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「逃げるっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Run for it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Run for it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、またぁーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, again――!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, again――!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは女の子と僕の手を引いて走り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san seized my hand as well as the girl's and took off running.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san seized my hand as well as the girl's and took off running.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして毎回毎回逃げなくちゃいけないんだよーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do we end up running away every single time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do we end up running away every single time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって捕まったら大変だよ、理樹くんっ！　今度は五時間ぐらい正座でお説教くらうよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Because if we get caught, it'll be terrible, Riki-kun! This time it'll be five hours of kneeling down and being lectured.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Because if we get caught, it'll be terrible, Riki-kun! This time it'll be five hours of kneeling down and being lectured.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どうして五時間もっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, why five hours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, why five hours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だってー。愛の結晶を世界にお披露目だよ～？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For unveiling this fruit of our love to the world～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For unveiling this fruit of our love to the world～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「風紀委員は激怒してるし～誤解なのにな～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The prefects are all pissed off～, and all over a misunderstanding, too～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The prefects are all pissed off～, and all over a misunderstanding, too～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 待てー、こらー、待たんかー！　という怒号が背中から聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Wait!❜, ❛You!❜, ❛Stop!❜, I could hear the yells raining from behind us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Wait!❜, ❛You!❜, ❛Stop!❜, I could hear the yells raining from behind us.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「トホホ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh man～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh man～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと僕（と女の子）は校舎を駆け抜ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I (plus the girl) ran through the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I (plus the girl) ran through the school.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…わからなくはないけど…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's not like I don't understand, but...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's not like I don't understand, but...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうかどうして僕は道連れにされてるんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do I always get caught up in these things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do I always get caught up in these things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「快馬加鞭偕老同穴っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fast feet are the key to a long relationship overflowing with honey and milk!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fast feet are the key to a long relationship overflowing with honey and milk!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「意味わかんないよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What the heck does that even mean!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What the heck does that even mean!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「待ちなさい！　三枝葉留佳ぁ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝Just you wait! Haruka Saigusaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝Just you wait! Haruka Saigusaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うわぁ！　やっぱり増えてるしっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Uwa! There's more of them coming!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Uwa! There's more of them coming!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろを振り返ると追っ手の数は増えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked over my shoulder and saw that the pursuing party had grown in numbers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked over my shoulder and saw that the pursuing party had grown in numbers.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しょうがない、ここは忍びないがっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped... I couldn't bring myself to do this, but...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped... I couldn't bring myself to do this, but...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、ちょ、ちょっとまさか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, wait, don't tell me...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, wait, don't tell me...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「秘技！　画鋲ま――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Secret technique! Thumbtack――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Secret technique! Thumbtack――❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「止めーーーっ！　それはやっちゃ駄目ーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sto――p! You definitely can't do that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sto――p! You definitely can't do that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えぇー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehhhh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehhhh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「走りながらなんでそんな不満そうな顔を!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How can you make such a depressed face while running at full speed!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How can you make such a depressed face while running at full speed!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「トホホ～、捕まっちゃうヨ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Aw man～, we're so gonna be caught now～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Aw man～, we're so gonna be caught now～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「捕まったらきっとひどいコトされるんだヨ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If they catch us, it's gonna be terrible beyond imagination～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If they catch us, it's gonna be terrible beyond imagination～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「冷たい床の上で正座させられた上にお腹がぐーって減っても帰して貰えないんだヨ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They'll make us kneel in a cold place, not letting us leave even when our stomachs growl～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They'll make us kneel in a cold place, not letting us leave even when our stomachs growl～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まさにリチャードもびっくりー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It'd probably frighten even Richard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It'd probably frighten even Richard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女の子@「…お姉ちゃん、逃亡者？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...Onee-chan, are you a fugitive?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...Onee-chan, are you a fugitive?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もうかれこれ逃げ続けていちまんおくねんですヨー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've already been running for a million years.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've already been running for a million years.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなのんきな会話をしてる場合なのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is it really the right time for jokes like that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is it really the right time for jokes like that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「そこまでよ三枝葉留佳っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Hold it right there, Haruka Saigusa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Hold it right there, Haruka Saigusa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ザザッ！
MESSAGE.EN: Ba-damb!
MESSAGE.Translation: Ba-damb!

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下の角で風紀委員たちが壁になって立ちはだかった。
MESSAGE.EN: From behind the corner, the prefects poured to form a solid wall to block our flight.
MESSAGE.Translation: From behind the corner, the prefects poured to form a solid wall to block our flight.

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて引き返そうとすると、ばたばた、と追っ手が追いつく。
MESSAGE.EN: We immediately retraced our steps, and the prefects gave chase.
MESSAGE.Translation: We immediately retraced our steps, and the prefects gave chase.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あーあ…画鋲撒かなかったから追いつかれちゃった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A-a, they're catching up because I didn't throw out the thumbtacks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A-a, they're catching up because I didn't throw out the thumbtacks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「トホホ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Aw man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Aw man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「未成年者略取及び誘拐罪で確保する！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝We've confirmed that she's kidnapping a minor!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝We've confirmed that she's kidnapping a minor!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか罪状大仰になってるし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The charges seem to be getting heavier...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The charges seem to be getting heavier...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「言い訳は委員会室で聞きますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝We'll hear your excuses in the committee meeting room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝We'll hear your excuses in the committee meeting room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そ、そんな～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh come on～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh come on～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女の子@「あの、お姉ちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Um, Onee-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Um, Onee-chan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、何かナ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yes, my dear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yes, my dear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女の子@「携帯電話貸して欲しいの。あたしの、電池切れちゃって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Can I borrow your cellphone? My batteries ran out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Can I borrow your cellphone? My batteries ran out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん？　お安い御用ですヨ。はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm? No problem, here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm? No problem, here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは制服から携帯を出して女の子に渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san fished her cellphone out of her uniform pocket and handed it to the girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san fished her cellphone out of her uniform pocket and handed it to the girl.

MESSAGE.JP: `女の子@「ありがとう。お借りします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女の子@「…もしもし…うん…あのね…うん…それで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Hello? Yes... Um... Yes... 'kay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Hello? Yes... Um... Yes... 'kay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女の子@「…パパとママに…それで…あたしはちゃんと帰れるって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...tell mom and dad... right... I'll come right home...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...tell mom and dad... right... I'll come right home...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「…三枝さん。これは一体？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝...Saigusa-san, what's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝...Saigusa-san, what's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、迷子の女の子を世話してただけなんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Like I said, I was just helping out this lost girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Like I said, I was just helping out this lost girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「えぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Eh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Eh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「だったら何故逃げるんですか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Then why did you run away!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Then why did you run away!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だってー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Because!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Because!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「追いかけられると逃げたくなるんだもぅん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you start chasing me, I just feel like I have to run away!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you start chasing me, I just feel like I have to run away!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しれっと答えてる!?
MESSAGE.EN: Such a nonchalant answer!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Such a nonchalant answer!?

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「も、もぅん、って！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝W, w, what!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝W, w, what!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「あなたというひとは一体っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Honestly, a person like you...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Honestly, a person like you...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、まぁ、誤解だということがわかったことだしここは穏便に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-well, anyway. Now that we know it's a big misunderstanding, let's just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-well, anyway. Now that we know it's a big misunderstanding, let's just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「そもそも校内をそんなどたどたと走り回って…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝You can't just go running helter skelter through the school!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝You can't just go running helter skelter through the school!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、はいはい、スミマセンスミマセンねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, right, sorry, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, right, sorry, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは片耳に人差し指をつっこみながらそっぽを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stuck her index finger in her ear and looked the other way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stuck her index finger in her ear and looked the other way.

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「ちゃんと聞きなさいーー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Pay attention――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Pay attention――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下に風紀委員の怒鳴り声が響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The prefect's yell echoed off the walls of the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The prefect's yell echoed off the walls of the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、災難だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A-ah, that was the pits.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A-ah, that was the pits.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、さっきの女の子は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, where's the girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, where's the girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「職員室で電話借りたかったんだって。でも用事終わったみたいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She said she'd just wanted to use the phone in the faculty office. Looks like she's all good now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She said she'd just wanted to use the phone in the faculty office. Looks like she's all good now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お説教の途中でばいばいしたよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She bid us goodbye while we were getting lectured.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She bid us goodbye while we were getting lectured.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, so that's what happened...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, so that's what happened...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんも災難だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you got it bad too, didn't you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you got it bad too, didn't you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やっぱりビー玉か画鋲撒くべきだったなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I knew I should have thrown down some marbles or pins...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I knew I should have thrown down some marbles or pins...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まったく反省してないぞ、この子は。
MESSAGE.EN: This girl really doesn't reflect on her actions.
MESSAGE.Translation: This girl really doesn't reflect on her actions.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でわ、あでゅー、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well then, adieu, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well then, adieu, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは左手をひらひらと振って歩き去ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san walked off while waving her left hand behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san walked off while waving her left hand behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「つ、疲れた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So... tired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So... tired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだかどっと疲れたよ、僕は…。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow I was completely worn out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow I was completely worn out.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は肩をがっくりと落として、教室に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Letting my shoulders slump, I returned to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Letting my shoulders slump, I returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝のＨＲが終わると担任の先生に呼ばれた。
MESSAGE.EN: When morning homeroom ended, the teacher called me over.
MESSAGE.Translation: When morning homeroom ended, the teacher called me over.

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室の出口のところまで行く。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to the exit of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to the exit of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「いきなりで悪いんだが、放課後暇か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Sorry it's out of the blue, but are you free after school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Sorry it's out of the blue, but are you free after school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「寮会を手伝う人間が足りなくてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝The dorm committee is short on people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝The dorm committee is short on people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうして僕に？
MESSAGE.EN: Why is he asking me?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why is he asking me?

MESSAGE.JP: その疑問が顔に出ていたせいなのか、担任が申し訳なさそうに言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing the doubt in my expression, the teacher became apologetic.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing the doubt in my expression, the teacher became apologetic.

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「直枝は律儀で几帳面だから、向いてそうだと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝It's just that you're conscientious and methodical, so I thought you'd be a good fit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝It's just that you're conscientious and methodical, so I thought you'd be a good fit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ほめてくれているっぽいので一応そう返す。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like I was being praised so I said that.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like I was being praised so I said that.

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「気が向いたらでいいんだ。時々頼むよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝If you feel up to it, please help sometimes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝If you feel up to it, please help sometimes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…わかりました。行けるかどうかわからないですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay. But I'm not sure if I'll be able to or not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay. But I'm not sure if I'll be able to or not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「あぁ、それでいい。よろしく頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝That's fine. Just do what you can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝That's fine. Just do what you can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 担任を見送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I watched him leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: I watched him leave.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮会の手伝いかぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Helping the dorm committee, huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: Helping the dorm committee, huh?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそういう活動とは遠いなぁと考えていたんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't really think I'm good at that kind of thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't really think I'm good at that kind of thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 向いているのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Would I be a good fit?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would I be a good fit?

MESSAGE.JP: まぁ強く頼まれたわけじゃないから行かなくてもいいかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Well it was only a casual request, so it's fine even if I don't do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well it was only a casual request, so it's fine even if I don't do it.

MESSAGE.JP: そう判断して、忘れることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After coming to that conclusion, I decided to forget about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: After coming to that conclusion, I decided to forget about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間、クラスの女子たちがわいわい何かをしている。
MESSAGE.EN: During the break, the girls in the class were raising a ruckus over something.
MESSAGE.Translation: During the break, the girls in the class were raising a ruckus over something.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おい、理樹、何をやってるんだあいつら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, what are they up to over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, what are they up to over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「占いらしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like fortune-telling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like fortune-telling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本を開いた女子の声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: We could hear the voice of a girl with an open book.
MESSAGE.Translation: We could hear the voice of a girl with an open book.

MESSAGE.JP: `クラスの女子@「じゃ、お父さんの名前と、それに生年月日から――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Well, based on the combination of your father's name and your birthdate――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Well, based on the combination of your father's name and your birthdate――❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねー、何、何してるのー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey――, what, what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey――, what, what's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クラスの女子@「最近出たエムワイセレクションの占いー。三枝さんもやる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝It's a new MY Selection fortune-telling. Saigusa-san, would you like to try it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝It's a new MY Selection fortune-telling. Saigusa-san, would you like to try it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うんうん、やる、やる～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep yep, count me in～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep yep, count me in～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがクラスの女子の間に交ざっていても全然違和感を覚えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san mingled with the girls in our class as unhesitantly as though she was one of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san mingled with the girls in our class as unhesitantly as though she was one of them.

MESSAGE.JP: `クラスの女子@「三枝さんの誕生日はいつ？　…十月十三日？　うん、じゃあええと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Saigusa-san, when's your birthday? ...October 13th? Well then, let's see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Saigusa-san, when's your birthday? ...October 13th? Well then, let's see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クラスの女子@「お父さんの名前と生年月日を教えてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Please tell me your father's name and birth date.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Please tell me your father's name and birth date.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クラスの女子@「だから、お父さんの名前、生年月日。それを使ってね、三枝さんの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Like I said, I need your father's name and birth date. With that, I can tell your...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Like I said, I need your father's name and birth date. With that, I can tell your...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クラスの女子@「…三枝さん？　聞いてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...Saigusa-san? Are you listening?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...Saigusa-san? Are you listening?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えっと………」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Um......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Um......❞

MESSAGE.JP: あれ、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh? My attention focused.
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh? My attention focused.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの顔から、いつもの陽気な笑顔は消え、その後は不機嫌そうな――いや、もっと強い感情が現われたからだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's ordinary cheery smile faded, replaced by a sullen... No, the emotion on her face was even deeper than that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's ordinary cheery smile faded, replaced by a sullen... No, the emotion on her face was even deeper than that.

MESSAGE.JP: 怒っているようなそうでないような。
MESSAGE.EN: Though it didn't look like she was angry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though it didn't look like she was angry.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「………ごめん、やっぱ止める」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝.........Sorry, I think I'll pass after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝.........Sorry, I think I'll pass after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クラスの女子@「うん…い、いいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Oh... o, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Oh... o, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クラスの女子たちもさすがに葉留佳さんの様子がおかしいことに気がついたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected the other girls found Haruka-san's actions odd.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected the other girls found Haruka-san's actions odd.

MESSAGE.JP: 微妙な空気にもかかわらず、葉留佳さんはそのままぷい、と背を背けて教室を出て行ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Ignoring the strange atmosphere, Haruka-san turned her back on it all and left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ignoring the strange atmosphere, Haruka-san turned her back on it all and left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は思わず席を立とうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Without thinking I stood from my seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without thinking I stood from my seat.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうかしたのか、理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's the matter, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's the matter, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん？　な、なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O, oh? I... It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O, oh? I... It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾の声で浮かしかけた腰を僕は再び落とした。
MESSAGE.EN: Caught half out of my seat by Kengo's voice, I stopped and then slumped back into my seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Caught half out of my seat by Kengo's voice, I stopped and then slumped back into my seat.

MESSAGE.JP: どうかしたの？　三枝さん。へんなのー、と言う女子の声を聞きながら、僕は心のどこかがざわつくのを感じていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛What was that? Saigusa-san was acting so weird.❜ When I heard the girls talking like that, I got a vexing feeling in my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛What was that? Saigusa-san was acting so weird.❜ When I heard the girls talking like that, I got a vexing feeling in my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: チャイムがようやく鳴り、古典の授業が終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: The chime finally rang out, marking the end of the Classic Literature class.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chime finally rang out, marking the end of the Classic Literature class.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふあぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fuaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fuaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「だらしないぞ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How unsightly, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How unsightly, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その服装はだらしなくないんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If you want to talk about unsightly, look in the mirror...
MESSAGE.Translation: If you want to talk about unsightly, look in the mirror...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「顔でも洗って来い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Go wash your face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Go wash your face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうする…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はふらふらと立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up a little unsteadily.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up a little unsteadily.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきまでの授業のことなんか全然頭に入っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: The Classic Literature class had gone completely in one ear and out the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Classic Literature class had gone completely in one ear and out the other.

MESSAGE.JP: 水飲み場にきて、蛇口から出る水に手を浸した。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to the drinking fountain, letting the water run over my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to the drinking fountain, letting the water run over my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 太陽の光で少しだけ温まった水はやがて冷たくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: The water in the tap, first warmed by the sun, soon ran cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: The water in the tap, first warmed by the sun, soon ran cold.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんだっけ…何か大事なことを考えていたような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What was it... I was thinking about something important... I think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What was it... I was thinking about something important... I think...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 授業中とりとめもなく浮かんだ思考のピース。
MESSAGE.EN: The unending thoughts I had been having during class were in fragments.
MESSAGE.Translation: The unending thoughts I had been having during class were in fragments.

MESSAGE.JP: そのいくつかに何か気になるものがあったのに思い出せなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Among those, I couldn't pick out what I had been so anxious about at the time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Among those, I couldn't pick out what I had been so anxious about at the time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fua...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fua...❞

MESSAGE.JP: またあくびが出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I yawned again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I yawned again.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eii!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eii!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んぐっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ngu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ngu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いきなり口の中に何か突っ込まれたのでむせる。
MESSAGE.EN: Out of nowhere something was thrust into my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Out of nowhere something was thrust into my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「げほっ…けほっ…な、なに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kof... koff... W, what!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kof... koff... W, what!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、ごめんごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, sorry, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, sorry, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さんか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おっきなあくびー。餌をねだるひな鳥みたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That was such a big yawn. You looked like a baby bird asking for food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That was such a big yawn. You looked like a baby bird asking for food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: くすくす、と葉留佳さんが笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san giggled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san giggled.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「指、突っ込みたくなっちゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I couldn't help but stick my finger in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I couldn't help but stick my finger in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…脈絡無い行動はしないでよっ。噛んじゃうかもしれないでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Please don't do insane things. What if I had bitten you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Please don't do insane things. What if I had bitten you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいよー。理樹くんにかぷかぷされたーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's okay. I'd like to be nibbled on by Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's okay. I'd like to be nibbled on by Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wha...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wha...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんてね？　うそうそ。ジョーダンジョーダン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Or not? Just kidding. It's a joke, a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Or not? Just kidding. It's a joke, a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「からかわないでよ、もう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please don't tease me like that, sheesh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please don't tease me like that, sheesh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめんごめん、怒らないでってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry, sorry, no need to get upset.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry, sorry, no need to get upset.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言いながら葉留佳さんは、バケツを床から持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: While saying that, Haruka-san lifted a bucket up off the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: While saying that, Haruka-san lifted a bucket up off the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よいしょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Up ya come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Up ya come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ざぱぁ、とバケツの中の水を流す。
MESSAGE.EN: Water sloshed around within the bucket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Water sloshed around within the bucket.

MESSAGE.JP: そしてバケツをもうひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: She then reached down for another bucket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then reached down for another bucket.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、重かった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahhh, so heavy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahhh, so heavy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ２つバケツを空にして葉留佳さんは、ふぅ、と息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: After emptying the two buckets, Haruka-san let out a heavy breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: After emptying the two buckets, Haruka-san let out a heavy breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの、それ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's with the buckets?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's with the buckets?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー、寮長と風紀委員のひとに教室に潜り込もうとしてるの見つかっちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hnn, the dorm head and prefects caught me sneaking into the classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hnn, the dorm head and prefects caught me sneaking into the classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「バケツ持って立ってろ、だなんていつの時代の罰なんだかー。あー、指が痛いよぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So they had me stand in the hall with buckets in my hands. I mean honestly, what time period is that punishment from? Ah-hah, my fingers hurt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So they had me stand in the hall with buckets in my hands. I mean honestly, what time period is that punishment from? Ah-hah, my fingers hurt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひらひら、と葉留佳さんは右手と左手を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san shook both her hands back and forth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san shook both her hands back and forth.

MESSAGE.JP: 指先は真っ赤になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The tips of her fingers really were all red.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tips of her fingers really were all red.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また遅刻したの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you were late again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you were late again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「また、は余計だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You don't have to say ❛again.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You don't have to say ❛again.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今月に入ってまだ二桁の大台突破してないもん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This month I haven't even been late ten times yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This month I haven't even been late ten times yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あーあ…、いつも寮にいると思っちゃうんだよねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A-a... I feel like I'm always stuck in that dorm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A-a... I feel like I'm always stuck in that dorm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だからしょうがないのに。大目に見てくれてもいいのになー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So can you really blame me? They could have gone a little easier...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So can you really blame me? They could have gone a little easier...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『いつも寮にいると思ってしまう』？
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I feel like I'm always stuck in that dorm❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I feel like I'm always stuck in that dorm❜?

MESSAGE.JP: 寮にいないときがある、ってことなのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: If she ❛feels like❜ it, doesn't that mean there are times she is -not- ❛stuck in that dorm❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: If she ❛feels like❜ it, doesn't that mean there are times she is -not- ❛stuck in that dorm❜?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「夜遊びでもしてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you've been fooling around at night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you've been fooling around at night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ち、違うよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What, n, no!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What, n, no!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「違う、違う！　そんなことしてない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No, no! I haven't done anything like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No, no! I haven't done anything like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは慌ててぶんぶんと首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: In a confused state, Haruka-san shook her head furiously.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a confused state, Haruka-san shook her head furiously.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「断じて、そんなこと、してない！　してないから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I absolutely - haven't done - anything like that! Absolutely not!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I absolutely - haven't done - anything like that! Absolutely not!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あぁ……うぅ……」
葉留佳さんは僕の視線を受けて少しうなだれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san met my gaze for a moment, then averted her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san met my gaze for a moment, then averted her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「してないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I haven't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I haven't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽつり、と呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She sounded pouty.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sounded pouty.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、疑ってるわけじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I'm not doubting you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I'm not doubting you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはちらりと顔を上げたけれど、また俯いてぼそぼそと喋った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's head perked up a little at that, but she still didn't meet my eyes and kept murmuring to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's head perked up a little at that, but she still didn't meet my eyes and kept murmuring to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、そんなわるいこじゃないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I... I'm not that kind of girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I... I'm not that kind of girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ちがうよ。ちがう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I'm not. I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I'm not. I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気詰まりな沈黙が落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words dipped suddenly into silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words dipped suddenly into silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ぃぇにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...ome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...ome.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…家に、帰ってるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Home, I went home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Home, I went home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家？　家って…その、つまり、実家…というか、自宅？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Home? You mean... as in, home home? Your house?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Home? You mean... as in, home home? Your house?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。そう。自宅…みたいなもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Home. Or... something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Home. Or... something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「時々帰ってるの。帰らなくちゃいけない日は、帰ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sometimes I go home. On the days when I need to, I go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sometimes I go home. On the days when I need to, I go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、夜遊びなんて、してないよ、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, it's not like I'm fooling around at night or anything like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, it's not like I'm fooling around at night or anything like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は唇を開こうとして、何も言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my mouth, but couldn't say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my mouth, but couldn't say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてか、わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Why? I had no idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why? I had no idea.

MESSAGE.JP: それは自分の過去のせいか――あるいは、葉留佳さんが、あまりに沈んだ声で言うからか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it was because of my own past―― or maybe it was because Haruka-san's voice had been so downcast.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it was because of my own past―― or maybe it was because Haruka-san's voice had been so downcast.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「――なんて。あははっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝――Just kidding. Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝――Just kidding. Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san raised her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san raised her head.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの笑顔――だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was―― her normal smiling face.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was―― her normal smiling face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私なんかが言っても信じてくれないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You should know already not to trust everything I say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You should know already not to trust everything I say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつも、いい加減だからねっ。うそ。うそだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm always pulling your leg. It was a joke. A joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm always pulling your leg. It was a joke. A joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「実はね、こっそり、学園の外に出てね遊んでるのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝To tell you the truth, I've been slipping off school grounds to play around just a little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝To tell you the truth, I've been slipping off school grounds to play around just a little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって、つまんないんだもん、学園はさっ。いつも風紀委員がいるでしょー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Because, I mean, it's so boring here. Plus the disciplinary committee's always snooping around...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Because, I mean, it's so boring here. Plus the disciplinary committee's always snooping around...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「先生だって私を見るとすっごい睨むし、怒鳴るし、ぜんぜん、面白くないんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even the teachers are always scowling and growling at me. It's no fun at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even the teachers are always scowling and growling at me. It's no fun at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だからね、私は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's why I――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's why I――❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは早口で喋った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san started chattering rapidly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san started chattering rapidly.

MESSAGE.JP: へらへらと軽薄そうに笑いながら。
MESSAGE.EN: She went on spewing words like a machine gun with a cheesy smile on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went on spewing words like a machine gun with a cheesy smile on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本当に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は…え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I... eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I... eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんの台詞を遮った。
MESSAGE.EN: I interrupted Haruka-san's prattling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I interrupted Haruka-san's prattling.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本当に、そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that really how it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that really how it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは黙り込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゅ、と拳を握りしめる。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her hand clench tightly into a fist.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her hand clench tightly into a fist.

MESSAGE.JP: その拳が、開いたり閉じたりを繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: She relaxed and clenched it a few times repeatedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She relaxed and clenched it a few times repeatedly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「………それは、うそだ、ってゆったら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝.........If it was a lie, what would you do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝.........If it was a lie, what would you do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「『どれ』が嘘なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If which part was a lie?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If which part was a lie?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは笑おうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san tried to laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san tried to laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、それに失敗して、唇をぎゅっと結ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: But, it fell flat, and she instead pressed her lips together.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, it fell flat, and she instead pressed her lips together.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「――うそゆってることは、多いよ、確かに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess there are quite a few lies you'd have to do something about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess there are quite a few lies you'd have to do something about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはゆっくりと、言葉を句切りながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san continued slowly, choosing her words carefully and pausing often.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san continued slowly, choosing her words carefully and pausing often.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、夜遊びはしてない。自宅に、帰ってるのは、ホント」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The part about me not fooling around. The part about me going home. Those are true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The part about me not fooling around. The part about me going home. Those are true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。じゃあ、信じるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. I believe you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. I believe you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、嘘じゃないんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's not a lie, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's not a lie, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは小さな子供みたいに、こくり、と頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san nodded her head, looking like a small child somehow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san nodded her head, looking like a small child somehow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's all.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「原因が、わかってるのならさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you already know why you keep coming late to school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you already know why you keep coming late to school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自宅にいるときは目覚まし時計増やすとかしたほうがいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better for you to get another alarm clock for when you're home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better for you to get another alarm clock for when you're home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「起きられないなら、起きられるようにしないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'll help wake you up at the times when you are in a bad way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'll help wake you up at the times when you are in a bad way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうしたら、遅刻しないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you can do that, you won't be late all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you can do that, you won't be late all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕の部屋、というか真人用なんだけど、沢山目覚まし時計があるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In my room, well, Masato's and mine, there's a whole mountain of alarm clocks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In my room, well, Masato's and mine, there's a whole mountain of alarm clocks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どれかあげるよ。ひとつでもふたつでも。葉留佳さんが好きなものを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll lend you one. Or two. You can pick whichever you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll lend you one. Or two. You can pick whichever you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「色々あるんだよ。恭介が色々買ってくれるからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There really is an assortment. Kyousuke has bought us a ton of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There really is an assortment. Kyousuke has bought us a ton of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾もなぜか古道具屋で見つけてくるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And for some reason Kengo keeps getting them from secondhand stores for us as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And for some reason Kengo keeps getting them from secondhand stores for us as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「使ってないのも多いから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a bunch we never even use.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a bunch we never even use.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは力なく頷くだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was nodding to my words lethargically.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was nodding to my words lethargically.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You still with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You still with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん。わかった。理樹くんの、言うとおり、だね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah. I got it. It's just like you said, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah. I got it. It's just like you said, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「遅刻しないようにするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It'll help me not be late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It'll help me not be late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉にようやく笑ってくれたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled while repeating my words back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled while repeating my words back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は何も言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は…私はそういう子なので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm just... I'm just that kind of person!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm just... I'm just that kind of person!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 軽薄な笑みを張り付かせたまま。
MESSAGE.EN: She was forcing a stiff smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was forcing a stiff smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「関わらないほうがいいよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So you should stop involving yourself with me, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So you should stop involving yourself with me, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、気詰まりな雰囲気に耐えかねたのか、くるりと背を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeming unable to stand the heavy atmosphere, Haruka-san turned away from me with a twirl.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeming unable to stand the heavy atmosphere, Haruka-san turned away from me with a twirl.

MESSAGE.JP: 数歩行ったところで、葉留佳さんが僕をちらり、と見る。
MESSAGE.EN: After taking a few steps, she glanced back at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: After taking a few steps, she glanced back at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「またね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you later, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you later, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が何か言う前に葉留佳さんは廊下を走っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could say anything else, Haruka-san ran off down the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could say anything else, Haruka-san ran off down the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後、早速時計を選んでもらうことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as classes were over, we went to pick out a clock.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as classes were over, we went to pick out a clock.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわー、ここが理樹くんの部屋なんだー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwah, so this is Riki-kun's room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwah, so this is Riki-kun's room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わー、男の子の部屋だねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wahaha, it's a boy's room～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wahaha, it's a boy's room～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「違うぞ、三枝。オレたちの部屋、だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, Saigusa, this is a MEN's room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, Saigusa, this is a MEN's room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねー、これ、これなーにーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, this, what's thi～s?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, this, what's thi～s?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どこに手を突っ込んでるんだおまえはっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Where the hell are you sticking your hand!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Where the hell are you sticking your hand!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「カーペットの下になんかあるよーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But there's something under the carpe～t.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But there's something under the carpe～t.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だーっ！　余計なもん見つけるなっつーのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You! Stop searching around for random things!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You! Stop searching around for random things!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえの目的は時計だろ、時計っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You came here for a clock, remember!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You came here for a clock, remember!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、そうだった、そうだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, that's right, right you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, that's right, right you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…ほっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Tch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Tch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ、それ、それなーにーっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, that, what's tha～t?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, that, what's tha～t?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえはなんでいきなり布団めくってるんだよーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why the heck are you looking under our futons now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why the heck are you looking under our futons now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹ーーっ！　なんとかしろぉーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki!!! Do something about her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki!!! Do something about her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さん、ほら、時計選んで、時計っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san, look, here're the clocks. Please choose one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san, look, here're the clocks. Please choose one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、何やってるのっ！　それ僕の枕っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, hey, what are you doing! That's my pillow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, hey, what are you doing! That's my pillow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわー、うわー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fluffy, fluffy～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fluffy, fluffy～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、枕はいいから！　って鼻押しつけて何やってんのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Leave my pillow alone! Why are you pushing your face into it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Leave my pillow alone! Why are you pushing your face into it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わー、男の子の匂いがするー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wa-h, this is a boy's smell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wa-h, this is a boy's smell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「枕、気持ちよさそうだなー。貸して？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Your pillow's comfy. Can I borrow it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Your pillow's comfy. Can I borrow it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「貸しませんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not gonna lend you that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not gonna lend you that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eeh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eeh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「指咥えて羨ましそうにしてもダメっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't look at me with those eyes that accuse me of stinginess!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't look at me with those eyes that accuse me of stinginess!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「時計なんてどれでもいいから、理樹くんの枕が欲しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't care about alarm clocks, I want Riki-kun's pillow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't care about alarm clocks, I want Riki-kun's pillow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なぁ、理樹。全力で追い出していいか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki. Can I just toss her outta here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki. Can I just toss her outta here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お、押さえて、真人押さえてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝C, calm down, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝C, calm down, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ――十分後。
MESSAGE.EN: ――10 minutes later.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――10 minutes later.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほら、三枝…時計やるから。スーパーボールもやるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Here, Saigusa... here's your clock. And a super ball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Here, Saigusa... here's your clock. And a super ball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「でてけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now get out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now get out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うう、まるで私、お邪魔みたいですヨー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu, you're treating me like some kind of nuisance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu, you're treating me like some kind of nuisance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、や、やば。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, er, this might be bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, er, this might be bad.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の額に青筋が。
MESSAGE.EN: Veins were bulging on Masato's forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Veins were bulging on Masato's forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「邪・魔・な・ん・だ・よぉーーーーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You-ARE-a-nui-sance――――――!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You-ARE-a-nui-sance――――――!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひゃぁぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hyaaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hyaaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばたんっ！　部屋の扉が勢いよく閉められた。
MESSAGE.EN: He slammed the door closed forcefully.
MESSAGE.Translation: He slammed the door closed forcefully.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あーあ。追い出されちゃった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A～ah. I got thrown out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A～ah. I got thrown out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、はしゃぎすぎ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you fooled around a little too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you fooled around a little too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う。ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu. I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu. I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、理樹くん、ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, Riki-kun, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, Riki-kun, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、葉留佳さんは音が大きい時計をいくつか選んだようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, Haruka-san had picked a few clocks with loud alarm sounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, Haruka-san had picked a few clocks with loud alarm sounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 電子音がするものばかり選んだのは、ベル音が嫌いだかららしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She had only picked ones with electric beeping alarms. I guess she had something against bell noises.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had only picked ones with electric beeping alarms. I guess she had something against bell noises.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とりあえず自分の部屋へ持って行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I suppose I'll just take these to my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I suppose I'll just take these to my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「寮じゃなくって『向こう』の部屋」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Not the dorm. My room ❛over there.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Not the dorm. My room ❛over there.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも…今日は帰る日じゃないけど、どうしようかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But... today's not a home-going day, what should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But... today's not a home-going day, what should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「早いほうがいいんじゃないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better to get it over with as soon as possible?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better to get it over with as soon as possible?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そうだね。また遅刻して怒られるのは嫌だし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...You're right. I don't want to be late and make everyone angry again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...You're right. I don't want to be late and make everyone angry again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今日のうちに運んでおくことにする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll take them over to my house today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll take them over to my house today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは少し考え込んでいるようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked like she was trying to make up her mind about something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked like she was trying to make up her mind about something.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、あのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uh, umm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uh, umm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なに、葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あの…あのね、もし、その、なんだ、ええと、もし、もしも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Um... Well, would, I mean, maybe, um, what, what if...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Um... Well, would, I mean, maybe, um, what, what if...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わたしの、部屋、見せたい、ってゆったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wanted... to show, you, my room...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wanted... to show, you, my room...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「り、理樹くん、ど、どうするっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ri, Riki-kun, wh, what would you do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ri, Riki-kun, wh, what would you do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を跳ね上げた葉留佳さんは、いきなりずい、と僕に近づいてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly snapping her head up, Haruka-san's face hovered close to mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly snapping her head up, Haruka-san's face hovered close to mine.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「っていうか、へ、変な意味じゃなくってっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I mean, that's, I don't mean anything weird by it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I mean, that's, I don't mean anything weird by it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほら、わ、わたしの家が、どれだけ遠いかってわかってもらったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You see, I, I just wanted you to see how far away my house is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You see, I, I just wanted you to see how far away my house is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わたしが遅刻するのも無理はないって信じて貰えるだろうしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Just so you'll believe me about how hard it is to not be late coming from there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Just so you'll believe me about how hard it is to not be late coming from there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「も、もう疑ってないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I don't doubt you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I don't doubt you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、でも、見てもらったほうが確実だから、確実だよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, but, if you see it, you'll know for sure... for certain, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, but, if you see it, you'll know for sure... for certain, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕に訊かれてもっ。葉留佳さんの息が掛かるぐらいの距離に僕はどぎまぎしながら目をそらした。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was she asking me? Haruka-san was close enough that I could feel her breath; I felt so embarrassed I couldn't help averting my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was she asking me? Haruka-san was close enough that I could feel her breath; I felt so embarrassed I couldn't help averting my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そ、そういうわけで、ど、どうしよう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, so what will... y, you do...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, so what will... y, you do...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうしようって…どうしよう？
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、じゃあ確認…しようかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, then let's... check it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, then let's... check it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、うん。か、確認する？　するんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝O, okay. Ch-check it out, it is? You want to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝O, okay. Ch-check it out, it is? You want to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うう…そっか。じゃあ、しようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu... got it. Then, shall we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu... got it. Then, shall we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…そうする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... let's.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... let's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、その、ええと、行く？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, then, um... let's go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, then, um... let's go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あんまりにおずおずと葉留佳さんが言うものだから、僕までなんか変な気分だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even Haruka-san was all tongue-tied with nervousness, so you can only imagine how strange I felt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even Haruka-san was all tongue-tied with nervousness, so you can only imagine how strange I felt.

MESSAGE.JP: ドキドキしてる。どうしてだろう？　なんて、思いながら、僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: My heart was racing. Why was that? While thinking about it, I nodded my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: My heart was racing. Why was that? While thinking about it, I nodded my head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…か、確認するまでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's not like I need to see it to believe it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's not like I need to see it to believe it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そ、そっか…そうだよね、うん…確かにそうかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, I guess... you're right, yeah... that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, I guess... you're right, yeah... that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめん、変なこと言ってっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry for saying something strange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry for saying something strange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わ、私ったら何舞い上がってるんだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, I don't know why I have my head in the clouds...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, I don't know why I have my head in the clouds...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はしゃぎすぎだね。ごめんね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've been joking around a bit too much. Sorry, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've been joking around a bit too much. Sorry, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ははは、と笑った葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed her usual ❛Ahaha.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed her usual ❛Ahaha.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと傷つけちゃったかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if I had stepped on her feelings a little...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if I had stepped on her feelings a little...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…じゃあ遅刻しないよう明日からがんばるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Well anyway, starting tomorrow I'll try my best to not be late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Well anyway, starting tomorrow I'll try my best to not be late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。がんばって、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah. Do your best, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah. Do your best, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…またね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Right... See you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Right... See you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこか名残惜しそうな顔をしている葉留佳さんと僕は別れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I parted with somehow wistful looks on both of our faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I parted with somehow wistful looks on both of our faces.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの家は、学校から歩いて４０分ぐらいのところにあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's house was about 40 minutes by foot from the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's house was about 40 minutes by foot from the school.

MESSAGE.JP: 自転車ならば２０分といったところだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: I guess it'd be about 20 minutes by bike?
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess it'd be about 20 minutes by bike?

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんも僕も自転車を持っていないのでひたすら歩くしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I didn't have bikes though, so we had to walk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I didn't have bikes though, so we had to walk.

MESSAGE.JP: バス路線から外れた住宅街。
MESSAGE.EN: It was in a residential district away from the bus routes.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was in a residential district away from the bus routes.

MESSAGE.JP: その一角に、葉留佳さんの家はあった。
MESSAGE.EN: In one of the corners there sat Haruka-san's house.
MESSAGE.Translation: In one of the corners there sat Haruka-san's house.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「歩きっぱなしで喉乾いたでしょ。お茶持ってくるね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All that walking must've made you thirsty. I'll get us some tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All that walking must've made you thirsty. I'll get us some tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何がいい？　緑茶？　紅茶？　コーヒーもあるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What do you want? Green tea? Black? There's coffee too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What do you want? Green tea? Black? There's coffee too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「インスタントしかないけど…豆を買ってきたほうがいいかなっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I only have instant... Should I go buy some of the real stuff?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I only have instant... Should I go buy some of the real stuff?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「冷蔵庫にジュースもあったかも。オレンジとか野菜ジュースとか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's some juice in the fridge too. Orange, and vegetable, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's some juice in the fridge too. Orange, and vegetable, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ！　水のほうがいい？　ウーロン茶作った方がいいかなっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah! Or is water better? Or should I make some oolong tea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah! Or is water better? Or should I make some oolong tea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはぐるぐる手を回した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was spinning her hand around all the while as she spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was spinning her hand around all the while as she spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が目を丸くしているのに気がついた葉留佳さんは少し恥ずかしそうに訊いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She noticed that she was making my head spin and finally asked in an embarrassed voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She noticed that she was making my head spin and finally asked in an embarrassed voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…$K5麦茶$K0でいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Is $K5barley tea$K0 okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Is $K5barley tea$K0 okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、ちょっと待っててね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Alright, just wait a bit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Alright, just wait a bit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばたん。葉留佳さんは出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san left the room and closed the door behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san left the room and closed the door behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はぐるり、と部屋を見渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around slowly, examining the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around slowly, examining the room.

MESSAGE.JP: モノトーンで統一された部屋。
MESSAGE.EN: The decoration was mainly monotone.
MESSAGE.Translation: The decoration was mainly monotone.

MESSAGE.JP: カーペットは薄いクリームホワイト。
MESSAGE.EN: The carpet was a light, cream white.
MESSAGE.Translation: The carpet was a light, cream white.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ものが少ない…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(There's not much in here...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(There's not much in here...)

MESSAGE.JP: 本棚も机もある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a bookshelf and a desk in the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a bookshelf and a desk in the room.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、どこかがらん、としている。
MESSAGE.EN: But they were more or less empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: But they were more or less empty.

MESSAGE.JP: 本棚はスカスカだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The bookshelf was barren.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bookshelf was barren.

MESSAGE.JP: 机の上にはぬいぐるみのひとつも無い。
MESSAGE.EN: There was not a single stuffed animal on the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was not a single stuffed animal on the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 筆記用具や古ぼけたノートが転がっているだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There were just some writing utensils and a notebook, curled with age.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were just some writing utensils and a notebook, curled with age.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（寮に荷物運んでるせいかな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder if she just keeps all her stuff at the dormitory.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder if she just keeps all her stuff at the dormitory.)

MESSAGE.JP: 多分そうだろう。女の子の部屋はもっとごちゃごちゃしてるイメージがあるんだけどな。
MESSAGE.EN: That was probably it. I had imagined her room to be a lot more chaotic.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was probably it. I had imagined her room to be a lot more chaotic.

MESSAGE.JP: なのに、葉留佳さんの部屋はすっきりしすぎていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I mean really, it was way too orderly to be Haruka-san's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mean really, it was way too orderly to be Haruka-san's room.

MESSAGE.JP: いや。すっきりというより…生活感がない。
MESSAGE.EN: No. Rather than ❛orderly❜... it didn't even look like a room someone lived in.
MESSAGE.Translation: No. Rather than ❛orderly❜... it didn't even look like a room someone lived in.

MESSAGE.JP: 普段の生活が寮にあるから？
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe because she mostly stayed in the dorm?
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe because she mostly stayed in the dorm?

MESSAGE.JP: …でもなんだろう、この違和感は…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But then, what was with this uncomfortable feeling...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But then, what was with this uncomfortable feeling...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お、お待たせー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝S, sorry to keep you waiting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝S, sorry to keep you waiting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おかえり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Welcome back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Welcome back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはトレイの上にグラスを載せて戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san returned bearing a tray with glasses.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san returned bearing a tray with glasses.

MESSAGE.JP: その途端、部屋の違和感は消えて、あっという間に馴染んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As she entered, the strange feeling dissipated, replaced by one of friendly familiarity.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she entered, the strange feeling dissipated, replaced by one of friendly familiarity.

MESSAGE.JP: ローテーブルの上に置かれたグラスの中身を僕は口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I took one of the glasses she set on the low table and took a sip.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took one of the glasses she set on the low table and took a sip.

MESSAGE.JP: 良く冷えた麦茶だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The well-chilled barley tea sure hit the spot.
MESSAGE.Translation: The well-chilled barley tea sure hit the spot.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お茶だけだと寂しいね…あ、そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a little lonely with just tea... Ah, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a little lonely with just tea... Ah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 床に放り出してあった鞄を開けると、葉留佳さんは紙袋を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san retrieved her bag from the floor and opened it. She then pulled out a small paper bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san retrieved her bag from the floor and opened it. She then pulled out a small paper bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Tadaah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Tadaah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…と、いっても大したものじゃないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Well, not that this is anything special either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Well, not that this is anything special either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ついでに、あまりものだったり。やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Actually, it's just some leftovers. Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Actually, it's just some leftovers. Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 出てきたのは茶色や黄色をしたお菓子…マフィンだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The snacks she produced from the bag were small, yellow and brown... Muffins.
MESSAGE.Translation: The snacks she produced from the bag were small, yellow and brown... Muffins.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そっちはねー、アプリコットのマフィン。理樹くんが持ってるのはペッパーマフィン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This one is, let's see... apricot. And the one you're holding is a pepper muffin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This one is, let's see... apricot. And the one you're holding is a pepper muffin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それがバナナマフィンで、こっちは抹茶のマフィン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That one's banana, and this one's green tea flavored.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That one's banana, and this one's green tea flavored.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お茶っ葉はクド公から貰ったりしたんだケド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I got the tea leaves from Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I got the tea leaves from Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「好きなの食べてね。オススメはね、そのダブルベリーマフィン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eat whichever you like. I recommend the double berry one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eat whichever you like. I recommend the double berry one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「園芸部の畑で採れた苺を使ってるんだよん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I made it with strawberries I got from the gardening club's garden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I made it with strawberries I got from the gardening club's garden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「園芸部から？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The gardening club gave them to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The gardening club gave them to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「勿論きちんとしたもらい物だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Of course; I didn't steal them or anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Of course; I didn't steal them or anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「畑のモグラ避けの風車を作ってあげたらお礼に貰ったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They gave me the berries for setting up the windmills to keep moles out of their garden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They gave me the berries for setting up the windmills to keep moles out of their garden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ。って、モグラにどうして風車？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. Wait, what do windmills have to do with moles?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. Wait, what do windmills have to do with moles?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「風車が回るときの振動が支柱を通じて地面に伝わるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When the windmill rotates, it transmits a certain kind of vibration into the ground.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When the windmill rotates, it transmits a certain kind of vibration into the ground.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「モグラの餌探しを邪魔するんだってー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And that ruins the moles' appetites, or so I've heard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And that ruins the moles' appetites, or so I've heard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういうわけで貰った苺なのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So anyway, that's how I got the strawberries.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So anyway, that's how I got the strawberries.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はオススメのマフィンを手にとった。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the muffin she had indicated.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the muffin she had indicated.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつに割ると微かなバターの匂いがする。
MESSAGE.EN: I split it in two and the faint smell of butter wafted out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I split it in two and the faint smell of butter wafted out.

MESSAGE.JP: 口に入れると生地に練り込まれた果肉の香りがすっと鼻を通り抜けていった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I put the piece in my mouth, my nose caught the scent of the fruit pieces in the dough.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I put the piece in my mouth, my nose caught the scent of the fruit pieces in the dough.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…んぐ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どう？　おいし？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How is it? Good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How is it? Good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。美味しいよ。前貰ったやつも美味しかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. It's good. The ones you brought before were good too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. It's good. The ones you brought before were good too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「チョコチップマフィン？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The chocolate chip ones?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The chocolate chip ones?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「アレはね、本当なら生クリームとか付けるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You usually use fresh cream on those.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You usually use fresh cream on those.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それからマーブルチョコレートを砕いて上にのっけるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝After that, you crumble some marble chocolate for the topping.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝After that, you crumble some marble chocolate for the topping.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「カラフルでとっても綺麗に出来るかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That way they come out much prettier and more colorful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That way they come out much prettier and more colorful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのマフィンは小毬ちゃん用に作った残りで申し訳なかったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I made these muffins with Komari-chan in mind, so these are just leftovers.❞
