MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I made these muffins with Komari-chan in mind, so these are just leftovers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんは甘いモノが好きだからなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san loves sweet things, doesn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san loves sweet things, doesn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「マフィンのデコレーション用に意外と駄菓子が使えるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It may be hard to believe, but old-fashioned Japanese sweets work well for coating muffins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It may be hard to believe, but old-fashioned Japanese sweets work well for coating muffins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから小毬ちゃんと駄菓子屋さん行ったりとかするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I'm always visiting Komari-chan, and the local sweet shops.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I'm always visiting Komari-chan, and the local sweet shops.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ…そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh... I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh... I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういうわけで時々リクエストに応じて焼いてあげてたり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And, like, I sometimes take requests and make those.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And, like, I sometimes take requests and make those.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が出来るのはマフィンとかスコーンだけなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Though I can still only make muffins or scones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Though I can still only make muffins or scones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうのってどこで作るの？　校内だと…家庭科室かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, so where do you cook these? In the school... the home economics lab, perhaps?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, so where do you cook these? In the school... the home economics lab, perhaps?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「家庭科室にはオーブンはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There are no ovens in the home economics lab.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There are no ovens in the home economics lab.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「料理研には電子レンジ兼用のがあったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The cooking class used to have a multi-purpose electric range...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The cooking class used to have a multi-purpose electric range...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、それ壊しちゃって出入り禁止。やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But I've been banned from there for breaking it. Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But I've been banned from there for breaking it. Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Th, then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Th, then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave a chagrined smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave a chagrined smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから今は学食のオーブンを使ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So now I use the cafeteria ovens.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So now I use the cafeteria ovens.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、勝手に!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Without permission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Without permission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「最初は勝手に使ってたんだけどねー。やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, at first I didn't have permission. Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, at first I didn't have permission. Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やはは、じゃないよ、葉留佳さん…。
MESSAGE.EN: This isn't a laughing matter, Haruka-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: This isn't a laughing matter, Haruka-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今は問題ないよ。オーブンを使わせてもらう約束してるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But now it's okay. I've worked out a deal so I can use the ovens.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But now it's okay. I've worked out a deal so I can use the ovens.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「その代わり、放課後とかお休みの日、厨房手伝うことになってるんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝In exchange, I help out in the kitchens on days off and after school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝In exchange, I help out in the kitchens on days off and after school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「使った回数分だけ手伝うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Does the time you have to help out equal the time you use the ovens?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Does the time you have to help out equal the time you use the ovens?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あとは卵代分とかね。ベーキングパウダーとかは自前だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I also work in compensation for the eggs I use. Baking powder I have to bring myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I also work in compensation for the eggs I use. Baking powder I have to bring myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ただ、今や顔見るなり学食のおばちゃん、私を呼びつけるんだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But right now it seems like whenever the lunch lady sees my face she calls me out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But right now it seems like whenever the lunch lady sees my face she calls me out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「トホホ、ただ働きが増えてますヨ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Boo hoo, my unpaid working hours just keep growing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Boo hoo, my unpaid working hours just keep growing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: パンの耳を使ったお菓子も学食の厨房で作っていたのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if she made her leftover bread snacks using the cafeteria as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if she made her leftover bread snacks using the cafeteria as well.

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、あれも卵を使ったお菓子だったな。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, there were eggs in that too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, there were eggs in that too.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「卵料理には拘りがあるの、葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you have a thing for eggs, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you have a thing for eggs, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー…なんで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm... Why do you ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm... Why do you ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、今まで貰ったのって卵を使ったものだったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, everything you've made up to now has eggs in it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, everything you've made up to now has eggs in it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「拘りというか思い入れみたいなものはあるかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I dunno if I'd call it a ❛thing,❜ but I guess I do sorta like eggs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I dunno if I'd call it a ❛thing,❜ but I guess I do sorta like eggs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、最初に作った料理が目玉焼きだったんだよねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The very first dish I ever made was sunny-side up eggs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The very first dish I ever made was sunny-side up eggs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「卵割りもそのころからずっと特訓してるからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I also started practicing my special egg splitting technique at that time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I also started practicing my special egg splitting technique at that time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご飯作るの手伝った時の話？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean back when you started doing your first cooking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean back when you started doing your first cooking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう。昔、作った目玉焼き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep yep. Way back with my first sunny-side up eggs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep yep. Way back with my first sunny-side up eggs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「焦がしちゃってばっかりだったんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Although to be honest, I burnt them to a crisp.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Although to be honest, I burnt them to a crisp.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あのときは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That was when...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That was when...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは不意に言い淀んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly Haruka-san paused.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly Haruka-san paused.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん。なんでもない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh. It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh. It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とにかく、そういう影響で、なんだか知らないけどレシピが偏っちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anyway, I guess that's why my cooking repertoire's a bit limited.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anyway, I guess that's why my cooking repertoire's a bit limited.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「未だにマフィンとスコーンしか出来ないという。やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Actually, I've still only mastered muffins and scones. Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Actually, I've still only mastered muffins and scones. Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「最近はシフォンケーキの勉強もしてるんだけどね。難しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Lately I've been trying to make chiffon cake. It's hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Lately I've been trying to make chiffon cake. It's hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「練習してるんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've been practicing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've been practicing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、してるよ。上手く焼き上がらなくてね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah, I have. I'm not very good at baking them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah, I have. I'm not very good at baking them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぱさぱさになっちゃうんだ。何が悪いんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They always come out dry. I must be doing something wrong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They always come out dry. I must be doing something wrong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのうち出来るようになるよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'll get the hang of it eventually. I'm sure of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'll get the hang of it eventually. I'm sure of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「上手くいかないことでも、何度もやっているうちに上手くなるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you're not good at it now, if you keep trying you'll get better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you're not good at it now, if you keep trying you'll get better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そう、かな…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...will I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...will I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉を聞くと、葉留佳さんは呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She whispered to herself as she listened to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She whispered to herself as she listened to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私にも出来るかな？　うまくできるかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...can I do it? Will I get better?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...can I do it? Will I get better?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「野球だってそうだったよ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's how it was with baseball too, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's how it was with baseball too, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最初ルールも知らなかったのにさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You didn't even know the rules at the beginning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You didn't even know the rules at the beginning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何度もキャッチボールしてるうちに上手くなってたんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you get better after playing catch over and over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you get better after playing catch over and over?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「確かにそうかもね。でも恭介さんほど上手くはならなかったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You might be right. But I'm still not as good as Kyousuke-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You might be right. But I'm still not as good as Kyousuke-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介は別格だよ…どこのポジションでもばっちりだったし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke is special. He plays every position perfectly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke is special. He plays every position perfectly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「試合でも役に立たなかったしね、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was useless during the match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was useless during the match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ミスばっかりでさ。ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I kept missing the ball, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I kept missing the ball, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…放課後、独りで練習ずっとしてたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...even though I would always practice by myself after school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...even though I would always practice by myself after school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何度繰り返してもあんまり上手にならないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No matter how many times I do it, I never get better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No matter how many times I do it, I never get better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほんと、役立たずだね、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm completely useless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm completely useless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ローテーブルの上に頬をくっつけて葉留佳さんはグラスをつついている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had laid her head on the low table and was playing with her glass.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had laid her head on the low table and was playing with her glass.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんでもこなしちゃう人ってやっぱりいるもんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There are people who can do anything and everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There are people who can do anything and everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういう人から見たら、私なんかただの『つかえないやつ』、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝To those people I must look like a ❛good-for-nothing.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝To those people I must look like a ❛good-for-nothing.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うらやましーなぁ、才能のある人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Haa, I'm so jealous of those people with talents.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Haa, I'm so jealous of those people with talents.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんにも何かの才能はあるんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You must have a talent too, Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You must have a talent too, Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「へぇー。ほんとに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Heh. Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Heh. Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どんなのー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を起こして、葉留佳さんは訊ねてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked, lifting her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked, lifting her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ummm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ummm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ummmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ummmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「思いつかないんだ、理樹くん。ひどいなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You can't think of anything, Riki-kun? How mean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You can't think of anything, Riki-kun? How mean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: くすくす笑う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She giggled.
MESSAGE.Translation: She giggled.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あれだ！　ムードメイカーなとこ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I've got one: you're good at livening up a room!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I've got one: you're good at livening up a room!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どちらかというとはるちんはムードブレイカーを目指しているんだけどねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you ask me, I try and bring it down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you ask me, I try and bring it down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「壊しちゃだめだよっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You shouldn't do that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You shouldn't do that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そっか、理樹くんが言うならなるたけ壊さないようにするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay. If you insist, I'll try not to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay. If you insist, I'll try not to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうしてくれると助かるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, that would be a big help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, that would be a big help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいラジャ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Roger that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Roger that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 他愛のない会話。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a silly conversation.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a silly conversation.

MESSAGE.JP: 他に誰もいないせいか、葉留佳さんの様子は普段とちょっと違う気もする。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it was because no one else was around but Haruka-san seemed a little different than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it was because no one else was around but Haruka-san seemed a little different than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 賑々しい性格の裏にあるもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something hidden behind her cheerful personality.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something hidden behind her cheerful personality.

MESSAGE.JP: それはなんだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: What could it be?
MESSAGE.Translation: What could it be?

MESSAGE.JP: こうして僕に見せてくれることの意味を考えようとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered about the meaning of her showing it to me like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered about the meaning of her showing it to me like this.

MESSAGE.JP: そのときだった。車が停まる音が外から聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was at that moment. We heard a car pulling up outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was at that moment. We heard a car pulling up outside.

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが体を強ばらせる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stiffened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stiffened.

MESSAGE.JP: 膝がローテーブルにぶつかったのか、がしゃん、と音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her knee hit the low table with a loud noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her knee hit the low table with a loud noise.

MESSAGE.JP: マフィンが乗った皿やカップが踊る。
MESSAGE.EN: The plate with the muffins and the cups danced a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: The plate with the muffins and the cups danced a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うそっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...No way!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...No way!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして…今日は、帰ってこない日なのに…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why... today, she's not supposed to come home today...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why... today, she's not supposed to come home today...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの顔から血の気が引いている。
MESSAGE.EN: The blood drained from Haruka-san's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The blood drained from Haruka-san's face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめ、ごめん、理樹くん、気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uh, s-sorry, Riki-kun, don't worry about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uh, s-sorry, Riki-kun, don't worry about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしよう…どうしよう…うそ…どうして…どうしよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What am I gonna... what... no way... why... what am I gonna do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What am I gonna... what... no way... why... what am I gonna do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家のひとが帰ってきたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that your family coming home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that your family coming home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: もしそうなら…ちょっとまずいかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: If that was the case... it could be bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: If that was the case... it could be bad.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子と二人っきりのところを、女の子の家のひとに見つかるとなんだか気まずい。
MESSAGE.EN: Finding a boy alone with a girl in her room, yeah, it could definitely be bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finding a boy alone with a girl in her room, yeah, it could definitely be bad.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は落ち着かない気分になった。
MESSAGE.EN: I began to be very worried.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began to be very worried.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしよう…どうしよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What'm I gonna do... What'm I gonna do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What'm I gonna do... What'm I gonna do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: けれど。
MESSAGE.EN: But...
MESSAGE.Translation: But...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは狼狽していた。僕と同じ気持ちなのだろう、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was totally freaking out. I guessed she might be feeling exactly the same thing as me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was totally freaking out. I guessed she might be feeling exactly the same thing as me.

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を覆ったまま、同じ言葉を繰り返している。
MESSAGE.EN: Averting her face, she just kept repeating the same thing over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Averting her face, she just kept repeating the same thing over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か――変だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was... strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was... strange.

MESSAGE.JP: 何が変かは言葉にならない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't put a finger on what exactly was strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't put a finger on what exactly was strange.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、何か変だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But something was wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: But something was wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの部屋の違和感と…同類の、違和感。
MESSAGE.EN: It was similar to that... uncomfortable feeling I'd gotten when entering the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was similar to that... uncomfortable feeling I'd gotten when entering the room.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきまで和やかに会話していた葉留佳さんはどこにも居なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The peaceful Haruka-san I'd just been conversing with was gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: The peaceful Haruka-san I'd just been conversing with was gone.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ狼狽し、小さく震えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Now she was confused, shivering.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now she was confused, shivering.

MESSAGE.JP: がちゃり、とドアノブが回った。
MESSAGE.EN: The doorknob turned with a metallic sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: The doorknob turned with a metallic sound.

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「葉留佳、お客さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Haruka, do you have guests?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Haruka, do you have guests?❞

MESSAGE.JP: のんびりした声の女性が顔を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: A woman with a laid-back voice stuck her face in.
MESSAGE.Translation: A woman with a laid-back voice stuck her face in.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こ、こんにちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, hello.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, hello.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は慌てて立ち上がって頭を下げて挨拶をした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up in a rush and nervously bowed my head in greeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up in a rush and nervously bowed my head in greeting.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「あら。こんにちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝My, hello.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝My, hello.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 穏やかな笑顔の女性。
MESSAGE.EN: The woman had a gentle face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The woman had a gentle face.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが髪を解いてもっと大人になったらこんな容姿になるだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: If Haruka-san's hair was untied and she were a little older, would she look like this?
MESSAGE.Translation: If Haruka-san's hair was untied and she were a little older, would she look like this?

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「葉留佳。お客さんがいるなら、教えてくれればよかったのに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Haruka. You should have told me you were going to have your friend over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Haruka. You should have told me you were going to have your friend over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「ごめんなさいね、あまり気が利く娘じゃなくって」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Sorry about that, my daughter's a little careless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Sorry about that, my daughter's a little careless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: むす…め？
MESSAGE.EN: Daugh... ter?
MESSAGE.Translation: Daugh... ter?

MESSAGE.JP: だとしたら。このひとは――葉留佳さんの、お母さんなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: So that was it. This person was... Haruka-san's mother.
MESSAGE.Translation: So that was it. This person was... Haruka-san's mother.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「葉留佳、今日はどうするの？　ご飯、食べていかない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Haruka, what are your plans? Will you stay for dinner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Haruka, what are your plans? Will you stay for dinner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「良かったら、あなたもどうかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝If you'd like, you can stay as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝If you'd like, you can stay as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は答えようとして、ズボンの裾を掴んでいる葉留佳さんに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was about to answer I realized that Haruka-san was grabbing hold of my trouser leg.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was about to answer I realized that Haruka-san was grabbing hold of my trouser leg.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さく震えている葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She was still trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was still trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は返事をしていいか、迷った。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to answer, but I didn't know what to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to answer, but I didn't know what to say.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「恥ずかしがってるみたい。しょうがないんだから、もう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Oh, you're feeling a little shy. What'll I do with you two, really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Oh, you're feeling a little shy. What'll I do with you two, really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: びくん、と葉留佳さんの腕が震えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt Haruka-san's arm twitch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt Haruka-san's arm twitch.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「決まったら教えてね、葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝When you decide, just let me know, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝When you decide, just let me know, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「あなたも是非夕ご飯を食べていって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Please feel free to stay for dinner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Please feel free to stay for dinner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「葉留佳が友達を連れてきたのは久しぶりだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's been such a long time since Haruka brought someone home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's been such a long time since Haruka brought someone home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのひとはそれだけ言って、ドアを閉めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Having said that, she closed the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having said that, she closed the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 階段を下りる音。
MESSAGE.EN: We heard her descend the stairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: We heard her descend the stairs.

MESSAGE.JP: ばたん、と下の階で扉が閉まる音がすると、葉留佳さんは深呼吸をした。
MESSAGE.EN: From below there was the sound of a door closing, and Haruka-san let out a deep breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: From below there was the sound of a door closing, and Haruka-san let out a deep breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん？　どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san? What on earth?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san? What on earth?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…はーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がばっ、と葉留佳さんは顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san raised her face with a relieved voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san raised her face with a relieved voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、びっくりした！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahh, that surprised me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahh, that surprised me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの葉留佳さんだ…いつもの。だよね？
MESSAGE.EN: It was the same old Haruka-san... right?
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the same old Haruka-san... right?

MESSAGE.JP: 自分に問いかけてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to ask myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to ask myself.

MESSAGE.JP: どこか無理してる口調に聞こえないか？
MESSAGE.EN: Wasn't there something off about her voice?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wasn't there something off about her voice?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いきなり帰ってくるんだもんなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Coming home out of nowhere like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Coming home out of nowhere like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もう。今日は二人きりだとおもったのにー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Man. I thought it'd just be the two of us today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Man. I thought it'd just be the two of us today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うむ、邪魔が入ってしまったようですヨ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, looks like an obstacle has appeared, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, looks like an obstacle has appeared, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…普段はあまり帰ってこないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is it rare for your parents to come home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is it rare for your parents to come home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あまり、というか。仕事が忙しいの。どれ…どちらも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah, I guess. They're really busy with work, both of 'em.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah, I guess. They're really busy with work, both of 'em.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だからあんまり顔を合わせられなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I don't really see them much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I don't really see them much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうか…葉留佳さんが、自宅帰る日って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right... you mentioned coming home on specific days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right... you mentioned coming home on specific days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。そのとおり。家族が、揃うよう日程を調整するの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. It's like that. We've arranged our schedules so that we can be home together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. It's like that. We've arranged our schedules so that we can be home together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「大抵は週末なんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Usually it's on the weekend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Usually it's on the weekend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やー、さすがの葉留佳さんもびっくりですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yaa, even Haruka-san's surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yaa, even Haruka-san's surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「勿論やましいことはなにもしてませんけどねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I have nothing to feel guilty about, of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I have nothing to feel guilty about, of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝R, right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝R, right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは笑うのを止めると、しばらく無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's laughter trailed off, and she fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's laughter trailed off, and she fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、食べていく？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, do you want to eat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, do you want to eat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「学食ほどじゃないけど。食べられなくはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It won't be as good as the cafeteria. But it's edible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It won't be as good as the cafeteria. But it's edible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「食べられなくはない、って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Edible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Edible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。食べられなくはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep. It's edible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep. It's edible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 微妙な言い回しだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She repeated the questionable word.
MESSAGE.Translation: She repeated the questionable word.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはまるで食べていくことを遠回しに反対しているみたいにも思える。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like Haruka-san was subtly telling me she didn't want me to accept her mom's offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like Haruka-san was subtly telling me she didn't want me to accept her mom's offer.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「折角だから、ご厚意に甘えるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a rare opportunity, so we should accept her kindness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a rare opportunity, so we should accept her kindness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が答えると、葉留佳さんは笑ってるのか怒ってるのかわからない表情をした。
MESSAGE.EN: When I gave that answer, Haruka-san made an unreadable face, neither angry nor happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I gave that answer, Haruka-san made an unreadable face, neither angry nor happy.

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは、戸惑っているような投げやりに諦めているような――そんな、顔。
MESSAGE.EN: Or, rather, it was like the expression of a lost person, a person whose hopes had dwindled. That kind of face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or, rather, it was like the expression of a lost person, a person whose hopes had dwindled. That kind of face.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、最近葉留佳さんの複雑な表情ばかり見ている気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like lately I'd only been seeing Haruka-san's most complex expressions.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like lately I'd only been seeing Haruka-san's most complex expressions.

MESSAGE.JP: 壁時計の秒針が、カチコチと音を立てている。
MESSAGE.EN: The clock on the wall ticked away the seconds loudly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The clock on the wall ticked away the seconds loudly.

MESSAGE.JP: カチリ、とひどく冷たく長針が動く音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a louder sound as the minute hand moved.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a louder sound as the minute hand moved.

MESSAGE.JP: 時刻は、六時。
MESSAGE.EN: The clock read 6:00.
MESSAGE.Translation: The clock read 6:00.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いこっか、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Shall we go, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Shall we go, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: ドアノブを握った葉留佳さんは、そこで動きを止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took hold of the doorknob, then paused.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took hold of the doorknob, then paused.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を俯かせた葉留佳さんがドアノブを握る力を込めたのがわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: As she lowered her head, I could see her gripping the knob with greater force than necessary.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she lowered her head, I could see her gripping the knob with greater force than necessary.

MESSAGE.JP: それは何かを迷っているかのようにも見えたし――
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like she was thinking long and hard about something―
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like she was thinking long and hard about something―

MESSAGE.JP: ――あるいは。あるいは。あるいは…？
MESSAGE.EN: ――or maybe. Or maybe. Or maybe...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ――or maybe. Or maybe. Or maybe...?

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、僕が何かを言う前に、ドアは開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: But, before I could say anything, the door opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, before I could say anything, the door opened.

MESSAGE.JP: ふわり、と良い香り。
MESSAGE.EN: An alluring aroma drifted in.
MESSAGE.Translation: An alluring aroma drifted in.

MESSAGE.JP: 味噌汁の匂いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the smell of miso soup.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the smell of miso soup.

MESSAGE.JP: 学食のそれとは違う匂い。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was different from the smell in the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was different from the smell in the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やっぱり、恥ずかしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was right, how embarrassing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was right, how embarrassing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もぅ、何考えてるのかな、うちの人間は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Geez, what is she thinking, that lady...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Geez, what is she thinking, that lady...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの顔にあるのはいつもの笑顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: On Haruka-san's face was her normal smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: On Haruka-san's face was her normal smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「娘が友達連れてきたからってこんなだし。毎回毎回。もー参っちゃうなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She gets like this every time I bring a friend over. I give up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She gets like this every time I bring a friend over. I give up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でもさっき葉留佳さんのお母さんはなんて言っていただろう？
MESSAGE.EN: But wait, what had her mom said just a while ago?
MESSAGE.Translation: But wait, what had her mom said just a while ago?

MESSAGE.JP: ――友達は久しぶりだから。
MESSAGE.EN: ――❛It's been such a long time since Haruka brought someone home.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ――❛It's been such a long time since Haruka brought someone home.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの言い回しもひっかかる。事務的な、その言い回しが。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something off about what Haruka-san had said, too. All of it felt too businesslike.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something off about what Haruka-san had said, too. All of it felt too businesslike.

MESSAGE.JP: ――日程を調整する。
MESSAGE.EN: ――Like a booked appointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Like a booked appointment.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まったくもぅ、本当にしょうがないねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Honestly, I don't know what to do with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Honestly, I don't know what to do with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 階段を下りかけた葉留佳さんは、僕を見上げる格好になった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san descended the stairs and then looked back up at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san descended the stairs and then looked back up at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…どうしたの、理樹くん。行こう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...What's the matter, Riki-kun? Coming?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...What's the matter, Riki-kun? Coming?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。美味しそうな匂いだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. It smells delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. It smells delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 答えながら階段を下りる。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered while descending the stairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered while descending the stairs.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家のなかに、こういう匂いが満ちているのは、幸せな気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's kinda nice, having this kind of homey smell filling the house.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's kinda nice, having this kind of homey smell filling the house.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がそう言うと、葉留佳さんはとてもとても悲しそうな顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: When I said that, Haruka-san's expression turned deeply, incredibly sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I said that, Haruka-san's expression turned deeply, incredibly sad.

MESSAGE.JP: 綺麗なダイニングルームだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The dining room was wonderful.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dining room was wonderful.

MESSAGE.JP: セントラルキッチンの中はぴかぴかに磨かれたステンレスの鍋やフライパンが光っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the central kitchen, light sparkled off the polished, stainless utensils.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the central kitchen, light sparkled off the polished, stainless utensils.

MESSAGE.JP: 明るい赤と青のテーブルクロスの上には花瓶。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a flower vase on top of the cheerful blue and red tablecloth.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a flower vase on top of the cheerful blue and red tablecloth.

MESSAGE.JP: 醤油やソースといったもののみならず、塩やこしょう、七味のトレイがちょこん、と揃えられている。
MESSAGE.EN: All the various spices and sauces were arranged neatly on a special tray.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the various spices and sauces were arranged neatly on a special tray.

MESSAGE.JP: 所狭しと並べられた美味しそうな料理。
MESSAGE.EN: Delicious looking food had been lined up tightly together on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Delicious looking food had been lined up tightly together on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「お名前訊いていいかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝May I ask your name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝May I ask your name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は名乗った。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave her my name.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave her my name.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「なるほど。良いお名前ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝I see. That's a wonderful name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝I see. That's a wonderful name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「ねぇ、葉留佳？　葉留佳もそう思うわよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Isn't it, Haruka? You think so too, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Isn't it, Haruka? You think so too, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「おかわりはどうですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Would you like seconds?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Would you like seconds?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いただきます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「どんどん食べていいからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Eat as much as you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Eat as much as you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとうございます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you very much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you very much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は箸でご飯を口に運んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I ate some rice with my chopsticks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ate some rice with my chopsticks.

MESSAGE.JP: ほかほかと温かいご飯は沢山あるおかずと一緒に食べているのに、よく味がわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was steamy warm rice and a mountain of side dishes, though the atmosphere was still strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was steamy warm rice and a mountain of side dishes, though the atmosphere was still strange.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「そういえば葉留佳、最近学園のほうはどう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝So, Haruka, how has school been lately?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝So, Haruka, how has school been lately?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「そろそろ学力テストがあるんじゃなかったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Isn't there a big test coming up soon?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Isn't there a big test coming up soon?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「そうそう、そうだったそうだった。頑張ってね、葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's right, there was. Do your best, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's right, there was. Do your best, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「ちゃんと名前を書くんだぞ。書き忘れないようにな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Be sure to write your name. Can't forget that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Be sure to write your name. Can't forget that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 料理を作っているのは、葉留佳さんのお父さんのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The one who had made the food was Haruka-san's dad.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one who had made the food was Haruka-san's dad.

MESSAGE.JP: 席に座らず、セントラルキッチンのコンロの前と食卓を行ったり来たりしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rather than sitting still, he was constantly moving back and forth between the kitchen stove and dining table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rather than sitting still, he was constantly moving back and forth between the kitchen stove and dining table.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の右斜め前に座っている葉留佳さんのお母さんは座ったままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's mom was sitting diagonally to my left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's mom was sitting diagonally to my left.

MESSAGE.JP: ちらり、と隣に座っている葉留佳さんを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I shot a furtive glance at Haruka-san, seated by my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shot a furtive glance at Haruka-san, seated by my side.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん。…うん。…そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Right... Right, I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Right... Right, I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 平坦な口調の葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was replying to everything in monotone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was replying to everything in monotone.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ相槌を打っているだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was just blandly agreeing with everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was just blandly agreeing with everything.

MESSAGE.JP: 会話は表層を流れていくだけで、誰もお互いの言葉を聞いていない。
MESSAGE.EN: The conversation flowed by without really touching us. Everyone spoke without listening.
MESSAGE.Translation: The conversation flowed by without really touching us. Everyone spoke without listening.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな冷えた食卓だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the kind of frigid dinner it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the kind of frigid dinner it was.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「お友達とは上手くやってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Is everything going well with your friends?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Is everything going well with your friends?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「寮の隣部屋の子に迷惑掛けるんじゃないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Don't make any trouble for your neighbors at the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Don't make any trouble for your neighbors at the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「大丈夫よ、葉留佳なら。ねぇ葉留佳？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's alright, Haruka's not like that. Right, Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's alright, Haruka's not like that. Right, Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「そうか、ならいいんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Is that so? Well, that's good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Is that so? Well, that's good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Um.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Um.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…先週もしたよ、この話は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...We had this conversation before, last week.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...We had this conversation before, last week.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼそっと呟いた葉留佳さんの言葉に、ぎしり、と空気が凍り付いた。
MESSAGE.EN: When Haruka-san murmured those words, the atmosphere froze solid.
MESSAGE.Translation: When Haruka-san murmured those words, the atmosphere froze solid.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「………」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「………」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食卓に沈黙が落ち、再び会話がなされることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The dining room fell silent, and there was no way to revive that conversation.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dining room fell silent, and there was no way to revive that conversation.

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんとふたり、学校まで帰ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I returned to the school together with Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I returned to the school together with Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何に対しての謝罪なのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered what it was she was apologizing for.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered what it was she was apologizing for.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそれっきり黙ったままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hadn't said anything since we left the house.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hadn't said anything since we left the house.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめんね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…謝らなくてもいいよ。料理、美味しかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You don't have to apologize. The food was good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You don't have to apologize. The food was good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは口を開き掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san started to open her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san started to open her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、結局何も言わず首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: But in the end she didn't say anything and instead shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: But in the end she didn't say anything and instead shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ありがと、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Thanks, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Thanks, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ありがと、と葉留佳さんは繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Thanks,❜ she mouthed again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Thanks,❜ she mouthed again.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…今日は、付き合ってくれてありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Thanks for hanging out with me today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Thanks for hanging out with me today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな葉留佳さんに僕はなんて答えたら良かったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How could I respond to Haruka-san in that situation?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could I respond to Haruka-san in that situation?

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉を返す前に葉留佳さんは身を翻していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could come up with anything to say, Haruka-san turned away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could come up with anything to say, Haruka-san turned away.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃあ、また明日ねっ！　ばいばいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you tomorrow! Buh-bye!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you tomorrow! Buh-bye!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おやすみなさいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝G'night!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝G'night!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二本尻尾が夜の校内に消える。
MESSAGE.EN: Her twin tails vanished into the dark school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her twin tails vanished into the dark school building.

MESSAGE.JP: それを見送って、僕は「途中の寮の分かれ道まで行こうか」って言えば良かったのに、と。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as she was gone, it hit me that perhaps I should have said, ❛Can I walk you to the dorm?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as she was gone, it hit me that perhaps I should have said, ❛Can I walk you to the dorm?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 言えなかった自分に少しだけ腹を立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: I mentally kicked myself for having missed the opportunity.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mentally kicked myself for having missed the opportunity.

MESSAGE.JP: …しばらく走って、私は足を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...After running for a bit, I stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...After running for a bit, I stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: And turned back.
MESSAGE.Translation: And turned back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんは追ってこない。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun wasn't following me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun wasn't following me.

MESSAGE.JP: 胸に手を当てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I clutched my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I clutched my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は…追ってきて欲しかったのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Did I... want him to come after me?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I... want him to come after me?

MESSAGE.JP: ううん。やっぱりあれ以上いっしょにいたら、私はまた…。
MESSAGE.EN: No. If I was with him any longer, I'd would definitely...
MESSAGE.Translation: No. If I was with him any longer, I'd would definitely...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（理樹くん…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(Riki-kun...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(Riki-kun...)

MESSAGE.JP: とぼとぼと、歩き出す、私。
MESSAGE.EN: I plodded along.
MESSAGE.Translation: I plodded along.

MESSAGE.JP: あの部屋は、いい思い出とわるい思い出がある。
MESSAGE.EN: I have good and bad memories of that room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have good and bad memories of that room.

MESSAGE.JP: 私が嫌いなひとたちがいる家（本当なら好きなひとたちがいる家）。
MESSAGE.EN: The house where the people I hate live (when really it should be the house where the people I love live).
MESSAGE.Translation: The house where the people I hate live (when really it should be the house where the people I love live).

MESSAGE.JP: そこは自分の居場所には思えなかった（居場所だと思っていいはずなのに）。
MESSAGE.EN: I never thought of it as a place where I belong. (Even though I should have.)
MESSAGE.Translation: I never thought of it as a place where I belong. (Even though I should have.)

MESSAGE.JP: 最初に連れてこられた日のことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I remember the first day I was brought here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remember the first day I was brought here.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（…用意された茶碗と名前入りのフォーク）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(...That rice bowl and monogrammed fork.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(...That rice bowl and monogrammed fork.)

MESSAGE.JP: 作法通りに握れない私は箸が嫌いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't like chopsticks as I couldn't get the hang of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't like chopsticks as I couldn't get the hang of them.

MESSAGE.JP: 箸を握ると、右でも左でも不格好で、よく殴打された。
MESSAGE.EN: I was always clumsy with them and would often get hit for it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was always clumsy with them and would often get hit for it.

MESSAGE.JP: 想像してみるといい。
MESSAGE.EN: Go ahead, imagine it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Go ahead, imagine it.

MESSAGE.JP: 食事の時間すら、苦痛しかないという毎日を。
MESSAGE.EN: Days where even meals are nothing but pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Days where even meals are nothing but pain.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな毎日だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's how my life was.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's how my life was.

MESSAGE.JP: だから私は誰かと何かを食べることが苦手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I don't like eating with people.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I don't like eating with people.

MESSAGE.JP: 怒られないか、嫌われないか…内心いつもびくびくしてる。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm always afraid... will they get angry? Will they hate me?
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm always afraid... will they get angry? Will they hate me?

MESSAGE.JP: 名前入りのフォークは、嫌味かと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought that my monogrammed fork was some sort of sarcasm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought that my monogrammed fork was some sort of sarcasm.

MESSAGE.JP: あのひとたちに当たり散らした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was incorrigible to those people.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was incorrigible to those people.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（こどもだな、私…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I'm such a child...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I'm such a child...)

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かに思うまま当たり散らすこと。
MESSAGE.EN: To be so completely set against someone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be so completely set against someone else.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなわがままが許されるだけで、ほんとうはすごく嬉しいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I should be really happy that my selfishness has been forgiven.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I should be really happy that my selfishness has been forgiven.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（でも…好きって言いたくない…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(But... I don't want to say I like them...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(But... I don't want to say I like them...)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（嫌いじゃないけど…好きじゃない）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I don't hate them, but... I don't like them.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I don't hate them, but... I don't like them.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（あそこに居たいけど…居たくない）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I want to be there... but I don't.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I want to be there... but I don't.)

MESSAGE.JP: それなのに、どうして部屋に理樹くんを誘ったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that, why did I invite Riki-kun to my room?
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that, why did I invite Riki-kun to my room?

MESSAGE.JP: 学校へ来てから見たコメディドラマみたいに。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like one of those comedic dramas I saw after starting school.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like one of those comedic dramas I saw after starting school.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は男の子を自分の部屋に呼ぶ、ってことをやってみたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to see what it was like to invite a boy to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to see what it was like to invite a boy to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: どんな気分なのだろう、と思っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was curious how it would feel.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was curious how it would feel.

MESSAGE.JP: ドラマでは男の子は女の子の部屋にくるとどきどきするものらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: In the dramas when a boy goes to a girls room, they'd get flustered.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the dramas when a boy goes to a girls room, they'd get flustered.

MESSAGE.JP: …それが私なんかでも理樹くんはどきどきしてくれるだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: ...did Riki-kun get flustered being in my room?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...did Riki-kun get flustered being in my room?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（…理樹くんだけに見せるんだよ、って言ったらどんな顔するのかな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(...I wonder how he'd react if I told him he's the only boy who's seen it...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(...I wonder how he'd react if I told him he's the only boy who's seen it...)

MESSAGE.JP: でも、私はこんな子なので…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I'm like this, so...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I'm like this, so...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんは来てくれるとは限らないだろうから。
MESSAGE.EN: Going there is probably as far as Riki-kun would go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Going there is probably as far as Riki-kun would go.

MESSAGE.JP: 私じゃだめなのかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not good enough...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not good enough...

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、だめなのかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm definitely not good enough...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm definitely not good enough...

MESSAGE.JP: 何度も、何回も、失敗ばかりを繰り返す私。
MESSAGE.EN: All I do is screw up over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I do is screw up over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（今日は、来てくれた…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(He came today...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(He came today...)

MESSAGE.JP: うれしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was really happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was really happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度誘っても慣れない。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many times I invite him, I'll never get used to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many times I invite him, I'll never get used to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 断られたら、とても辛い。
MESSAGE.EN: It'll break my heart if he turns me down.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'll break my heart if he turns me down.

MESSAGE.JP: からだや、あたまがぎしぎし痛んで何も考えられなくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: My body and mind will crumble and I'll be unable to think.
MESSAGE.Translation: My body and mind will crumble and I'll be unable to think.

MESSAGE.JP: 好きなひとから、どうでもいいって思われるのは。
MESSAGE.EN: To be thought nothing of by the person you like.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be thought nothing of by the person you like.

MESSAGE.JP: 構って貰えないのは、とても苦しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Being ignored is so painful.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being ignored is so painful.

MESSAGE.JP: …他の子と違って、私は自分に自信がない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't have any confidence like other girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't have any confidence like other girls.

MESSAGE.JP: かわいくないという自覚はあったし、それに私は、他人が怖かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I know I'm not cute and I'm scared of strangers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know I'm not cute and I'm scared of strangers.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は『要らない子』だったから、誰にとってもそうだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I was the ❛unwanted child,❜ other people saw me like that too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I was the ❛unwanted child,❜ other people saw me like that too.

MESSAGE.JP: 勇気を振り絞って言っても…受け止めてもらえることなんてなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I was told to pluck up the courage... there was nothing that would receive it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I was told to pluck up the courage... there was nothing that would receive it.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かのせいじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't someone else's fault.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't someone else's fault.

MESSAGE.JP: …私が、こんな子でしかないからだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's because I'm me...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's because I'm me...

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、私でいちゃいけないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I shouldn't be me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shouldn't be me.

MESSAGE.JP: 私が私でいる限り、必要とされないのなら――。
MESSAGE.EN: If I am, people won't need me――
MESSAGE.Translation: If I am, people won't need me――

MESSAGE.JP: ――せめて道化の仮面を被っていようと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: ――so I started acting like a buffoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――so I started acting like a buffoon.

MESSAGE.JP: 気まぐれに声を掛けてくれたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He probably called out to me on a whim.
MESSAGE.Translation: He probably called out to me on a whim.

MESSAGE.JP: たいした理由もなかったに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: There couldn't have been any real reason to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There couldn't have been any real reason to it.

MESSAGE.JP: …あの春の日のことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I remember that spring day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remember that spring day.

MESSAGE.JP: 何をしたらいいかもわからなくて…。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know what to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know what to do...

MESSAGE.JP: ぼんやりと過ごすだけでしかなかった中庭のベンチでの会話。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a conversation that occurred on a bench in the courtyard, where I was just killing time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a conversation that occurred on a bench in the courtyard, where I was just killing time.

MESSAGE.JP: 『顔色悪いけど…だいじょうぶ？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝You look pale... are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝You look pale... are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『何もすることがないから座ってるだけ？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Are you sitting here because you don't have anything to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Are you sitting here because you don't have anything to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『あー、そうだ。暇だったらさ、缶蹴りしない？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Oh, I know. If you're free, why not play kick the can with us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Oh, I know. If you're free, why not play kick the can with us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『人数が多いほうが楽しいし…やらない？　そっか。気が向いたら来てね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's better with more people... you want to play? I see. Come if you change your mind.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's better with more people... you want to play? I see. Come if you change your mind.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ねぇ、それだけだったんだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: See, that's all it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: See, that's all it was.

MESSAGE.JP: たった、それだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was all.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was all.

MESSAGE.JP: あなたの小さな気まぐれが、ほんとうに奇跡みたいに思えたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Your small whim was a miracle to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Your small whim was a miracle to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（きっと、覚えてないだろうけど…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I doubt he even remembers...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I doubt he even remembers...)

MESSAGE.JP: だから、今を繰り返していたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I wanted this time to never end..
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I wanted this time to never end..

MESSAGE.JP: 許される限り。
MESSAGE.EN: If possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: If possible.

MESSAGE.JP: 他の子みたいに、それ以上は…私、何も望まない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Like the others, I don't want anything more than that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Like the others, I don't want anything more than that...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（そのはずだったのに…それなのに）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(That's what I thought... but...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(That's what I thought... but...)

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、私のこと、構ってくれるのは嬉しいと考えてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I'm happy that you pay attention to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I'm happy that you pay attention to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（…今日は…よかった…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(Today... was a good day...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(Today... was a good day...)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（だから、うれしい…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(So I'm happy...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(So I'm happy...)

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、来てくれる度に、邪魔が入る。
MESSAGE.EN: But every time he comes, something gets in the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: But every time he comes, something gets in the way.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の小さな幸せを潰すかのように。
MESSAGE.EN: Like it wants to crush my happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like it wants to crush my happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで私がそれを受け取ることは無理なのだと言いたげに。
MESSAGE.EN: As if to say ❛you can't have it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: As if to say ❛you can't have it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（そんなことない…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(That's not true...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(That's not true...)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（私だって…わたし、だって…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(Even I want... I want...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(Even I want... I want...)

MESSAGE.JP: 私の足は、歩くのを止めてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped walking.

MESSAGE.JP: これ以上考えるのはやめよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I need to stop thinking about this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I need to stop thinking about this.

MESSAGE.JP: この続きを考えるのはよそう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking any more about it would be too good.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking any more about it would be too good.

MESSAGE.JP: それなのに、考えてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I know that, but I keep thinking about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know that, but I keep thinking about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 思ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Keep imagining it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Keep imagining it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（…今のままでもいいんだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(...It's OK to be me.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(...It's OK to be me.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（今のままでいることは…それ以外でいるより、ずっとましだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(It's better to be me than to be something... worse.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(It's better to be me than to be something... worse.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（ずっとずっと、ましだ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(It's definitely better...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(It's definitely better...)

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、自分にそう言い聞かせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept telling myself that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept telling myself that.

MESSAGE.JP: 教科担任に頼まれた資料を運んだ帰り。
MESSAGE.EN: I was returning from transporting some documents for the homeroom teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was returning from transporting some documents for the homeroom teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: 階段から廊下を覗き込んでいる女の子に気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way down the stairs I noticed a girl peeking into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way down the stairs I noticed a girl peeking into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ふう。やり過ごせたかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Hmm. I wonder if I overdid it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Hmm. I wonder if I overdid it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わぁっ！　…なんだ、理樹くんか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wahh! ...Oh, it's just Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wahh! ...Oh, it's just Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな驚かなくても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's with that reaction...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's with that reaction...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: I grimaced in chagrin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grimaced in chagrin.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたの…って、訊くまでもないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wro-... never mind, I don't even need to ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wro-... never mind, I don't even need to ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「一応訊いてよー。寂しいじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝At least ask! That's cold.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝At least ask! That's cold.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「追われてるんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're being chased, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're being chased, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「追われてなどいない…のです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This time I'm not being... chased.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This time I'm not being... chased.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今の間は何なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What's with that pause?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's with that pause?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「追い回されてるだけですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm being followed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm being followed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「意味同じだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That means the exact same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That means the exact same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「普通に歩いてるだけで追いかけてくるんですヨー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I can't believe they're out to get me even when I'm just walking normally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I can't believe they're out to get me even when I'm just walking normally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「困ったもんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What a bother, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What a bother, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな他人事みたいにっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Like it's someone else's problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like it's someone else's problem.

MESSAGE.JP: あと膨れてる上着のポケットはやっぱりビー玉が入ってるんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: How can you act so victimized when I'm sure those are marbles bulging in your jacket pocket...
MESSAGE.Translation: How can you act so victimized when I'm sure those are marbles bulging in your jacket pocket...

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員はそれをみて予防のため（？）に声を掛けたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure those prefects in pursuit had taken pre-emptive action to keep her from playing some prank with them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure those prefects in pursuit had taken pre-emptive action to keep her from playing some prank with them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こそこそする必要はないと思うよ。何もしてないんだったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no need to sneak around. If you're innocent, I mean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no need to sneak around. If you're innocent, I mean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、委員のひとたちは私を敵だと思ってるからねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But the prefects think I'm their nemesis or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But the prefects think I'm their nemesis or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ま、委員長（トップ）の方針なんだろうケド。つまらない連中っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it was orders from the top. What a boring bunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it was orders from the top. What a boring bunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は再び苦笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: My dry smile returned.
MESSAGE.Translation: My dry smile returned.

MESSAGE.JP: 騒ぎを起こしている葉留佳さんも悪くない、とは言えないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't exactly call Haruka-san, the frequent disturber of the public peace, innocent.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't exactly call Haruka-san, the frequent disturber of the public peace, innocent.

MESSAGE.JP: それでもなぜだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But for some reason...
MESSAGE.Translation: But for some reason...

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの騒ぎに出会う度に、何か違ったものを感じ始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time I met with this troublemaker, I was feeling a growing sense of incongruity.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time I met with this troublemaker, I was feeling a growing sense of incongruity.

MESSAGE.JP: 自販機前のトラブルといい――意識しすぎだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was it because of that scene in front of the vending machine? Or was I thinking too hard...
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it because of that scene in front of the vending machine? Or was I thinking too hard...

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「つまらないことをしているのは、あなたでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝The boring one here is you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝The boring one here is you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に聞こえた声に葉留佳さんは、びくっ、と体をすくめた。
MESSAGE.EN: A voice came out of nowhere, causing Haruka-san to jump a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: A voice came out of nowhere, causing Haruka-san to jump a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「第一に、時間を無駄にしている」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Count one, wasting time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Count one, wasting time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「第二に、気力を浪費している」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Count two, wasting your energy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Count two, wasting your energy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「第三に、努力を間違えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Count three, pouring your efforts into frivolous matters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Count three, pouring your efforts into frivolous matters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこに居たのは――クリムゾン・レッドの腕章をした女の子。
MESSAGE.EN: There stood a girl wearing a crimson armband.
MESSAGE.Translation: There stood a girl wearing a crimson armband.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度か廊下ですれ違ったことのある風紀委員会の委員長、二木さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was someone I had passed by in the hallway occasionally: Futaki-san, the head prefect.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was someone I had passed by in the hallway occasionally: Futaki-san, the head prefect.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはぷい、と顔を背けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san defiantly averted her gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san defiantly averted her gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そんなの、私の勝手だもん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...That's just the way I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...That's just the way I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 普段まったく見せないのに、なぜか見える『それ』――言葉の裏にある、棘。
MESSAGE.EN: She was definitely not her usual self. Her words were biting, stinging, a thinly-veiled attack.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was definitely not her usual self. Her words were biting, stinging, a thinly-veiled attack.

MESSAGE.JP: こと風紀委員に関することになると葉留佳さんはいつもの脳天気さを引っ込めている気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: She had gone into the insolent mode reserved for dealing with the prefects.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had gone into the insolent mode reserved for dealing with the prefects.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「図星だから開き直ることしか出来ないんでしょう？　あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Pissed because I hit the nail on the head? Really now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Pissed because I hit the nail on the head? Really now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふふん、と女の子はせせら笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave an arrogant laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave an arrogant laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは言い返そうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san made to talk back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san made to talk back.

MESSAGE.JP: けれどそれは言葉にならない。
MESSAGE.EN: But she couldn't seem to find the words.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she couldn't seem to find the words.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さい囁き。それは悪態なのか罵りなのか僕にはわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She just whispered something. Whether it was an insult or foul words, I couldn't make out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She just whispered something. Whether it was an insult or foul words, I couldn't make out.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「心配されるうちが華よ、三枝葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You'd better mend your ways while you still can, Haruka Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You'd better mend your ways while you still can, Haruka Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 高みから見下ろされたような態度に僕はなんだかムカムカした。
MESSAGE.EN: Her holier-than-thou attitude was starting to piss me off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her holier-than-thou attitude was starting to piss me off.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「普段はともかく、今は何もしてないよ、葉留佳さんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Regardless of her history, Haruka-san hasn't done anything now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Regardless of her history, Haruka-san hasn't done anything now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたは…あなたたちは、懲りてないのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You, you two that is, you just never learn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You, you two that is, you just never learn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそっぽを向いたままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san kept averting her gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san kept averting her gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…この子とどんな関係？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What's your relationship with her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What's your relationship with her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は僕を見ながら訊いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked while looking straight at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked while looking straight at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに答える義務はないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think I need to answer that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think I need to answer that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ふん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Oh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Oh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「訊く権利はあると思うけど？　ま、いいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though I have every right to ask? Well, never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though I have every right to ask? Well, never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「三枝葉留佳と一緒に居るだけで、内申に響くから止めておきなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even just being near her is enough to stain your student file.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even just being near her is enough to stain your student file.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちょ、ちょっと待ってよ！　理樹くんは関係ないっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝W, wait! Riki-kun has nothing to do with this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝W, wait! Riki-kun has nothing to do with this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何もしてないしっ、私と立ち話しただけでっ、そもそも知り合いでもなんでもな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝He wasn't doing anything. He just stopped to talk, it's not like we're even friends or anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝He wasn't doing anything. He just stopped to talk, it's not like we're even friends or anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…名前を呼んでおいて関係なしって言われてもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Close enough for you to be on first-name basis, it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Close enough for you to be on first-name basis, it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あ…ちが、違う、私とは、な、なんでも…なんでもないんだからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Wait... that's... no, he... he's got nothing to do with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Wait... that's... no, he... he's got nothing to do with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは慌てて抗議しはじめた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san began to protest in a fluster.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san began to protest in a fluster.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…って、言ってるけど？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Well, is it as she says?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Well, is it as she says?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子は僕に視線を向けて言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said that while glancing at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said that while glancing at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 口元が小さく歪んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her mouth formed a twisted smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her mouth formed a twisted smile.

MESSAGE.JP: それは僕には嘲っている笑みにしか見えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see anything but that sneering smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see anything but that sneering smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなこと言われたぐらいで、無関係だと答える人間がいたら見てみたいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you're expecting me to denounce her just because she said that, I'm sorry to disappoint. I doubt there's anyone who would do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you're expecting me to denounce her just because she said that, I'm sorry to disappoint. I doubt there's anyone who would do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうね。そんな人間がいたら最低ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Right? If a person like that existed, they'd be trash, wouldn't you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Right? If a person like that existed, they'd be trash, wouldn't you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の返事を聞いた女の子は、葉留佳さんに視線を戻しさらりと毒を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon hearing my reply, the girl turned back to Haruka-san, her smile dripping venom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon hearing my reply, the girl turned back to Haruka-san, her smile dripping venom.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お友達を最低な有様に陥れたいのね、あなたは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So you were trying to bait your dear friend into becoming that kind of trash, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So you were trying to bait your dear friend into becoming that kind of trash, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「最低ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You really are the worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You really are the worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは唇を噛みしめて俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san bit her lip and lowered her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san bit her lip and lowered her head.

MESSAGE.JP: ――僕の返事も見越した上で、最初の会話を振った女の子は葉留佳さんに駄目押しの一言を放つ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――It was like she had already predicted what I would say, and she used it to set up her attack on Haruka-san, which she repeated again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――It was like she had already predicted what I would say, and she used it to set up her attack on Haruka-san, which she repeated again.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「最低」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは身を翻した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san fled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san fled.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 階段を下りていく葉留佳さんを追おうとした僕を女の子が呼び止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I descended the stairs and was about to chase after Haruka-san when the girl called out to stop me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I descended the stairs and was about to chase after Haruka-san when the girl called out to stop me.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「大丈夫よ。もうずっと言われ慣れてるから、三枝葉留佳は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't worry. Haruka Saigusa is used to this kind of thing by now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't worry. Haruka Saigusa is used to this kind of thing by now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういう問題じゃないよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not the problem!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not the problem!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だって、厄介者（トラブルメーカー）だもの。でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Oh come on. She's nothing but a troublemaker, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Oh come on. She's nothing but a troublemaker, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は階段を下りるため足を踏み出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I started to take off again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started to take off again.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「待ちなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Wait.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「名乗っておくわ。二木佳奈多。宜しくね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I haven't given you my name. Kanata Futaki. It's a pleasure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I haven't given you my name. Kanata Futaki. It's a pleasure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…よろしくする時は来ないと思うけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I can't think of anything about this situation that is pleasurable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I can't think of anything about this situation that is pleasurable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 階段を下り始めた僕の頭上から、声が降ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice trailed after me as I left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice trailed after me as I left.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「学園の綱紀粛正にご協力を、という意味よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝A pleasure stamping out the filth in this school, I meant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝A pleasure stamping out the filth in this school, I meant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は当然、答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I obviously didn't have anything to say to that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I obviously didn't have anything to say to that.

MESSAGE.JP: 階段を下り始めた僕の頭上から、声が降ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice trailed after me as I left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice trailed after me as I left.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…部屋では、クドにもそういう態度なわけ？　二木さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you like that with Kud in your room too, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you like that with Kud in your room too, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は彼女を見ながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked while looking at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked while looking at her.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたには関係ないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドがそれを聞いたらなんて言うかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder what Kud would say if she heard that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder what Kud would say if she heard that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…それも、あなたには関係ないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...That also has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...That also has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「関係ないって…そんな言い方ひどいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's a bit harsh, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's a bit harsh, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは何も答えず去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san left without responding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san left without responding.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんをその後探したけれど、見つけられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked for Haruka-san after that, but couldn't find her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked for Haruka-san after that, but couldn't find her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（寮に帰ったのかな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder if she returned to the dorm...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder if she returned to the dorm...)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はしょうがなく自分の部屋に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave up and went back to my own room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave up and went back to my own room.

MESSAGE.JP: 雰囲気が違う葉留佳さん、それに二木さんと出会った翌日。
MESSAGE.EN: The following day after I'd run into Haruka-san and Futaki-san, both of whom had been acting weird.
MESSAGE.Translation: The following day after I'd run into Haruka-san and Futaki-san, both of whom had been acting weird.

MESSAGE.JP: ＨＲが終わって今日の授業は全て終了。
MESSAGE.EN: With homeroom over, today's classes were finished.
MESSAGE.Translation: With homeroom over, today's classes were finished.

MESSAGE.JP: ざわつく教室を見渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: I scanned the noisy classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I scanned the noisy classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうした、理樹？　きょろきょろしてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up, Riki? You're acting all antsy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up, Riki? You're acting all antsy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はルーズリーフを鞄にしまう手を止めて考え込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I started to push my binder into my bag but then paused, deep in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started to push my binder into my bag but then paused, deep in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ん。葉留佳さん、今日来なかったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san, she wasn't here today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san, she wasn't here today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朝の挨拶メールも送ったのに、反応がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had texted her in the morning, but there'd been no response.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had texted her in the morning, but there'd been no response.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そういえばそうだな。やけに静かだと思ったらそのせいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now that you mention it. I guess that's why it was so peaceful today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now that you mention it. I guess that's why it was so peaceful today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Humph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Humph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すた、と恭介が降りてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke descended slickly from the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke descended slickly from the window.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、葉留佳さんが今日来なかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, nothing, I just pointed out that Haruka-san didn't come here today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, nothing, I just pointed out that Haruka-san didn't come here today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「たまにはそういう日もあるんじゃないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, that's bound to happen occasionally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, that's bound to happen occasionally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「別のクラスなんだし、あいつだっていつも来ているわけにもいかないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She's in a different class after all, it's actually more normal for her to not show up here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She's in a different class after all, it's actually more normal for her to not show up here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, yes, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, yes, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昨日の一件があるからなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: It might have had something to do with that thing yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might have had something to do with that thing yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「気になるなら行ってみればいいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you're worried, why not go and check for yourself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you're worried, why not go and check for yourself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　それはそうだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, that's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, that's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わざわざ三枝に会いにいくのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're gonna go to see Saigusa on purpose?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're gonna go to see Saigusa on purpose?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「トラブルに巻き込まれにいくようなもんじゃねーか。物好きだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're gonna get caught up in whatever trouble she's brewing. Curiosity and cats and all that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're gonna get caught up in whatever trouble she's brewing. Curiosity and cats and all that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…気になるなら探してみるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...If you're worried, it'd be better to go check.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...If you're worried, it'd be better to go check.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…わかった。そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right... got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right... got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介の言うとおりだ。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're right, Kyousuke. Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're right, Kyousuke. Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は席を立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood from my seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood from my seat.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん、どうした、授業が終わってこれからがフィーバーって時に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm, what's going down, class is over and it's time to party?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm, what's going down, class is over and it's time to party?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾と鉢合わせになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo came up to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo came up to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ちょっと気になることがあって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there was just something I wanted to check out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there was just something I wanted to check out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「許してやれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Pardon him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Pardon him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry.❞
