MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「仕方ないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, whatever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, whatever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがと、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「本気で行くのか、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you seriously gonna go, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you seriously gonna go, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、まぁね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「やれやれだぜ。しょうがないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I dunno what's gotten into you. Well, whatever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I dunno what's gotten into you. Well, whatever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがと、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は教室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、葉留佳さんを探しに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: Right, time to look for Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right, time to look for Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 念のため、携帯をコールしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: Just to make sure, I tried calling her cell.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just to make sure, I tried calling her cell.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…出ない…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Nothing...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Nothing...)

MESSAGE.JP: 電源を切っているらしい。直接捕まえなければならないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like the power is off. I'll have to take the direct approach.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like the power is off. I'll have to take the direct approach.

MESSAGE.JP: …どこへ行けば会えるだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Where should I meet up with her?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Where should I meet up with her?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…そういえば、会いにいこう、なんて考えたことなかったな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Come to think of it, I've never thought of actually going to meet up with her before...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Come to think of it, I've never thought of actually going to meet up with her before...)

MESSAGE.JP: いつも葉留佳さんのほうから来るから。
MESSAGE.EN: It's always been Haruka-san that runs into me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's always been Haruka-san that runs into me.

MESSAGE.JP: いざ、葉留佳さんに会おうとしたときにどこへ行けばいいか僕にはわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: So, when I tried to think of places I could go to find Haruka-san, I drew a blank.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, when I tried to think of places I could go to find Haruka-san, I drew a blank.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（よく考えたら…僕は葉留佳さんのことを何も知らないんだな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Thinking like this... I really don't know anything about Haruka-san, do I...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Thinking like this... I really don't know anything about Haruka-san, do I...)

MESSAGE.JP: クラスはどこだっただろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Which class was she in again?
MESSAGE.Translation: Which class was she in again?

MESSAGE.JP: いつもはぐらかされている気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I got the feeling she often skipped.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got the feeling she often skipped.

MESSAGE.JP: 職員室にある名簿を見ればいいのだろうが『三枝さんはどのクラスですか？』と聞くのも恥ずかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: The student list in the faculty office would have her listing, but going there and asking ❛Which class is Saigusa-san in?❜ would be too embarrassing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The student list in the faculty office would have her listing, but going there and asking ❛Which class is Saigusa-san in?❜ would be too embarrassing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（同学年だから、順繰りに訊いていけばいいかな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(She's in the same year, so if I just ask in the classes around here, it should work out.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(She's in the same year, so if I just ask in the classes around here, it should work out.)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は廊下を歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked down the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked down the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「このクラスじゃないんだ？　ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's not in this class? Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's not in this class? Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は教室に残っていた男子にお礼をいってドアを閉めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I thanked one of the guys that was still in the classroom and shut the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thanked one of the guys that was still in the classroom and shut the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ここでもない、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So, not here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So, not here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 校舎の真ん中あたりまで来て僕は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I muttered this to myself as I wandered around near the center of the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I muttered this to myself as I wandered around near the center of the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はひょっとしたら、何かまずいことに足を踏み込みかけているのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I could be rushing into something downright messy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could be rushing into something downright messy.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんにとって大事な『なにか』に。
MESSAGE.EN: Something very important to Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something very important to Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: このまま探し続けていいのかな？
MESSAGE.EN: Should I really keep searching for her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I really keep searching for her?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昨日のことも気になるし、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just can't get yesterday out of my head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just can't get yesterday out of my head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I shook my head to clear my thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook my head to clear my thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員長に言われたことを真に受けて、僕に近づかないようにしているのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: If she'd taken what the head prefect had said to heart, Haruka-san might be trying to avoid me.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she'd taken what the head prefect had said to heart, Haruka-san might be trying to avoid me.

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、そんなの気にしない、と僕は葉留佳さんに伝えてあげるべきだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If that was the case, I had to tell her that she should ignore the things Futaki-san had said.
MESSAGE.Translation: If that was the case, I had to tell her that she should ignore the things Futaki-san had said.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…無理に探すこともないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, I guess I don't need to find her that badly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, I guess I don't need to find her that badly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: メールだけ送っておいて、また教室に来たときに話してみよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should just send her a text and talk to her when she appears in our class again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should just send her a text and talk to her when she appears in our class again...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は携帯を取りだして葉留佳さんにメールを送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled out my cell-phone and started to text Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled out my cell-phone and started to text Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 途中でクドとばったり会った。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way, I ran into Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way, I ran into Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はろーです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haro- desu, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haro- desu, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「珍しいですね、こんな端まで来るなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's rare for you to come to this part of the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's rare for you to come to this part of the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ハロー、クド。クドだって同じじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haro-, Kud. Isn't the same true for you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haro-, Kud. Isn't the same true for you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうでもないですよ、ルームメイトさんがいますからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's normal for me, since my roommate is here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's normal for me, since my roommate is here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁ、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さっきまでバックとアビトゥアの論述問題を語り合ってきましたー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Just now we were going over some questions for the Bakku (Baccalaureate) and Abitoua (Abitur).❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Just now we were going over some questions for the Bakku (Baccalaureate) and Abitoua (Abitur).❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽん、と手を叩いたクドはとても楽しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud clapped her hands, looking like she had thoroughly enjoyed herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud clapped her hands, looking like she had thoroughly enjoyed herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「『空はどうして青いか』を証明する、とか『周期円を使った天動説の幾何学的説明』とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Stuff like ❛Give proof as to why the sky is blue❜ or ❛Give geometrical proof for the Ptolemaic theory of geocentricity.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Stuff like ❛Give proof as to why the sky is blue❜ or ❛Give geometrical proof for the Ptolemaic theory of geocentricity.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ、わくわくしてきましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu, it was so exciting!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu, it was so exciting!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I... is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I... is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんだか、クドが一方的に語っているだけ、という状況が目に浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Somehow, I could picture her talking on and on without pausing to give her roommate time to speak.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Somehow, I could picture her talking on and on without pausing to give her roommate time to speak.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、すみません、リキ。ご用事の途中なんですよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, sorry, Riki. Were you in the middle of something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, sorry, Riki. Were you in the middle of something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ごめんなさいです、お引き留めして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please pardon me, I didn't mean to interrupt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please pardon me, I didn't mean to interrupt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺこん、とクドは頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed politely.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed politely.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「じゃ、リキ、失礼します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well, Riki, excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well, Riki, excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「しーゆー、ばいばいー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Shi- yu-, baibai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Shi- yu-, baibai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、バイバイ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, baibai, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, baibai, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はクドを見送って再び歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: After I saw Kud off, I started walking again.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I saw Kud off, I started walking again.

MESSAGE.JP: 途中で小毬さんに出会った。
MESSAGE.EN: Along the way I ran into Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Along the way I ran into Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、理樹君こんにちわ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh, hi Riki-kun～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh, hi Riki-kun～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、小毬さん。こんなところでどうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, Komari-san. What are you doing here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, Komari-san. What are you doing here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ちょっとね、呼び出しがあったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, I was called for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, I was called for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「呼び出し？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Called for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Called for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「怒られるのかと思ってびくびくしてたんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I was scared I'd be shouted at.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I was scared I'd be shouted at.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「落とし物、拾ってくれたんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But turns out it was to pick up something I'd lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But turns out it was to pick up something I'd lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふぅ、びっくりしたよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fuu, I was really nervous～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuu, I was really nervous～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 連絡掲示板に自分の名前が書いてあったそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems someone had posted her name on the bulletin board.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems someone had posted her name on the bulletin board.

MESSAGE.JP: 『落とし物の持ち主は取りに来てください』
MESSAGE.EN: [Would the owner please come retrieve their property.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Would the owner please come retrieve their property.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちなみに、何を落としたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you lose?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you lose?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えへへ。これだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Tee hee, this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Tee hee, this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「『初心者が一から学べるシフォンケーキの作り方』？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝❛How to Make a Chiffon Cake for Beginners❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝❛How to Make a Chiffon Cake for Beginners❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はるちゃんに貸そうと思ってた本なんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I was going to lend it to Haru-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I was going to lend it to Haru-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「どこかに落としちゃったみたいで探してたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But I dropped it somewhere and was looking for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But I dropped it somewhere and was looking for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「見つかってよかったね、小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm glad you found it, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm glad you found it, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、拾ってくれたひとには感謝しないといけないねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah, I really need to thank the person who found it for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, I really need to thank the person who found it for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私も、はるちゃんも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Haru-chan will have to, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Haru-chan will have to, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ！　約束の途中だったんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah! I was in the middle of something!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah! I was in the middle of something!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「またね、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝See you later, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝See you later, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、またね、小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, see you later, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, see you later, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「急ぐよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I've got hurry～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I've got hurry～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とことこと歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She trotted off.
MESSAGE.Translation: She trotted off.

MESSAGE.JP: 口ではそういうけど、さっぱり急げていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite saying so, she wasn't hurrying much.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite saying so, she wasn't hurrying much.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕も行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I headed out too.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I headed out too.

MESSAGE.JP: 校舎の端っこに来た。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached the very end of the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached the very end of the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: ここが最後だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the last one.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the last one.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、すみません――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, excuse me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, excuse me...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は思わず数歩後ずさってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Without thinking, I took a few steps back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without thinking, I took a few steps back.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何か、用？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Did you need something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Did you need something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっと、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 出てきたのは風紀委員長――つまり、二木佳奈多と名乗った少女だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The one who appeared was none other but the head prefect―― In other words, the girl named Kanata Futaki.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one who appeared was none other but the head prefect―― In other words, the girl named Kanata Futaki.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「珍しいわね、こんなところまで。何の用かしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How rare to see you around here. What do you need?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How rare to see you around here. What do you need?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相手は無表情のままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was completely expressionless.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was completely expressionless.

MESSAGE.JP: 友好的でも非友好的でもない。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither friendly nor unfriendly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither friendly nor unfriendly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひとつ訊きたいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just had something to ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just had something to ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何かしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And what is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And what is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さんって、ここのクラス？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is Haruka-san in this class?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is Haruka-san in this class?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉を聞いて二木さんは唇を少し歪めた。
MESSAGE.EN: When she heard my question, Futaki-san quirked her lips a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she heard my question, Futaki-san quirked her lips a little.

MESSAGE.JP: その表情を見て僕は訊ねなければ良かった、と後悔した。
MESSAGE.EN: When I saw that expression, I instantly regretted having asked her.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I saw that expression, I instantly regretted having asked her.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたも物好きね、直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're a curious one, Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're a curious one, Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…よく言われるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I hear that a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I hear that a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「止めなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんにどうこう言われる筋合いはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't really have the right to order around a fellow student, Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't really have the right to order around a fellow student, Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が誰と付き合うかは僕が決める」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who I want to see is up to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who I want to see is up to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『付き合う』？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛See❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛See❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは呆れたように言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san said it with a mockery of shock.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san said it with a mockery of shock.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いや、そういう意味じゃなくって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, no, I didn't mean it like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, no, I didn't mean it like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そういう意味じゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You didn't mean it like what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You didn't mean it like what?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あの子の友達なだけなの？　あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're just friends, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're just friends, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「直ぐに答えられない、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Oh, can't answer right away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Oh, can't answer right away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは少し考え込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san seemed to get lost in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san seemed to get lost in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…それなら問題ないか。そうでもないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I wonder if that's a problem or not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I wonder if that's a problem or not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、そんなことはどうでもいいから、葉留佳さんはこのクラスかって訊きたいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, I don't really care about any of that. I'm asking if Haruka-san is in this class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I don't really care about any of that. I'm asking if Haruka-san is in this class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あっさり答えが得られた。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave me a simple reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave me a simple reply.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「知らなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You didn't know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You didn't know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、まぁね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I didn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I didn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんに言われると微妙に悔しいけれど事実だからしょうがない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was frustrating hearing Futaki-san say it, but it was true so I couldn't deny it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was frustrating hearing Futaki-san say it, but it was true so I couldn't deny it.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でも、三枝葉留佳は今はいないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But, Haruka Saigusa is not here right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But, Haruka Saigusa is not here right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どこかで遊んでるんだと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She's probably off playing around somewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She's probably off playing around somewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鞄もないし、と二木さんは付け加えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san added that not even Haruka-san's bag was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san added that not even Haruka-san's bag was there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。じゃあしょうがないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. Well then, I guess that's that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. Well then, I guess that's that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんのクラスがわかっただけでもよしとしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I supposed I'd have to leave it at just finding out Haruka-san's class.
MESSAGE.Translation: I supposed I'd have to leave it at just finding out Haruka-san's class.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が気にしていないことはメールで送って、また明日話してあげればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: It would be better to not worry about it now; send her a text, and talk to her tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would be better to not worry about it now; send her a text, and talk to her tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は二木さんに（一応）礼を言って寮に戻ろうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stiffly thanked Futaki-san for her time and returned to the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stiffly thanked Futaki-san for her time and returned to the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「訊かないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Aren't you going to ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Aren't you going to ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に、背後から声が掛けられた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly I heard her voice from behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly I heard her voice from behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何を？　何を訊けっていうの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? What am I supposed to ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? What am I supposed to ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「三枝葉留佳が、あなたに自分のクラスを隠していたわけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't you want to know why Haruka Saigusa didn't tell you what class she's in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't you want to know why Haruka Saigusa didn't tell you what class she's in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…何が言いたいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What are you trying to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What are you trying to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「隠していたんじゃないよ。多分言う必要がなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She wasn't hiding it or anything. There was just never a reason to mention it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She wasn't hiding it or anything. There was just never a reason to mention it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何故？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なぜ…って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why... not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why... not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「訊かれなかったから答えなかった、で納得できるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're going to use the excuse that she didn't tell you because you didn't ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're going to use the excuse that she didn't tell you because you didn't ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何か不都合なことがあったから、とは考えないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Didn't you think there was some kind of reason?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Didn't you think there was some kind of reason?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…何が言いたいのさ？　言いたいことがあったらはっきり言ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Could you get to the point? If you want to say something, spit it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Could you get to the point? If you want to say something, spit it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お人好しね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What a simpleton.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What a simpleton.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは肩をすくめた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san shrugged.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san shrugged.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「隠し事をする人間なんてロクなもんじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Hiding things from others isn't something good folks do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Hiding things from others isn't something good folks do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰だって、秘密のひとつやふたつ、あるよ。二木さんだってあるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Everyone has one or two secrets. Don't you, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Everyone has one or two secrets. Don't you, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クラスがどこか、なんて僕は問題にしないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't make a big deal out of what class someone is in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't make a big deal out of what class someone is in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは鼻で笑っただけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san gave a derisive laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san gave a derisive laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は会話は終わった、と判断して歩き始める。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided the conversation was over and started to walk away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided the conversation was over and started to walk away.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「この教室に来ても無駄よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Coming back here again will be pointless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Coming back here again will be pointless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いつも居ないからね。三枝葉留佳の居場所じゃないもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She's never here, after all. This isn't a place for Haruka Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She's never here, after all. This isn't a place for Haruka Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は二木さんに返事をせず、そのまま歩き続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't respond to Futaki-san, and instead continued walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't respond to Futaki-san, and instead continued walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「感じが悪いな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Man, she gets on my nerves...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Man, she gets on my nerves...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、葉留佳さんにメールを送信する。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, for now I'll just text Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, for now I'll just text Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 考えた末に、二木委員長のことなんか気にしてないよ、と送ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to send a note saying: [Don't worry about what Chief Futaki said.]
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to send a note saying: [Don't worry about what Chief Futaki said.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「送信終了、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And, sent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And, sent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は寮へ戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned to the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned to the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み、紙パックジュースを買いに来た僕は意外な組み合わせを見かけた。
MESSAGE.EN: During lunch break I was on my way to buy some juice when I saw a very odd pairing.
MESSAGE.Translation: During lunch break I was on my way to buy some juice when I saw a very odd pairing.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よっ…はっ…とぉっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yo... Ha... To-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yo... Ha... To-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドだ。中庭のベンチの前で何をしているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Kud. She was doing something in front of one of the courtyard benches.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Kud. She was doing something in front of one of the courtyard benches.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「佳奈多さんの影、踏ーんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kanata-san, I've got your shadow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kanata-san, I've got your shadow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…クドリャフカ、あなた影踏み好きね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Kudryavka, you really like this game, don't you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Kudryavka, you really like this game, don't you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それはもうっ。影踏みまにあですよ、私はっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You could say that, I'm a shadow-tag maniac.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You could say that, I'm a shadow-tag maniac.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「かーげーぬーいーのじゅーつー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sha-dow Sti-tch Ju-tsu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sha-dow Sti-tch Ju-tsu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そんなことしてるからアホな子に見えるのよ、クドリャフカ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Don't you think you look a little silly doing that, Kudryavka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Don't you think you look a little silly doing that, Kudryavka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あはは。すみませんです…わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ahaha. Sorry about that... wafu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ahaha. Sorry about that... wafu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いいけどね、別に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Well, it's fine by me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Well, it's fine by me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…夕方の影踏みが一番好きなんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Though I like playing shadow-tag best in the evening.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Though I like playing shadow-tag best in the evening.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あぁ、なるほどね、背が低いひとは夕方、影の背が高くなるものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Aah, I see. In the evening even short people have tall shadows, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Aah, I see. In the evening even short people have tall shadows, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふー、どうしてわかるんですかーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝W, wafuu, how did you guess it was because of that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝W, wafuu, how did you guess it was because of that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でも…影踏みが楽しいっていうのはわかる気もするわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But... I think I can see the fun in playing shadow-tag.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But... I think I can see the fun in playing shadow-tag.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「影踏みってなんだか一人でする遊びってイメージがあるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Though it seems like the kind of game one would play alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Though it seems like the kind of game one would play alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「佳奈多さんも『そう』でしたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kanata-san, were you like that as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kanata-san, were you like that as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…さぁ？　どうかしらね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Me? Who knows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Me? Who knows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんがちらりとこちらを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san glanced in my direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san glanced in my direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は慌てて視線を逸らす。
MESSAGE.EN: Caught by surprise, I averted my gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Caught by surprise, I averted my gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じゃ行くわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Well, I'm off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Well, I'm off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい。ストレルカによろしくです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay. Please take care of Strelka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay. Please take care of Strelka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはベンチから立ち上がると中庭を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san stood up from the bench and left the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san stood up from the bench and left the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ。どうしましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki. What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki. What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドはあのひととよく話すの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you often hang out with that person?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you often hang out with that person?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですけど…佳奈多さんがどうかしましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I do... Is something the matter with Kanata-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I do... Is something the matter with Kanata-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「見た目は話しかけづらいですけど、いいひとですよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She looks like a hard person to approach, but she's really nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She looks like a hard person to approach, but she's really nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…佳奈多さんとお話したいんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Did you have something you wanted to talk with Kanata-san about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Did you have something you wanted to talk with Kanata-san about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんでもないよ。少し気になっただけだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's nothing. I was just curious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's nothing. I was just curious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…はい？　それならいいですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Oh? I guess that's alright then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Oh? I guess that's alright then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は不思議そうな顔をしているクドと別れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I parted with the slightly confused looking Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I parted with the slightly confused looking Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み、紙パックジュースを買いに来た僕は、珍しい組み合わせを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: During lunch break, on my way to buy a juice box I spotted a strange pair.
MESSAGE.Translation: During lunch break, on my way to buy a juice box I spotted a strange pair.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…飽きないのか？　そんなことばかりして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Don't you get tired of doing that all the time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Don't you get tired of doing that all the time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭で来ヶ谷さんが話している相手は…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san was talking to someone in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san was talking to someone in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それが役割ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's my duty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's my duty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そうか。たまには忘れて…これは前も言ったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I see. Remind me, have I said this before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I see. Remind me, have I said this before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうですね。聞くのは何回目でしたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Yes you have. I've lost count at how many times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Yes you have. I've lost count at how many times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「忘れてしまったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It seems to have slipped my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It seems to have slipped my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「来ヶ谷さんらしくありませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's not like you, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's not like you, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうでもいいことは忘れてしまうものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I tend to forget inconsequential things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I tend to forget inconsequential things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だとしたら悲しいことですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's quite sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's quite sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたにとって私はどうでもいい、ということなのだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm inconsequential to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm inconsequential to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、どうでもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, inconsequential.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, inconsequential.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、そんな傷ついたという顔をしなくてもいいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hahaha, you don't need to make such a pained expression.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hahaha, you don't need to make such a pained expression.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どうでもいい、と言われて傷つかない人がいますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Wouldn't anyone be hurt if they were told they don't matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Wouldn't anyone be hurt if they were told they don't matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それをしているのはキミだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't it you that's doing it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't it you that's doing it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そんなのは、わかってます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「わかっているのに止められない。困ったものだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You know and you still won't stop? That's troubling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You know and you still won't stop? That's troubling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ええ、困ったものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Indeed it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Indeed it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それが願いなのだから止められるわけもないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But unfortunately, I can't stop just because I want to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But unfortunately, I can't stop just because I want to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんがちらりとこちらを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san glanced in my direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san glanced in my direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は慌てて視線を逸らす。
MESSAGE.EN: Caught by surprise, I averted my gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Caught by surprise, I averted my gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「では失礼します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Now if you'll excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Now if you'll excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ごみ拾いは裏庭もあるので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's trash to be picked up in the backyard as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's trash to be picked up in the backyard as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは中庭から出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san left the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san left the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年か。どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man. What's wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man. What's wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、二木さんと話しているのが見えたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing, I just saw you talking to Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing, I just saw you talking to Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんとはよく話すの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you talk to her often?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you talk to her often?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そんなによく話すわけじゃないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Not particularly often.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Not particularly often.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「彼女が私を意識して話しかけてくるだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝She saw me and started a conversation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝She saw me and started a conversation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「二木女史と話をしたいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Do you wish to talk with Miss Futaki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Do you wish to talk with Miss Futaki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうわけじゃないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…ふむ。そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Fumu. I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Fumu. I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは考え込むと、頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She thought for a bit and then nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thought for a bit and then nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ではな、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝See you, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝See you, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は来ヶ谷さんと別れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I parted ways with Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I parted ways with Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下で足早に歩く葉留佳さんを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was walking hurriedly down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was walking hurriedly down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて呼びかけて追いつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Flustered by her speed, I called out to her and gave chase.
MESSAGE.Translation: Flustered by her speed, I called out to her and gave chase.

MESSAGE.JP: 足を止めた葉留佳さんは不機嫌そうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stopped, looking somehow sullen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stopped, looking somehow sullen.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何か、用？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Did you need something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Did you need something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…えっと…」
僕の思考は一瞬空転した。
MESSAGE.EN: My thought processes stalled for a second.
MESSAGE.Translation: My thought processes stalled for a second.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。同じ口調、同じ台詞で言われたことがあったような。
MESSAGE.EN: What was that? It felt like the exact same tone of voice I had heard earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was that? It felt like the exact same tone of voice I had heard earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「と、特に用はないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I didn't really need anything specific.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I didn't really need anything specific.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そっか。じゃ、ばいばい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh. Then, bye bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh. Then, bye bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「待って、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩き出そうとする葉留佳さんの腕を僕は掴んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed Haruka-san's arm as she made to walk away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed Haruka-san's arm as she made to walk away.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…痛いよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...That hurts, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...That hurts, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は慌てて手を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly released her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly released her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あのさ、メール読んでくれた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝U, um, did you read the text I sent you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝U, um, did you read the text I sent you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「メール？　…あぁ…うん、読んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Text? ...Oh, that, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Text? ...Oh, that, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「読んだよ、ちゃんと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I read it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I read it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。僕は、気にしてないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh. Well, I'm really not bothered by that stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh. Well, I'm really not bothered by that stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本当だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…直接、言いたかったんだ。葉留佳さんに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I just wanted to tell that to you in person, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I just wanted to tell that to you in person, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 素っ気ない返事。
MESSAGE.EN: Her reply was blunt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her reply was blunt.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それだけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Was that all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Was that all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは考え込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san pondered for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san pondered for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして…私なんか気にしてくれるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why... do you even care about me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why... do you even care about me?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ううん。なんでもない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Nothing. Never mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Nothing. Never mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんのクラスって一番端なんだね。日当たり良さそうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your classroom is all the way at the back of the school, right? I bet you get nice sun in there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your classroom is all the way at the back of the school, right? I bet you get nice sun in there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の台詞に葉留佳さんはきょとん、とした。
MESSAGE.EN: In response, Haruka-san directed a puzzled expression at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: In response, Haruka-san directed a puzzled expression at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え…あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh... Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh... Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そ、そうなんだよ。うん、そうなの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Y, yeah. You're right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Y, yeah. You're right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とうとうバレちゃったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Was finally found out, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Was finally found out, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうやって、見つけたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How did you find it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How did you find it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…名簿で見たんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It was on the class register.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It was on the class register.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「職員室で？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝In the faculty office?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝In the faculty office?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「先生教えちゃったのかー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You asked a teacher, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You asked a teacher, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しょうがないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess that's that, then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess that's that, then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、勝手に調べちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I didn't mean to pry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I didn't mean to pry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「別にいいよ。調べようと思えばわかっちゃうモノだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's fine. It's something you can find out easily enough, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's fine. It's something you can find out easily enough, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも…しいなぁ……らないはずなんだけどな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But... odd... shouldn't have...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But... odd... shouldn't have...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはぼそぼそと呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san murmured something under her breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san murmured something under her breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　何か言った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm? What was that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm? What was that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とにかく、僕は、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So anyway, I'm, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So anyway, I'm, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…言いたかったんだ。さっきも言ったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I just wanted to tell you that. I mean, I said it before, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I just wanted to tell you that. I mean, I said it before, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「たまには、僕のほうから葉留佳さんに会いに行きたくなったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought I'd like to come visit you in your class for a change, sometimes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought I'd like to come visit you in your class for a change, sometimes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわ…僕はなんてことを口走ってるんだっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Uwah... I blurted out something strange without meaning to.
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwah... I blurted out something strange without meaning to.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは目を丸くしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was popeyed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was popeyed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う…ぁ…そ、そう、なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uh... ah... Is, is that right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uh... ah... Is, is that right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…そうなんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... that's right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... that's right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猛烈に僕は恥ずかしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was feeling incredibly embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was feeling incredibly embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ありがと、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Thanks, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Thanks, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どう、いたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, you're welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, you're welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「用事あるからそろそろ行くね…あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I've got stuff to do, so I should run... ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I've got stuff to do, so I should run... ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは歩き出そうとして、振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked back over her shoulder as she turned to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked back over her shoulder as she turned to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クラスのこと、教えなくてごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry for not telling you about my class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry for not telling you about my class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「探してくれてたんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You were searching for it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You were searching for it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつも教室にはいないから。授業中はいるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm usually not there. Well, only during class really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm usually not there. Well, only during class really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それ以外は、絶対にいないから。いてもイイコト何一つないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But besides that, I never stick around there. Nothing good would come of sticking around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But besides that, I never stick around there. Nothing good would come of sticking around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「用事あったら、メール欲しい。行けたら行くから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you need something, I'd rather you texted me. Then if I can come, I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you need something, I'd rather you texted me. Then if I can come, I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ばいばい、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩き去る葉留佳さんを僕は見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I watched as Haruka-san walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I watched as Haruka-san walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんに、教室で教えて貰ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san told me when I asked at your classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san told me when I asked at your classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは押し黙った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（う…しまった…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Uh... crap...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Uh... crap...)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私は、いつも教室にはいないから。授業中はいるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I'm usually not there. Well, only during class really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I'm usually not there. Well, only during class really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それ以外は、絶対にいないから。いてもイイコト何一つないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But besides that, I never stick around there. Nothing good would come of sticking around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But besides that, I never stick around there. Nothing good would come of sticking around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「用事あったら、メール欲しい。行けたら行くから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you need something, I'd rather you texted me. Then if I can come, I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you need something, I'd rather you texted me. Then if I can come, I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あと、クラスの人に私のこと訊かないでほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Also, I'd like you not to ask the people in class about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Also, I'd like you not to ask the people in class about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほら、私、浮いてる子だからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You see, I'm an outcast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You see, I'm an outcast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「浮いてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝An outcast?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝An outcast?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだよ。教室は私の居場所じゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. The classroom isn't where I belong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. The classroom isn't where I belong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そこにいていい、なんて誰もいってくれないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's no one who'd say they want me there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's no one who'd say they want me there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「話しかけてさえ、くれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They don't even talk to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They don't even talk to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いないのも、同じ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's the same as if I'm not there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's the same as if I'm not there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「消しゴムをもったらね、みんな言うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Everyone's always saying ❛If we had a big enough eraser...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Everyone's always saying ❛If we had a big enough eraser...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おまえなんか要らない、削除しろ、ってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛We'd erase unnecessary people like you.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛We'd erase unnecessary people like you.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは目を伏せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san cast her eyes down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san cast her eyes down.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ううん、最初から『ここ』に私の居場所なんかない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...No, from the first day there wasn't any place for me ❛here.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...No, from the first day there wasn't any place for me ❛here.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もちろんね、理樹くんのクラスも、私の居場所じゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Of course Riki-kun's class isn't where I belong either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Of course Riki-kun's class isn't where I belong either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わかっては、いるんだ…そんなこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みんなは優しいから。そんなこと言わない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Everyone's nice, so they don't say it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Everyone's nice, so they don't say it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…でも、私は馬鹿な子だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...But even though I'm an idiot,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...But even though I'm an idiot,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それぐらいは、わかっているつもり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I still get that much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I still get that much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「要らない子だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Unnecessary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Unnecessary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「きっと、それはもう、変わらないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That definitely won't change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That definitely won't change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げた葉留佳さんからは何の感情も読み取れなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't read Haruka-san's expression at all after she lifted her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't read Haruka-san's expression at all after she lifted her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 淡々と、ただ淡々と、言葉だけを吐いているように。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like she was just indifferently spitting out the words.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like she was just indifferently spitting out the words.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それに、ね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And plus...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And plus...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、変な噂立てられちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you'll have weird rumors start following you around...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you'll have weird rumors start following you around...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんな風に理樹くんに迷惑かけちゃうのいやだから、直接連絡してほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I want you to tell me, because I'd hate to cause you any trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I want you to tell me, because I'd hate to cause you any trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「勝手なお願いだと、思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I know this is a selfish request.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I know this is a selfish request.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん、ばいばい、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah, bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah, bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩き去る葉留佳さんを僕は見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I watched as Haruka-san walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I watched as Haruka-san walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: After school.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school.

MESSAGE.JP: ゴミ捨て場にゴミ袋を放り投げた僕は、見知った顔に出会った。
MESSAGE.EN: I was taking out the garbage bags when I spotted a familiar face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was taking out the garbage bags when I spotted a familiar face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, what's up?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが手に持っていた黒いビニール袋がコンクリートの上に落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud dropped the black plastic bag she'd been carrying onto the concrete.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud dropped the black plastic bag she'd been carrying onto the concrete.

MESSAGE.JP: 金属や陶器が擦れる嫌な音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It made an unpleasant sound, like that of ceramics and metal rubbing together.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made an unpleasant sound, like that of ceramics and metal rubbing together.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…なにか、ご用事ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Did you need me for something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Did you need me for something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「用事はないけど…どうしたの？　顔色、悪いよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, no, but what's wrong? Your face is pale.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, no, but what's wrong? Your face is pale.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえ…だいじょうぶです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No... I'm fine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No... I'm fine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あの、リキ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは何かを言いかけたけれど、首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud started to say something, but then shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud started to say something, but then shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…なんでもないです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It's nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It's nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはふらふらと去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud left, swaying a little on her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud left, swaying a little on her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたのかな、クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder what was up with Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder what was up with Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんなとこに突っ立っていられると邪魔なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You'll be in the way if you keep standing there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You'll be in the way if you keep standing there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すみません…って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry... huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry... huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 灰色の段ボール箱を抱えている二木さんがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Futaki-san, a gray cardboard box in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Futaki-san, a gray cardboard box in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「て、手伝おうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝D, do you want some help with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝D, do you want some help with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「必要ないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No need.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No need.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 申し出を即座に拒否すると、二木さんは灰色の段ボール箱をゴミ捨て場に置いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san rejected my offer without a second thought and then proceeded to set down the box in the garbage area.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san rejected my offer without a second thought and then proceeded to set down the box in the garbage area.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…やりきれないわね、何度も…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's really too much, just how many times...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's really too much, just how many times...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはしゃがみこんでごそごそやっていたが、立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: As she straightened her back, she began to mutter to herself under her breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she straightened her back, she began to mutter to herself under her breath.

MESSAGE.JP: 手には数冊の本を持っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a pile of books in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a pile of books in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 背表紙をちらりと見たら、宇宙工学概論とか航空宇宙推進工学、とかだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I glanced at their spines. The titles all had to do with aerospace engineering, propulsion, and things like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glanced at their spines. The titles all had to do with aerospace engineering, propulsion, and things like that.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（難しそうな本読んでるんだなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(She sure reads some tough books...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(She sure reads some tough books...)

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はゴミ捨て場から立ち去った。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and stepped out of the garbage area.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and stepped out of the garbage area.

MESSAGE.JP: 数歩行って振り返ると、二木さんはそのまま本をぺらぺらとめくっているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: After I had gone a few steps, I halted and looked back. Futaki-san was still in the same spot, flipping through the books.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I had gone a few steps, I halted and looked back. Futaki-san was still in the same spot, flipping through the books.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろうな、と僕は首を捻りながら教室へ戻ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: What was she doing? Tilting my head in puzzlement, I walked back toward the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was she doing? Tilting my head in puzzlement, I walked back toward the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕方の廊下。
MESSAGE.EN: That evening, in the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: That evening, in the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（今日も一日終了、と）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Another day draws to an end.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Another day draws to an end.)

MESSAGE.JP: 窓の外から部活動のざわめきが聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: Through the windows, I could hear the various clubs having their activities.
MESSAGE.Translation: Through the windows, I could hear the various clubs having their activities.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ちょっといいかしら、直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Do you have a minute, Riki Naoe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Do you have a minute, Riki Naoe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に僕を呼び止めた声。
MESSAGE.EN: A sudden voice called out to stop me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sudden voice called out to stop me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…僕を呼んだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You wanted me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You wanted me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 若干警戒しながら訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked with a little hesitation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked with a little hesitation.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「単刀直入に言うと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'll be blunt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'll be blunt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「三枝葉留佳と親しくするのは止めなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Stop acting chummy with Haruka Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Stop acting chummy with Haruka Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、どういう、意味？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What... the hell... do you mean by that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What... the hell... do you mean by that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくり言葉を区切って答える僕。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked in a slow and deliberate tone, biting off the words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked in a slow and deliberate tone, biting off the words.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭ごなしの台詞。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't hold back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't hold back.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと関わるな、という直接的過ぎる言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: She was telling me, in so many words, to stop seeing Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was telling me, in so many words, to stop seeing Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「意味も何もない。止めなさいと言ってるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no special meaning. I'm telling you to stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no special meaning. I'm telling you to stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I did not answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did not answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 答えないことで、拒否の意志を示す。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the clearest way I could express my rejection of her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the clearest way I could express my rejection of her words.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…直枝理樹、あなたには日本語が通じないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Riki Naoe, do you not understand Japanese?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Riki Naoe, do you not understand Japanese?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは腰にあてた右手をゆっくりと離すと、ひらひらと振った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san slowly lifted up her right hand and waved it in front of my face as though making sure I had all my wits about me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san slowly lifted up her right hand and waved it in front of my face as though making sure I had all my wits about me.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「理由もこの前言ってあげたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I already told you the reason behind this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I already told you the reason behind this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…覚えてないの？　処置無しね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Do you not remember? You're pretty forgetful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Do you not remember? You're pretty forgetful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それだけ言って去ろうとする二木さんを僕は呼び止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san tried to leave after saying that, but I called out to stop her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san tried to leave after saying that, but I called out to stop her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Futaki-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Futaki-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何？　質問は受け付けないわよ、直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What? I don't have time for frivolous questions, Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What? I don't have time for frivolous questions, Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ご忠告、感謝するよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I thank you, for the warning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I thank you, for the warning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がそう言うと、二木さんは鼻でふふんと笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: When I said that, Futaki-san laughed through her nose.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I said that, Futaki-san laughed through her nose.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「これっぽっちも聞く気は無いくせに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though you have no intention of listening to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though you have no intention of listening to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その通りだ。彼女に対する単なる皮肉だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was right. My gratitude was purely sarcastic.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was right. My gratitude was purely sarcastic.

MESSAGE.JP: 親しくするな、と他人から言われたからほいほい従うなんて、どうかしてる。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know of anyone who would blithely obey the order from another to stop befriending someone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know of anyone who would blithely obey the order from another to stop befriending someone else.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…でも、忠告なのは確かなんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...But, you're correct in calling it a warning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...But, you're correct in calling it a warning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「二人が傷つく前にね。ま、もっともあなただからしょうがないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I wanted to tell you before you two get hurt. But it's you, so I guess there's no helping it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I wanted to tell you before you two get hurt. But it's you, so I guess there's no helping it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さん言い捨てると今度こそ廊下の角に消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and this time disappeared around the corner of the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and this time disappeared around the corner of the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もやもやした気分を抱えながら歩く僕を呼び止めたのは――葉留佳さんの声だった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I walked along gloomily, a voice called out and made me stop―― It belonged to Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I walked along gloomily, a voice called out and made me stop―― It belonged to Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうかしたの？　怖い顔して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What's up? You're making a scary face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What's up? You're making a scary face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんな怖い顔してる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is it really that scary?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is it really that scary?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「してる、してる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, totally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, totally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「マーティもびっくりなほどヘヴィな顔してるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a face ❛heavy❜ enough to freak out Marty McFly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a face ❛heavy❜ enough to freak out Marty McFly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こーんな感じ、と葉留佳さんはほっぺたを自分で引っ張って見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san pulled on her own cheeks and made a face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san pulled on her own cheeks and made a face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぼくらの未来はヘヴィだねぇー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Our future is heavy, ain't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Our future is heavy, ain't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: わけのわからないことをへらへら笑いながら口にしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She said this while frivolously laughing at the nonsense.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said this while frivolously laughing at the nonsense.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのね、葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は言いかけて、ため息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I started to talk, then let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started to talk, then let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に――この子はわかっているのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Really―― I wondered if she already knew about the whole affair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Really―― I wondered if she already knew about the whole affair.

MESSAGE.JP: 『自分と親しくするとよくない』なんてことを言われてることを知ったらどんな顔をするのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What kind of face would she make if I told her someone had instructed me not to get near her?
MESSAGE.Translation: What kind of face would she make if I told her someone had instructed me not to get near her?

MESSAGE.JP: 大体僕はこの子に振り回されてばっかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, most of the time she was just stringing me along anyway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, most of the time she was just stringing me along anyway.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何でもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あえて素っ気なく答える。
MESSAGE.EN: My answer was rather blunt.
MESSAGE.Translation: My answer was rather blunt.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてそんなことを悩まなくちゃいけないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was I worrying so much about this?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was I worrying so much about this?

MESSAGE.JP: 少し腹立たしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was somewhat upsetting.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was somewhat upsetting.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why?

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんに言われた瞬間、僕は確かに感じたのだ、猛烈な反発心を。
MESSAGE.EN: When Futaki-san said those words, I had certainly felt my heart rebel strongly against them.
MESSAGE.Translation: When Futaki-san said those words, I had certainly felt my heart rebel strongly against them.

MESSAGE.JP: これは、なんなのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What was wrong with me?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was wrong with me?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「およ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oyo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oyo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは一瞬驚いた顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked surprised for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked surprised for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…何、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちょっと時間ある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Do you have a little time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Do you have a little time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ない、って言ったら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I said I didn't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I said I didn't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分でも思ってもいない言葉が出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I said the words without thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said the words without thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: 言ってから心のどこかがぴりぴりと痺れている気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a numbing tingle somewhere in my heart as I said it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a numbing tingle somewhere in my heart as I said it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんの邪魔はしないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't worry, I won't make trouble for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't worry, I won't make trouble for you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意外な言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words surprised me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words surprised me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が向けた意地悪な言葉に葉留佳さんは後ろ手を組みながら、小首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Without even a displeased look on her face after my unkind words, she just tilted her head with her hands joined behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without even a displeased look on her face after my unkind words, she just tilted her head with her hands joined behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「時間、ある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Do you have time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Do you have time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは真面目な顔で、僕に訊ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san asked me with a serious face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san asked me with a serious face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こっち来て」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Come this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Come this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんに招かれるまま教室へ入る。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san guided me to a classroom and I stepped in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san guided me to a classroom and I stepped in.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じ作りのはずの教室。
MESSAGE.EN: Interior-wise, it should have been the same as my own classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Interior-wise, it should have been the same as my own classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 普段使っているのとは違う部屋。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet it was different.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet it was different.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろの壁の掲示物。
MESSAGE.EN: The bulletin board in the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bulletin board in the back.

MESSAGE.JP: 机の並びや数。
MESSAGE.EN: The arrangement and number of desks.
MESSAGE.Translation: The arrangement and number of desks.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さな差異が、まるで違う場所に来たかのような感覚を誘った。
MESSAGE.EN: They were just minute differences, but they added up to create a strange feeling as though I had entered a different realm altogether.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were just minute differences, but they added up to create a strange feeling as though I had entered a different realm altogether.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、誰もいない教室ってすき」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I... like rooms where there's no one else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I... like rooms where there's no one else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それもなるたけ、どこかよそのクラスの教室がいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ideally, anywhere else than my own classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ideally, anywhere else than my own classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの呟き。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san murmured quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san murmured quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「違うトコロみたいでさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's like it becomes a different place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's like it becomes a different place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 期せずして僕が思ったことと同じことを言う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Without realizing it, Haruka-san had basically voiced my thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without realizing it, Haruka-san had basically voiced my thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…誰もいないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's surprising there's no one here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's surprising there's no one here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりかふたりは残っていてもいいだろうに。
MESSAGE.EN: Usually a student or two should still remain in the class at this hour.
MESSAGE.Translation: Usually a student or two should still remain in the class at this hour.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「部活か何かで忙しいんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Maybe they're all busy with their clubs or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Maybe they're all busy with their clubs or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ここはどのクラスだったっけ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered which class this room belonged to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered which class this room belonged to.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間割が書いてある黒板は、僕たちが普段見ている時間割とは当然違っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Needless to say, the time schedule written on the blackboard was different from the one I usually saw.
MESSAGE.Translation: Needless to say, the time schedule written on the blackboard was different from the one I usually saw.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こっちこっち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝C'mere, c'mere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝C'mere, c'mere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、教室の一番後ろの少し開けた場所に僕を誘った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san took me to the back of the classroom, where there was an open space.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san took me to the back of the classroom, where there was an open space.

MESSAGE.JP: 窓からは夕日が差し込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: The evening sun was shining in through the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: The evening sun was shining in through the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは床にぺたんと座り込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san plopped herself down on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san plopped herself down on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい、理樹くんも座って座って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Alright, you take a seat too, Riki-kun. Sit, sit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Alright, you take a seat too, Riki-kun. Sit, sit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺしぺし、と床を叩く葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san patted the floor next to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san patted the floor next to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、スカート汚れちゃうよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, won't you get your skirt dirty?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, won't you get your skirt dirty?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「気にしないから、だいじょぶ、じょぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It doesn't bother me, so no worries or hurries.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It doesn't bother me, so no worries or hurries.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういう無頓着なところ、本当に子供みたいだよな…
MESSAGE.EN: Sitting around on the floor without a care in the world, she really was like a child...
MESSAGE.Translation: Sitting around on the floor without a care in the world, she really was like a child...

MESSAGE.JP: 苦笑しながら隣に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: Smiling wryly, I sat down next to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Smiling wryly, I sat down next to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 床から窓を見上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: From the floor, I looked up at that window.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the floor, I looked up at that window.

MESSAGE.JP: オレンジ色が満ちた窓。
MESSAGE.EN: Orange colored light streamed in to fill the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Orange colored light streamed in to fill the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 視点がぐっと下がると、教室が広くなったように感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: From my lowered perspective, I discovered that the classroom really did feel larger.
MESSAGE.Translation: From my lowered perspective, I discovered that the classroom really did feel larger.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい、って、これ、何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, what's this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, what's this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「イヤホンですヨ？　見たこと無い？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's an earphone... Haven't you ever seen one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's an earphone... Haven't you ever seen one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃ、あるけど…なんで、イヤホン？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I have, but... Why an earphone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I have, but... Why an earphone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Tadaah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Tadaah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは携帯を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san brought out her cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san brought out her cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「すちゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Flip!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Flip!❞

MESSAGE.JP: スライド型の携帯は、しゃこん、と音がして数字キーが出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She slid a part of the cellphone up, revealing the keypad with a small sliding noise followed by a click.
MESSAGE.Translation: She slid a part of the cellphone up, revealing the keypad with a small sliding noise followed by a click.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いっしょに音楽きこうよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's listen to some music together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's listen to some music together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はぽかん、と口を開けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my mouth, feeling a little bewildered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my mouth, feeling a little bewildered.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「脈絡なしだよ、それっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't that sort of a non sequitur?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that sort of a non sequitur?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こらこら、大きな声を出さないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey hey, keep your voice down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey hey, keep your voice down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しぃー、と人差し指を僕の唇に当てる葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san shushed me while placing one finger against my lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san shushed me while placing one finger against my lips.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『また』風紀委員に見つかっちゃう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't want to get caught here by the prefects ❛again.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't want to get caught here by the prefects ❛again.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは人差し指を離すと、ささやいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san withdrew her finger, and murmured.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san withdrew her finger, and murmured.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そう、『また』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah, ❛again.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah, ❛again.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはイヤホンを携帯の平型コネクタに繋ぐと、片方の…長い方の…イヤホンを僕に差し出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san plugged in the pair of earphones and handed me the one with the longer cord.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san plugged in the pair of earphones and handed me the one with the longer cord.

MESSAGE.JP: イヤホンには『Ｌ』と書いてある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was an ❛L❜ marked on the earphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was an ❛L❜ marked on the earphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はようやく、葉留佳さんのしたいことが理解できた。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally I understood what Haruka-san wanted me to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally I understood what Haruka-san wanted me to do.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もうちょっと近くに来てくれないと、届かないよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Come a little closer or it won't reach, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Come a little closer or it won't reach, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はぎこちなく葉留佳さんのそばに寄った。
MESSAGE.EN: I clumsily scooted closer to Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I clumsily scooted closer to Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬だけ柑橘系の整髪料のいい匂いがする。
MESSAGE.EN: For an instant I caught a pleasant, citrusy scent wafting from her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: For an instant I caught a pleasant, citrusy scent wafting from her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: 肩を寄せ合うような形になる。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon we were shoulder-to-shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon we were shoulder-to-shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 制服越しとはいえ、女の子の体温を感じて僕はぎこちなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: Regardless of our uniforms being in the way, I felt awkward pressed against the warmth of her body.
MESSAGE.Translation: Regardless of our uniforms being in the way, I felt awkward pressed against the warmth of her body.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「では、レッツプレイ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well then, let's play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well then, let's play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: イヤホンからは音程外れの珍妙なメロディが流れた。
MESSAGE.EN: A slightly strange and asynchronous melody began to play through the earphones.
MESSAGE.Translation: A slightly strange and asynchronous melody began to play through the earphones.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、この曲、変だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, this song, it's kinda weird...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, this song, it's kinda weird...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめん。これは違った。私の自作のやつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry. It's a little unusual. I made it myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry. It's a little unusual. I made it myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自作？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You made it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You made it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう。いつ作ったんだっけかー…ちょっと記憶があやふやかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep yep. When was that... Hmm, my memory's a little fuzzy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep yep. When was that... Hmm, my memory's a little fuzzy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな昔に作ったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You made it that long ago?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You made it that long ago?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「四月ごろかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think... in April?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think... in April?❞

MESSAGE.JP: むちゃくちゃ最近だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's no time ago at all!
MESSAGE.Translation: That's no time ago at all!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、若年性健忘症じゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, are you telling me you have some kind of teenage amnesia...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, are you telling me you have some kind of teenage amnesia...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うっわっ！　何その頭の弱いアホの子を見るような視線は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwah! Why are you looking at me like I'm some kind of dimwitted kid?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwah! Why are you looking at me like I'm some kind of dimwitted kid?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ヒドイですヨっ、ぶーぶーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're so mean, bu- bu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're so mean, bu- bu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはともかくなんて曲名？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, setting that aside, what's this song called?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, setting that aside, what's this song called?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さらっとスルーされちゃったよ…しょぼーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm being brushed aside... bo-hoo-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm being brushed aside... bo-hoo-.❞
