MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いいけどもう。曲名は『メルマックより愛を込めて』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Anyway, the song's title is ❛From Melmac With Love.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Anyway, the song's title is ❛From Melmac With Love.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は黙って葉留佳さんの携帯を奪うと『次曲→』のボタンを押した。
MESSAGE.EN: I silently swiped Haruka-san's cellphone and punched the ❛Next Song❜ button.
MESSAGE.Translation: I silently swiped Haruka-san's cellphone and punched the ❛Next Song❜ button.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あぁっ！　この次のサビが力作なのにー。ヒドイですヨ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Aaa! We were just about to get to the best part, and I spent so much time on it too... You're so mean, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Aaa! We were just about to get to the best part, and I spent so much time on it too... You're so mean, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんを無視して、僕はボタンを次々押す。
MESSAGE.EN: I ignored Haruka-san's protests and continued to hit the next button.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ignored Haruka-san's protests and continued to hit the next button.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度目かのテンポのいいガールズ・ポップが流れたところで携帯を返した。
MESSAGE.EN: After a few presses, I found a girly pop song with a good tempo and finally returned the cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a few presses, I found a girly pop song with a good tempo and finally returned the cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、この歌手知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, do you know this vocalist?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, do you know this vocalist?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「名前ぐらいはね。そういえば新曲出るってテレビで見た気もするけどこれかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Only by name. I think I remember seeing it on a TV program for her new release.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Only by name. I think I remember seeing it on a TV program for her new release.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…新曲じゃないよ。もうずっとずっと、前の曲になっちゃったやつだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's not a new release. It's been around for a long, long time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's not a new release. It's been around for a long, long time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。でもいい曲だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh. Well anyway, it's a good song.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh. Well anyway, it's a good song.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私もそう思うよ。理樹くんとは趣味があうねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think so too. Looks like we have similar tastes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think so too. Looks like we have similar tastes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ワンコーラス終わる。直ぐ次の曲へ。
MESSAGE.EN: The song ended, and the next one started.
MESSAGE.Translation: The song ended, and the next one started.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで次が$K21演歌$K0？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why is the next song an $K21enka$K0?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why is the next song an $K21enka$K0?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 全然趣味があってなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was definitely not my taste.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was definitely not my taste.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「燃えるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Doesn't it just get you fired up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Doesn't it just get you fired up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、これ北の海、見に行く歌だから燃えてないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, this song's about going up north to see the sea, so no, not really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, this song's about going up north to see the sea, so no, not really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「カツオブシが効いてるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It says the Mongols were strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It says the Mongols were strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「コブシだってそれ言うなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm pretty sure it said Magnolias.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm pretty sure it said Magnolias.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 次は――『Ａ列車で行こう』だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Next was―― ❝Let's Take the A-Train.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Next was―― ❝Let's Take the A-Train.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「管楽器ってたまった唾、どうするんだろうね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't wind instruments get filled with saliva? I wonder how they deal with that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't wind instruments get filled with saliva? I wonder how they deal with that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に脈絡のない会話だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a most random conversation.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a most random conversation.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今度吹奏楽部へ行って訊いてみたら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wanna go to the wind instrument club and ask sometime?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wanna go to the wind instrument club and ask sometime?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それ面白そう。いい考えだね。明日行ってくるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That sounds fun. Nice thinking. Let's go tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That sounds fun. Nice thinking. Let's go tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと、やめ、やめて、行かないでっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, hey, wait, don't, you better not do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, hey, wait, don't, you better not do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯に表示された数値が減っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The number on the cellphone's screen was going down.
MESSAGE.Translation: The number on the cellphone's screen was going down.

MESSAGE.JP: プレイリストの残り曲数が表示されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was displaying the number of songs left on the playlist.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was displaying the number of songs left on the playlist.

MESSAGE.JP: １３から１つずつ。
MESSAGE.EN: Starting at 13 it went down 1 by 1.
MESSAGE.Translation: Starting at 13 it went down 1 by 1.

MESSAGE.JP: 短めの曲が多かったけど１０曲目ぐらいには葉留佳さんも大人しく聞いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were a lot of rather short songs, but by number 10 she was listening intently.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were a lot of rather short songs, but by number 10 she was listening intently.

MESSAGE.JP: 落ち着いた透明な感じの女性ボーカル。
MESSAGE.EN: They were clean, calm female vocals.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were clean, calm female vocals.

MESSAGE.JP: 洋楽だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a western song.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a western song.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、ジャズも含めた洋楽も聴くんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you listen to jazz music too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you listen to jazz music too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「色々な音楽に触れたのはこの学校に来てからだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's only since I've been at this school that I've listened to several types of music.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's only since I've been at this school that I've listened to several types of music.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…特にスザンヌのこの歌は好き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I especially like this song by Suzanne.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I especially like this song by Suzanne.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「出だしに『ハルカ』って単語が混じった歌みたいに聞こえない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Doesn't it sound like the word ❛Haruka❜ is mixed in at the beginning?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Doesn't it sound like the word ❛Haruka❜ is mixed in at the beginning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ラジオ音源をリミックスしたものなのか、ノイズが乗った歌声は聞きづらい。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it was because it was a remix, but the fuzzy voice was hard to hear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it was because it was a remix, but the fuzzy voice was hard to hear.

MESSAGE.JP: 言っているようなそうでないような。
MESSAGE.EN: It could be like she said or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: It could be like she said or not.

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't really tell.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't really tell.

MESSAGE.JP: ちらりと葉留佳さんの横顔を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I glanced over at Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glanced over at Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なぁに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wassup?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wassup?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の視線に気がついたのか、真面目な表情を崩して笑顔で訊いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Noticing my gaze she dropped the serious expression and started smiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Noticing my gaze she dropped the serious expression and started smiling.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いつもそうやって大人しくしてたらいいのに、とか思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was just thinking it'd be nice if you were always this laid back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was just thinking it'd be nice if you were always this laid back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そしたら真人くんや謙吾くんももっと構ってくれるかなぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...If I were, would Masato-kun and Kengo-kun talk to me more?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...If I were, would Masato-kun and Kengo-kun talk to me more?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「かもしれないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歌が終わる。
MESSAGE.EN: The song ended.
MESSAGE.Translation: The song ended.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはストップボタンを押した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hit the stop button.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hit the stop button.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やめておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が構って欲しいのは理樹くんだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're the one I want to pay attention to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're the one I want to pay attention to me.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なーんてねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...just kidding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...just kidding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「冗談だよ、冗談。やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a joke. Just a joke. Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a joke. Just a joke. Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さて、用事があるから今日はこれにてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I've got stuff to do, so we'll have to call it a day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I've got stuff to do, so we'll have to call it a day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、ばいばい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, bye-bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, bye-bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ばいばい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, see ya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, see ya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんと別れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I went our separate ways.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I went our separate ways.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: I shook my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook my head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そっか。じゃあしょうがないね。ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh. Well, what can ya do? Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh. Well, what can ya do? Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそう言うと、廊下の角を曲がって見えなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, Haruka-san disappeared around the corner of the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, Haruka-san disappeared around the corner of the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（なんであんな事言っちゃったんだろう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Why did I say something like that...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Why did I say something like that...)

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとした意地悪のつもりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I was just lashing out a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I was just lashing out a little.

MESSAGE.JP: けどそれは、何の意味のある『意地悪』だったんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: But then, what was I ❛lashing out❜ against?
MESSAGE.Translation: But then, what was I ❛lashing out❜ against?

MESSAGE.JP: 意味なんて何もないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess it had been completely meaningless.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess it had been completely meaningless.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: After school.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんを見かけた僕は声を掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I saw Haruka-san, I called out to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I saw Haruka-san, I called out to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは声を掛けた僕を認識すると、ぴょん、と小さく飛び上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: When Haruka-san recognized my voice, she gave a small, startled jump.
MESSAGE.Translation: When Haruka-san recognized my voice, she gave a small, startled jump.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「や、や、理樹くんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Y-ya, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Y-ya, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんは本当にいつものようにぴったりに現われるなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You really did show up, just like you always do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You really did show up, just like you always do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんのほうが僕と出くわすんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're the one who always runs into me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're the one who always runs into me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらず脈絡のない変な言い回しを使う子だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was talking nonsense straight off the bat, just as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was talking nonsense straight off the bat, just as always.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは。そゆ風に言うこともできるかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha. I guess you could put it that way too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha. I guess you could put it that way too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこか行くところなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Were you headed somewhere?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Were you headed somewhere?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの制服のポケットからは金槌とペンチが顔を出している。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had a hammer and pliers poking out of one of the pockets of her school uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had a hammer and pliers poking out of one of the pockets of her school uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: もう片方のポケットも膨れている。
MESSAGE.EN: The other pocket was bulging as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other pocket was bulging as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、時間ある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, do you have time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, do you have time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「特に用事はないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, I'm not busy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, I'm not busy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃあ、私と一緒にする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, wanna do it with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, wanna do it with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「するって何を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「勿論ナニはナニだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When I say ❛it,❜ I mean ❛it.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When I say ❛it,❜ I mean ❛it.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こうギュってして、ぐーってして、最後にべたべたするの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝First it's like ❛nnh,❜ then there's ❛hnng,❜ and then it's time for the sticky stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝First it's like ❛nnh,❜ then there's ❛hnng,❜ and then it's time for the sticky stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぎゅーでぐーでべたべた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nnh, then hnng, then sticky?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nnh, then hnng, then sticky?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とっても気持ちイイよぉ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And it'll feel really good～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And it'll feel really good～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はぁぁ、と葉留佳さんは弛緩しきった笑顔を浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san let out a relaxed sigh with a dreamy look on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san let out a relaxed sigh with a dreamy look on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ねぇ、しよ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...So, let's...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...So, let's...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは笑顔のまま囁いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san whispered the question, still dreamy-eyed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san whispered the question, still dreamy-eyed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はなぜかドキドキしながら頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: While I nodded, I felt my heart picking up tempo for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I nodded, I felt my heart picking up tempo for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー、なぁに理樹くん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm, what is it, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm, what is it, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これのどこがぎゅーでぐーでべたべたなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, um, where exactly is this ❛nnh,❜ ❛hnng,❜ ❛sticky❜ stuff happening?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, um, where exactly is this ❛nnh,❜ ❛hnng,❜ ❛sticky❜ stuff happening?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ギュってしてるよ。ほら、板押さえて押さえて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The ❛nnh❜ comes first. Here, press on this board here, press it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The ❛nnh❜ comes first. Here, press on this board here, press it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は木製ベンチの椅子を押さえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed on the seat of the wooden bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed on the seat of the wooden bench.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが上から金槌で叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hammered on it from above.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hammered on it from above.

MESSAGE.JP: カンカン。金槌が軽快に響く。
MESSAGE.EN: *Tap*tap*, the cautious rapping of the hammer went.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Tap*tap*, the cautious rapping of the hammer went.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい、次は、ぐーってして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, next is the ❛hnng❜ part.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, next is the ❛hnng❜ part.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…はいはい、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Right, right, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Right, right, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はベニヤ板をしならせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I bent some of the plywood back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bent some of the plywood back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これぐらい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それぐらいだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, that's good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, that's good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「べたべた、っと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And now for the sticky stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And now for the sticky stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは接着剤を塗っている。それから蝶番（ちょうつがい）の金具を取り付ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san pulled out a tube of glue. She then applied it on the joint of the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san pulled out a tube of glue. She then applied it on the joint of the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、どうしてベンチの補修をしてるわけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, why are you doing bench maintenance?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, why are you doing bench maintenance?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ベンチが傷んでたからだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝'Cuz the bench is damaged, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝'Cuz the bench is damaged, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはわかるんだけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I mean I get that, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I mean I get that, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「綺麗なベンチは気持ちイイからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A well-maintained bench feels good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A well-maintained bench feels good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「授業サボってする昼寝のときとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Like when I'm taking a nap while cutting class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Like when I'm taking a nap while cutting class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「サボって昼寝してちゃ駄目だよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you sure you should be napping instead of going to class!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you sure you should be napping instead of going to class!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは。こんなものかなー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha. Well, guess it's about done...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha. Well, guess it's about done...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそっとベンチの背もたれを撫でている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san softly stroked the back of the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san softly stroked the back of the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「結構愛着あるからさ、このベンチ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We've got a strong bond, this bench and me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We've got a strong bond, this bench and me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「学園入ったばっかりのときね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When I first started school here,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When I first started school here,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひがなずーっと座ってたこともあったんだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I used to sit here aaaaall day long sometimes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I used to sit here aaaaall day long sometimes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いきなり手伝わせてごめんね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Sorry to put you to work all of a sudden, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Sorry to put you to work all of a sudden, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「というか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は整備委員会の副委員長だしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm the vice president of the maintenance committee,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm the vice president of the maintenance committee,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが手伝えって言うなら手伝うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝so if you ask me to help, of course I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝so if you ask me to help, of course I will.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あぁ。そうだったね。そんなことも言ったっけ、私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Ah. That's right. I did say something like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Ah. That's right. I did say something like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こつん、と左手を自分のこめかみに当てて葉留佳さんは呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san mumbled, smacking herself lightly on the forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san mumbled, smacking herself lightly on the forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひどいなぁ。忘れてたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's harsh. You forgot?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's harsh. You forgot?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は腰に手を当てて呆れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I made a dumbfounded face as I stared at her with my hands on my waist.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made a dumbfounded face as I stared at her with my hands on my waist.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。忘れていた…かも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. I might have... forgotten.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. I might have... forgotten.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「覚えていてくれたんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But you remembered?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But you remembered?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕には結構印象的な出来事だったんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it was something meaningful to me, at least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it was something meaningful to me, at least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは金槌やドライバーをポケットに突っ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san slipped the hammer and screwdriver back into her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san slipped the hammer and screwdriver back into her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 作業は終わったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like the job was finished.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like the job was finished.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん。ありがと、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nope. Thanks, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nope. Thanks, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どういたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「個人的にも、みんなのためになる活動を手伝えるのは嬉しいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It makes me happy, fixing up stuff not just for myself but for everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It makes me happy, fixing up stuff not just for myself but for everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がそう言うと、葉留佳さんは困惑した笑顔を浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I said that, Haruka-san gave me a rather bemused smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I said that, Haruka-san gave me a rather bemused smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あの…あのね、理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Um... You know, Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Um... You know, Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが口を開こうとしたときだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Right when Haruka-san opened her mouth to continue...
MESSAGE.Translation: Right when Haruka-san opened her mouth to continue...

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そのベンチは廃棄予定だったのよ、直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That bench is marked to be scrapped, Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That bench is marked to be scrapped, Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 冷たい声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a cold voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a cold voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ると、二木さんがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked over my shoulder, and there she was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked over my shoulder, and there she was.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「昼休みに使用禁止の札を貼っておいたんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There were signs posted prohibiting use of this area during lunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There were signs posted prohibiting use of this area during lunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「剥がしたのは、誰かしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I wonder who it was that tore them down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I wonder who it was that tore them down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「新しいベンチが入る予定なのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We've scheduled for a new bench to be put in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We've scheduled for a new bench to be put in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「順次、古いベンチは撤去するの。ささくれだった木で怪我したら危ないものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And thus, we'll be removing the old one. The rough wood on it has become a sliver hazard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And thus, we'll be removing the old one. The rough wood on it has become a sliver hazard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「また、きた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here we go, again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here we go, again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san muttered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san muttered.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたにも、もう話したわよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I've already discussed this with you also, is that not right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I've already discussed this with you also, is that not right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…直せば、大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It'll be fine if we just fix it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It'll be fine if we just fix it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがぽつりと呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san mumbled sullenly to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san mumbled sullenly to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「大丈夫じゃないから言ってるんじゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It won't be fine. That's the point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It won't be fine. That's the point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「業者に修理させると高くつくしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It would be too expensive to get a professional to repair it properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It would be too expensive to get a professional to repair it properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「執行部も許可済みなのに、何勝手なことをしているの、あなたは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though we've already cleared this all with the board, why are you still making trouble?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though we've already cleared this all with the board, why are you still making trouble?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…このベンチのほうがいいよ…何回も言ったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...This bench is better... I keep telling you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...This bench is better... I keep telling you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがぼそぼそと反論しようとするのを二木さんはぴしゃりと遮る。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san started to formulate a weak comeback, but Futaki-san cut her off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san started to formulate a weak comeback, but Futaki-san cut her off.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんなワガママは聞く必要がないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't have to listen to your selfish complaints.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't have to listen to your selfish complaints.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だから三枝葉留佳、あなたがやっていることは無駄なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Therefore, Haruka Saigusa, what you've done here is meaningless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Therefore, Haruka Saigusa, what you've done here is meaningless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたにはこの間も注意したのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I even specifically warned you about this earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I even specifically warned you about this earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分の行為をあっさり否定された葉留佳さんは、俯いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Under the fiery scolding, Haruka-san hung her head in dejection.
MESSAGE.Translation: Under the fiery scolding, Haruka-san hung her head in dejection.

MESSAGE.JP: 握りしめた拳が小刻みに震えていることに僕は気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed that her clenched fists were beginning to tremble.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed that her clenched fists were beginning to tremble.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「掲示板の木枠、勝手に補修したでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You took it upon yourself to fix the frame of the old bulletin board also, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You took it upon yourself to fix the frame of the old bulletin board also, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ホワイトボード化するとき、凄く邪魔だったのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And then you made a total fuss when it was time to switch out the whiteboards.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And then you made a total fuss when it was time to switch out the whiteboards.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あと、あなたのこの活動については」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And as for this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And as for this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わかってるよ！　わかってること、何度も言わないで！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I get it! I get it already, you don't have to keep saying it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I get it! I get it already, you don't have to keep saying it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは俯いていた顔を跳ね上げて二木さんの言葉を遮る。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's head snapped up as she cut Futaki-san off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's head snapped up as she cut Futaki-san off.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…活動は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Your actions are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Your actions are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「――わかってるから！　そんなこと！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝――I get it already! Give it a rest!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝――I get it already! Give it a rest!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの言葉を打ち消すように葉留佳さんが叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san yelled to drown out Futaki-san's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san yelled to drown out Futaki-san's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 否定された台詞への反発力そのままに、葉留佳さんは大声を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: In her rejection of those words of reprimand, she shouted at the top of her lungs.
MESSAGE.Translation: In her rejection of those words of reprimand, she shouted at the top of her lungs.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「止めれば、いいんでしょっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It'll be fine if I stop, won't it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It'll be fine if I stop, won't it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはベンチを蹴ろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san made as if to kick the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san made as if to kick the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ha, Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ha, Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、つま先は地面に落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: But, she let her foot drop back to the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, she let her foot drop back to the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 蹴ろうとした瞬間、自制心が働いたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like her self-control had got the upper hand before she could actually kick it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like her self-control had got the upper hand before she could actually kick it.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは苛立たしげに何度も靴で地面を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: In her irritation, Haruka-san began stomping her foot on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: In her irritation, Haruka-san began stomping her foot on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: ポケットからドライバーがこぼれた。
MESSAGE.EN: The screwdriver slipped out of her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: The screwdriver slipped out of her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそれを腹立ち紛れに蹴飛ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: In her blind rage, Haruka-san jolted it away.
MESSAGE.Translation: In her blind rage, Haruka-san jolted it away.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつも…いつも…そうやって、私の邪魔をして…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're always... always... like this, getting in my way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're always... always... like this, getting in my way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、やめなよ、葉留佳さんってば！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, quit it - stop it, Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, quit it - stop it, Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は二木さんに今にも掴みかからんばかりの葉留佳さんの腕を引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught Haruka-san's arm and held her back as she tried to grab for Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught Haruka-san's arm and held her back as she tried to grab for Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なぁに？　逆ギレ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What's this? Isn't your anger a little misplaced?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What's this? Isn't your anger a little misplaced?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「みっともないわね、三枝葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How unseemly, Haruka Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How unseemly, Haruka Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「悪いのはあなたなのよ。わかってるって自分で言ってるのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're the one in the wrong here. You even admitted it yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're the one in the wrong here. You even admitted it yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「情けないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝For heaven's sake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝For heaven's sake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐっと足を踏ん張った葉留佳さんをなんとかベンチから遠ざけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I somehow managed to drag Haruka-san, who had been planting her feet firmly on the ground, away from the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: I somehow managed to drag Haruka-san, who had been planting her feet firmly on the ground, away from the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんを背に回しながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I addressed her while I tried to turn Haruka-san away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I addressed her while I tried to turn Haruka-san away.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんのやっていることをそんな悪し様に言う必要があるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is it really necessary to preach at Haruka-san like this for the things she does?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is it really necessary to preach at Haruka-san like this for the things she does?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「やっちゃいけない理由も言ったわよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Haven't I only given a clear reason why she shouldn't have done the things she has?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Haven't I only given a clear reason why she shouldn't have done the things she has?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、それにしたって言い方があるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, even so, you still don't have to talk to her this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, even so, you still don't have to talk to her this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あぁ、なぁに、三枝葉留佳？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Aa, what's this, Haruka Saigusa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Aa, what's this, Haruka Saigusa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が葉留佳さんを擁護しはじめるや否や、二木さんは葉留佳さんを当てこすり始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I began to defend Haruka-san, an insinuating tone crept into Futaki-san's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I began to defend Haruka-san, an insinuating tone crept into Futaki-san's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「友達…だっけ？　…に代弁させるのね、あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝A friend only... was he? ...And yet, now you're having him fight your battles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝A friend only... was he? ...And yet, now you're having him fight your battles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「自分がしてることを邪魔する人間が悪い、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So, anyone who gets in the way of what you want to do is in the wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So, anyone who gets in the way of what you want to do is in the wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「自分は感情的に暴れて、他人に主張させるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And then you throw a fit and make another stand up for yourself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And then you throw a fit and make another stand up for yourself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「自分の口で言いなさい。そんなことも言えないのよね、あなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why don't you speak with your own mouth? But no, it's too much to ask of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why don't you speak with your own mouth? But no, it's too much to ask of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたはいつでもそう。他人の迷惑なんてどうでもいいのよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You've always been like this. You completely ignore the trouble you cause for others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You've always been like this. You completely ignore the trouble you cause for others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「他人を厄介事に巻き込んで、どうしようっていうの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So now that you've gotten someone else embroiled in your troubles, what are you going to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So now that you've gotten someone else embroiled in your troubles, what are you going to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「最低ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're the worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're the worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「最低」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは唇を噛みしめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was gnawing on her lip.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was gnawing on her lip.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…うん。そうね。ベンチの前で止めたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Yeah. That's right. I just caught her at the bench.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Yeah. That's right. I just caught her at the bench.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯を取りだした二木さんはどこかへ電話している。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san had pulled out her cellphone and was making a call to somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san had pulled out her cellphone and was making a call to somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「回収して。お願いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Come pick it up. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Come pick it up. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく経つと風紀委員たちが数人やってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: After a short while, a group of prefects showed up.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a short while, a group of prefects showed up.

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員４@「委員長、見つけましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 4@❝Ah, chief, you found her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 4@❝Ah, chief, you found her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員３@「ベンチはどうしますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝What should we do with the bench?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝What should we do with the bench?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「壊して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Break it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Break it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ふ、二木さんっ、そんなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...F, Futaki-san, that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...F, Futaki-san, that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「や…止めてよーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝S... stop it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝S... stop it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「イヤよ。…さっさと壊して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No. Go ahead and break it, now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No. Go ahead and break it, now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 拒否し、他の委員たちに命令する二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: After a flat refusal, Futaki-san issued her order to the prefects.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a flat refusal, Futaki-san issued her order to the prefects.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ど、どうしていつも…そういうこと、するの…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wh, why are you always... doing things like this to me...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wh, why are you always... doing things like this to me...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが手を伸ばす――けれど、あっさりと命令は実行された。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san reached out her hand―― but the orders were executed efficiently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san reached out her hand―― but the orders were executed efficiently.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さな木槌を風紀委員たちは振り回した。
MESSAGE.EN: The prefects promptly began to trash the small wooden bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: The prefects promptly began to trash the small wooden bench.

MESSAGE.JP: ガン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Crack*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crack*!

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが息を呑む。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san gasped.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san gasped.

MESSAGE.JP: ガン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Crack*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crack*!

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「……っっ」
とうとう葉留佳さんはその光景から目を逸らした。
MESSAGE.EN: At last, Haruka-san averted her gaze from the scene.
MESSAGE.Translation: At last, Haruka-san averted her gaze from the scene.

MESSAGE.JP: ガン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Crack*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crack*!

MESSAGE.JP: 何度目かで、グシャという嫌なきしみ音と共に、ベンチが真っ二つに折れる。
MESSAGE.EN: After a few moments, with a horrible noise, the bench was split in two.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a few moments, with a horrible noise, the bench was split in two.

MESSAGE.JP: あっけないものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It all happened so quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: It all happened so quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬く間にベンチは木屑になってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: In an instant, what had been a bench had been reduced to mere scrap.
MESSAGE.Translation: In an instant, what had been a bench had been reduced to mere scrap.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「焼却炉に持っていって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Take it to the incinerator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Take it to the incinerator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わかりました、と答えた風紀委員たちは一輪車に乗せてベンチだった木屑を運んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: With an affirmative, the prefects dumped what was left of the bench into a wheelbarrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: With an affirmative, the prefects dumped what was left of the bench into a wheelbarrow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんてことを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What have you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What have you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前でしなくてもいいじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: How could you do this right in front of her?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could you do this right in front of her?

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの肩が小さく震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's shoulders were trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's shoulders were trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今度は清潔で頑丈なベンチが置かれるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And now we can put in a nice, clean and solid new bench.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And now we can put in a nice, clean and solid new bench.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「要らないものをいつまでも置いておいてもしょうがないでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We can't just keep using the same old useless junk forever, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We can't just keep using the same old useless junk forever, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの言葉を聞いた途端、怒りが、頭の中を駆けめぐった。
MESSAGE.EN: At Futaki-san's words, I felt my rage rising.
MESSAGE.Translation: At Futaki-san's words, I felt my rage rising.

MESSAGE.JP: 拳を握りしめるなり、前に足が動く。
MESSAGE.EN: My hand coiling into a fist, I took a step toward her.
MESSAGE.Translation: My hand coiling into a fist, I took a step toward her.

MESSAGE.JP: がくん、と体の動きが止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: A sudden pressure stopped me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sudden pressure stopped me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳、さんっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-... san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-... san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが僕の腰に両手でしがみついていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had both of her arms wrapped around me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had both of her arms wrapped around me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「駄目っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、こんなことしなくても…こんなの、やりすぎだよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, she didn't have to do this... Not like this, she didn't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, she didn't have to do this... Not like this, she didn't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「駄目、駄目っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Stop, please stop!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Stop, please stop!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんを引きはがそうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to tear away from Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to tear away from Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんが、怒らなくても、いいの…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, it's fine, calm down...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, it's fine, calm down...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの叫んだ言葉に、僕は固まった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I heard Haruka-san yelling, I pulled myself together.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I heard Haruka-san yelling, I pulled myself together.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は、いいの…私は、いいの。いいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm, fine... I'm, fine. It's alright!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm, fine... I'm, fine. It's alright!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何が。なにが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What. What is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What. What is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何が、いいものか。
MESSAGE.EN: What was alright?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was alright?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、二木さんを睨み付けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I glared at Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glared at Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは冷然と立っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san merely stood there indifferently, observing us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san merely stood there indifferently, observing us.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「茶番ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Charming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Charming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…たかがベンチ程度で。馬鹿じゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's just a bench. Are you some kind of idiot?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's just a bench. Are you some kind of idiot?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それが、彼女の感想だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That... was how she saw it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That... was how she saw it.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「残念。不良分子を一掃出来るチャンスだったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How sad. And this was your chance to go back down a notch on the delinquent meter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How sad. And this was your chance to go back down a notch on the delinquent meter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「直枝理樹。そんな厄介者と一緒にいるのは止めなさい。本当よ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Riki Naoe. Stop hanging out with that troublemaker. Alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Riki Naoe. Stop hanging out with that troublemaker. Alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな捨て台詞と、僕と、葉留佳さんを残して去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With that dismissive line, she left Haruka-san and me to ourselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that dismissive line, she left Haruka-san and me to ourselves.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕にしがみついたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was still holding me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was still holding me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう、いいよ。大丈夫だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can let go now. It's over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can let go now. It's over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕にしがみついたまま、首を小さく振っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Clutching onto me, Haruka-san shook her head a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Clutching onto me, Haruka-san shook her head a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「駄目…駄目…駄目」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't... don't... don't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't... don't... don't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が何を言っても葉留佳さんはそう繰り返すだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter what I said, Haruka-san just kept repeating that.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter what I said, Haruka-san just kept repeating that.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「――ごめんね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝――Sorry, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝――Sorry, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別に、いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当はいいわけが無かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Though it certainly wasn't fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though it certainly wasn't fine.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は怒りをまだくすぶらせていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Anger was still simmering inside of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anger was still simmering inside of me.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、自分の声が不機嫌に聞こえる理由はそれだけじゃなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, that wasn't the only reason I sounded so ill at ease.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, that wasn't the only reason I sounded so ill at ease.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが止めてくれなかったら…
MESSAGE.EN: If Haruka-san hadn't stopped me...
MESSAGE.Translation: If Haruka-san hadn't stopped me...

MESSAGE.JP: 自宅謹慎、あるいは停学…そんな文字が浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Detention, suspension... those words came to mind uninvited.
MESSAGE.Translation: Detention, suspension... those words came to mind uninvited.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんに関わる人間がその事態に陥ることは二木さんの望む展開だっただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure that Futaki-san was hoping that everyone who got close to Haruka-san would end up like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure that Futaki-san was hoping that everyone who got close to Haruka-san would end up like that.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（相手は女の子なのに…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Even though my opponent was a girl...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Even though my opponent was a girl...)

MESSAGE.JP: 殴ったりなんかしたらそれこそ自己嫌悪に陥るだけでは済まなさそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: If I really had hit her, I would have gotten much more than just self-loathing afterward.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I really had hit her, I would have gotten much more than just self-loathing afterward.

MESSAGE.JP: 柄にもなく血を頭に上らせて、僕は何をしているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Letting the blood rise to my head, what had I been thinking?
MESSAGE.Translation: Letting the blood rise to my head, what had I been thinking?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今日は、お疲れ様だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thanks for your help today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thanks for your help today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは乾いた笑いを浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san gave me a dry smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san gave me a dry smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…なんで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san... Why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san... Why...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで、あんなこと言われたりされたりしてるのに、我慢しなくちゃいけないんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why... Why do we have to obey her? Are we just supposed to ignore what she's said and done to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why... Why do we have to obey her? Are we just supposed to ignore what she's said and done to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは悪くない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're not in the wrong here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're not in the wrong here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それを、あんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That, something like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That, something like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 木槌がベンチを砕く音が記憶に蘇る。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of the hammers beating away at the bench came back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of the hammers beating away at the bench came back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 嫌な音だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It had been a horrible sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had been a horrible sound.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐしゃり、と木が軋む音。
MESSAGE.EN: That, and the wailing of the breaking wood.
MESSAGE.Translation: That, and the wailing of the breaking wood.

MESSAGE.JP: ベンチと一緒に、何か大事なものが目の前で壊された気分だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It had felt like, besides just the bench, something precious was being destroyed before my very eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had felt like, besides just the bench, something precious was being destroyed before my very eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、わがままって言われたら、そうなのかもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, it'd probably be right to call me selfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, it'd probably be right to call me selfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san muttered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san muttered.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「知ってたの。入れ替えること。でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I did know. About the replacement, I mean. But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I did know. About the replacement, I mean. But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、あのベンチは結構思い入れもあって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, that bench and I went a long way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, that bench and I went a long way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきもそんなこと言ってたよね？　思い出でもあるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You said that earlier too, right? That you have memories with it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You said that earlier too, right? That you have memories with it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、駄目だなぁ、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But still, I'm no good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But still, I'm no good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつに冷たく言われると、気持ちが屈服しちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All she has to do is talk coldly like that to me, and I get all submissive.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All she has to do is talk coldly like that to me, and I get all submissive.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうでもよくなって…わからなくなっちゃって…何も、出来ないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Everything turns meaningless... everything becomes pointless... and I end up unable to do anything at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Everything turns meaningless... everything becomes pointless... and I end up unable to do anything at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつも、繰り返し…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's always the same...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's always the same...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「繰り返しは嫌いじゃないんだけど…これだけは慣れないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's not the endless repetition that I hate so much... But I just can't get used to it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's not the endless repetition that I hate so much... But I just can't get used to it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはぺこん、と頭を深く下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san quickly bowed her head down deeply.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san quickly bowed her head down deeply.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが謝らなくても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't have to apologize...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't have to apologize...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…よしっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Alrighty!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Alrighty!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げると葉留佳さんは無理矢理笑って見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san raised her head, showing a forced smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san raised her head, showing a forced smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「テンション、回復、回復！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Energy recovery complete!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Energy recovery complete!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口ではそう言っていても、強がりにしか聞こえない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she said that, I could tell she was bluffing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she said that, I could tell she was bluffing.

MESSAGE.JP: だって葉留佳さん、左手が震えてるじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Because, Haruka-san, isn't your left hand trembling?
MESSAGE.Translation: Because, Haruka-san, isn't your left hand trembling?

MESSAGE.JP: 虚勢を張っているくせに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though you're putting on such a brave face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though you're putting on such a brave face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「またね、理樹くん。ばいばいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you, Riki-kun. Bye-bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you, Riki-kun. Bye-bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 早口で自己完結的な台詞を言うと、葉留佳さんは走っていってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rushing out that closing line, Haruka-san left at a run.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rushing out that closing line, Haruka-san left at a run.

MESSAGE.JP: ――僕はそんな女の子に、何も言ってあげることができない。
MESSAGE.EN: ――I couldn't say anything at all to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――I couldn't say anything at all to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 強がりなんかしなくていいよ――僕は、そう言ってあげるべきだったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You don't have to pretend.❜ ――Should I have told her that?
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You don't have to pretend.❜ ――Should I have told her that?

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと僕がそれぞれ考えていることが、どうにもすれ違っているようにしか、思えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could think was that Haruka-san's thoughts and mine, on some fundamental level, were not meeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could think was that Haruka-san's thoughts and mine, on some fundamental level, were not meeting.

MESSAGE.JP: ベンチが壊された音が耳にこびりついて、昨日の夜はなかなか寝付けなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of the bench being destroyed kept resounding in my ears to the point I couldn't sleep last night.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of the bench being destroyed kept resounding in my ears to the point I couldn't sleep last night.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あそこまでしなくてもいいのに…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(They didn't have to go that far...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(They didn't have to go that far...)

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員は、というか二木さんは、なぜ葉留佳さんに厳しいのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder why the Disciplinary Committee member, or Futaki-san, is so harsh toward Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder why the Disciplinary Committee member, or Futaki-san, is so harsh toward Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことを考えながら、一日が始まった。
MESSAGE.EN: The day started with that running through my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: The day started with that running through my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 移動教室の途中で、忘れ物の教科書を思い出し、教室へ戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: In the middle of switching classrooms, I remembered that I had left my textbook behind, so I went back to the previous room for it.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the middle of switching classrooms, I remembered that I had left my textbook behind, so I went back to the previous room for it.

MESSAGE.JP: …教室に置きっぱなし、なんてこと、めったに無いんだけど、うっかりしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's not something I often do, leaving something behind in class, but it's an honest mistake that could happen to anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's not something I often do, leaving something behind in class, but it's an honest mistake that could happen to anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: がらり、と教室の後ろの扉を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The back door of the classroom rattled as I opened it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The back door of the classroom rattled as I opened it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「教科書、教科書っと…あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Textbook, textbook... huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Textbook, textbook... huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰もいない僕らの教室。
MESSAGE.EN: The classroom was empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: The classroom was empty.

MESSAGE.JP: の、はずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, at least it was supposed to be.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, at least it was supposed to be.

MESSAGE.JP: 黒板と向かい合った葉留佳さんがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was there, looking at the blackboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was there, looking at the blackboard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（何してるんだろう？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What's she doing?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What's she doing?)

MESSAGE.JP: また白い絵の具で『葉留佳参上！』とか書くつもりかなぁ？
MESSAGE.EN: Was she planning to write ❛Haruka was here❜ with the chalk, again?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she planning to write ❛Haruka was here❜ with the chalk, again?

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、止めなくちゃ…
MESSAGE.EN: If so, I should stop her...
MESSAGE.Translation: If so, I should stop her...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-sa――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-sa――❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が呼びかけた途中で、葉留佳さんは振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I was calling to her, Haruka-san turned her head and saw me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I was calling to her, Haruka-san turned her head and saw me.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの顔が、真っ青だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was ghastly pale.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was ghastly pale.

MESSAGE.JP: 唇が動く。
MESSAGE.EN: Her lips moved.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her lips moved.

MESSAGE.JP: う、そ――唇は音の形を作ったように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Can't... be.❜ ――Her lips soundlessly seemed to form those words.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Can't... be.❜ ――Her lips soundlessly seemed to form those words.

MESSAGE.JP: 左手に持った黒板消しをいきなり動かす葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden, she began to furiously move the blackboard eraser in her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden, she began to furiously move the blackboard eraser in her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が教卓に近づこうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I approached the teacher's desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I approached the teacher's desk.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、あはは、み、見つかっちゃったっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A, ahaha, y, you found me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A, ahaha, y, you found me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「も、もう折角落書きしようと思ったのにっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A, and here I was just about to do some scribbling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A, and here I was just about to do some scribbling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんタイミングがいいナァ、全くもうはるちん大ピンチですよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You've got good timing, Riki-kun, looks like Haruchin's in a pinch!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You've got good timing, Riki-kun, looks like Haruchin's in a pinch!❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだ、やっぱり落書きしようとしてたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, so she had been planning to do some graffiti there after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, so she had been planning to do some graffiti there after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I smiled wryly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smiled wryly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「駄目だよ葉留佳さん。そんなことしてるとまた風紀委員に見つかるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't do that, Haruka-san. The prefects will be after you again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't do that, Haruka-san. The prefects will be after you again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、うん、そうだね、そうだね、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uh, yeah, right, right, right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uh, yeah, right, right, right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは、あはは、あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, ahaha, ahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, ahaha, ahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの制服の左袖はチョークの粉で真っ白だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's left sleeve was pure white with chalk dust.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's left sleeve was pure white with chalk dust.

MESSAGE.JP: 黒板に相当大きな落書きを描こうとしていたのかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have been drawing something quite sizeable on the board.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have been drawing something quite sizeable on the board.

MESSAGE.JP: しょうがない子だなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: What was I supposed to do with her...
MESSAGE.Translation: What was I supposed to do with her...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんも懲りないなぁ。真人に散々怒鳴られたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You really don't learn, do you, Haruka-san. Even after Masato yelled at you like that before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You really don't learn, do you, Haruka-san. Even after Masato yelled at you like that before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううう、真人くんのぐりぐりは痛かったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwaa, Masato-kun's noogie hurt...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwaa, Masato-kun's noogie hurt...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは頭を抱えてみせる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san made a show of holding her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san made a show of holding her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「と、というわけで、じゃ、じゃあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So anyway, se, see ya...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So anyway, se, see ya...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぎし、と葉留佳さんの体が固まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly, Haruka-san's body stiffened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly, Haruka-san's body stiffened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木、さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-... san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-... san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 開け放たれた扉。
MESSAGE.EN: The door had been flung open.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door had been flung open.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下から、二木さんが無表情に僕たちを見つめている。
MESSAGE.EN: From the corridor, Futaki-san was staring at us with an unreadable expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the corridor, Futaki-san was staring at us with an unreadable expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたたち…何してるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What are... you two doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What are... you two doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、何って、忘れ物を取りに戻っただけで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝D-doing? I'm just here to grab a textbook I forgot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝D-doing? I'm just here to grab a textbook I forgot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何、してるのっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What are you DOING!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What are you DOING!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはいきなり怒鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was suddenly yelling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was suddenly yelling.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと、二木さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, wait a sec, Futaki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, wait a sec, Futaki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「直枝理樹。あなたは、何をしてるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Riki Naoe. What are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Riki Naoe. What are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 問いつめ口調の中に、微かに狼狽が混じっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Behind the front of aggressive questioning, somehow I caught just a hint of panic or confusion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Behind the front of aggressive questioning, somehow I caught just a hint of panic or confusion.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、忘れ物をしたから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like I said, I forgot one of my books...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like I said, I forgot one of my books...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんのその変化に戸惑いつつ答えようとする僕を葉留佳さんの台詞が遮った。
MESSAGE.EN: As I answered, slightly bewildered by how Futaki-san was acting, I was interrupted by Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I answered, slightly bewildered by how Futaki-san was acting, I was interrupted by Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やめてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Stop it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Stop it.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 平坦過ぎる呟きに僕はぎょっとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Her flat voice startled me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her flat voice startled me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…やめてよ。あんたなんかに言われる筋合いはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Stop it. You have no right to be questioning us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Stop it. You have no right to be questioning us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わかってるんだ。ぜんぶ、しってる。やったのはあんただ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I get it now. I worked it all out. You're the one behind this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I get it now. I worked it all out. You're the one behind this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 無言のままの二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは強い感情がこもった瞳で二木さんを見据えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was staring at Futaki-san, her eyes ablaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was staring at Futaki-san, her eyes ablaze.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎらぎらと光る、それは、何だ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were almost glowing with... what?
MESSAGE.Translation: They were almost glowing with... what?

MESSAGE.JP: 一番近いもの――黒く暗い感情。
MESSAGE.EN: The closest I could come to describing it was―― a deep, dark and raw emotion.
MESSAGE.Translation: The closest I could come to describing it was―― a deep, dark and raw emotion.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、憎悪。
MESSAGE.EN: It was... hatred.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was... hatred.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何を勘違いしているのか知らないけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm not sure what kind of misunderstanding you're having...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm not sure what kind of misunderstanding you're having...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は通りすがっただけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...but I just happened to be passing by.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...but I just happened to be passing by.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二人の間に、ぎすぎすした空気が満ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: The air between them crackled with tension.
MESSAGE.Translation: The air between them crackled with tension.

MESSAGE.JP: 先に視線を逸らしたのは…葉留佳さんのほうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The first one to look away was... Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The first one to look away was... Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: ぷい、と顔を背け、無言で教室を出て行く。
MESSAGE.EN: She jerked her gaze away abruptly, and left the classroom without another word.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jerked her gaze away abruptly, and left the classroom without another word.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ねぇ、直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Hey, Riki Naoe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Hey, Riki Naoe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見送るしかない僕は、呼びかけに振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: After I'd watched Haruka-san go, Futaki-san called to me over her shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I'd watched Haruka-san go, Futaki-san called to me over her shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「見ていないのね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You didn't see, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You didn't see, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…何の話？　落書きなら葉留佳さんはしてないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What are you talking about? If it's about the graffiti, Haruka-san didn't do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What are you talking about? If it's about the graffiti, Haruka-san didn't do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「してもいないことを咎めるのはやめてあげてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would you stop blaming her for every small thing that happens.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would you stop blaming her for every small thing that happens.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんだって、濡れ衣ばっかりだと怒って当然だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's no wonder she's always angry at you when you have such a witch hunt going on for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's no wonder she's always angry at you when you have such a witch hunt going on for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは小さく息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san let out a small breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san let out a small breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…見てないのなら、いい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's fine so long as you didn't see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's fine so long as you didn't see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気を取り直したように、二木さんは相変わらずの辛辣さで僕に『忠告』する。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently having assured herself of something, Futaki-san issued me one of her standard ❛warnings.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently having assured herself of something, Futaki-san issued me one of her standard ❛warnings.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「授業中なのに余所のクラスに来ている生徒なんかと関わるものじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You shouldn't involve yourself with people who skip class to hide in empty classrooms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You shouldn't involve yourself with people who skip class to hide in empty classrooms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは正論だと、僕も思う。
MESSAGE.EN: When she put it that way, even I had to agree.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she put it that way, even I had to agree.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、騒ぎを起こさないように止めたんだよ、僕は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why I told her to stop, so it wouldn't cause a scene.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why I told her to stop, so it wouldn't cause a scene.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前も落書きを消すのは大変だったんだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Last time it was a pain erasing the graffiti.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Last time it was a pain erasing the graffiti.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「三枝葉留佳と、関わるなと言ったはずよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What I should be saying is: you shouldn't involve yourself with Haruka Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What I should be saying is: you shouldn't involve yourself with Haruka Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「またその話？　聞くつもりはないって言わなかったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That again? Didn't I already tell you I have no intention of listening to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That again? Didn't I already tell you I have no intention of listening to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうしても関わりたい、というのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So you're just desperate to be involved with her, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So you're just desperate to be involved with her, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今更だよ、そんなことは。二木さんは誤解してるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝After all this, what are you saying now? Don't get the wrong idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝After all this, what are you saying now? Don't get the wrong idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは確かに騒がしいけど、…確かにトラブルメーカーだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san is a joker... and a troublemaker.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san is a joker... and a troublemaker.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一事が万事、そうじゃないんだ。僕は、それを知ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But that's not all she ever is. I know that for a fact.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But that's not all she ever is. I know that for a fact.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「早く戻らなくていいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Shouldn't you be getting back to class?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Shouldn't you be getting back to class?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ！　そういえばそうだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah! Now that you mention it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah! Now that you mention it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じゃあね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝See you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝See you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはさっさと歩き出してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san took off walking without another word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san took off walking without another word.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふ、二木さん、話はまだ終わってない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝F, Futaki-san, this conversation isn't over!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝F, Futaki-san, this conversation isn't over!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「三枚目のイエローカードはないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There won't be a third yellow card.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There won't be a third yellow card.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは振り向きもせず言うと、足早に教室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san didn't even look over her shoulder as she said it, and then she was gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san didn't even look over her shoulder as she said it, and then she was gone.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員たる二木さんが葉留佳さんを目の敵にするのはいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I plainly understood that, as a prefect, Futaki-san considered Haruka-san her enemy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I plainly understood that, as a prefect, Futaki-san considered Haruka-san her enemy.

MESSAGE.JP: 校内の風紀を乱す人間によって、周りが染まっていくのが許せないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess they didn't want her rebellious pranks to infect the surrounding students.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess they didn't want her rebellious pranks to infect the surrounding students.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、わからなくはない。
MESSAGE.EN: So, it's not like I couldn't see her side of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, it's not like I couldn't see her side of it.

MESSAGE.JP: そういう役割を彼女は自ら望んでやっている。
MESSAGE.EN: She had taken it upon herself to fill this role.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had taken it upon herself to fill this role.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かに嫌われることも、誰かに恨まれることも、誰かに疎まれることも、織り込み済みのはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And she must have known she would be discriminated, hated, and shunned by many for it.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she must have known she would be discriminated, hated, and shunned by many for it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもなんだろうな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But still...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But still...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの様子もおかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Something was strange about Haruka-san's circumstances as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something was strange about Haruka-san's circumstances as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんに、二木さんを嫌う理由があるのだろう…
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had to have a reason to hate Futaki-san that much.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had to have a reason to hate Futaki-san that much.

MESSAGE.JP: だとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If I assumed that...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I assumed that...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんにも何かあるのかもしれないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's got to be something going on with Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's got to be something going on with Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought back.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきまでの険悪な空気を思い出して僕はため息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Recalling the dangerous atmosphere from mere moments earlier, I let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Recalling the dangerous atmosphere from mere moments earlier, I let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長室は今日も何人かの生徒が仕事をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were students doing work in the dorm heads' room again today.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were students doing work in the dorm heads' room again today.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は男子寮長に備品の補充について、お願いに来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had come to ask the head of the boys' dorm for some replacement furniture.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had come to ask the head of the boys' dorm for some replacement furniture.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうも失礼しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for your help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for your help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「待って待って、直枝くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Wait, hold on a sec, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Wait, hold on a sec, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 向かいの机で何か書類を片付けていた女子寮長が僕を呼び止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: The girls' dorm head, who was busy tidying up some documents on her desk, called to me as I started to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girls' dorm head, who was busy tidying up some documents on her desk, called to me as I started to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい、何でしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「悪いんだけど、今週の報告書、風紀委員会に持って行ってくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, but could you take the weekly report to the disciplinary committee for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, but could you take the weekly report to the disciplinary committee for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、でも委員会室は直ぐ近くじゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, but isn't the committee meeting room right around the corner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, but isn't the committee meeting room right around the corner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「文化委員会が学祭準備会議で使ってるのよ、委員会室」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Their room is currently being used by the culture committee for the school festival planning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Their room is currently being used by the culture committee for the school festival planning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「だから今日はきみの教室の近くの空き教室でやってるんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝So for the time being, they're using the empty classroom near yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝So for the time being, they're using the empty classroom near yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「帰り道寄って放り込んでおいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Just toss it in there on your way out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Just toss it in there on your way out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「放り込む…って、そんなのしたら怒られるんじゃないですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Toss it in... If I did it like that, wouldn't they get angry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Toss it in... If I did it like that, wouldn't they get angry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「わたしはいつもそうしてるけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝That's how I always do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝That's how I always do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長は背伸びをした。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head stretched her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head stretched her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 『あー、肩痛いわねぇ…』と言いながら肩を叩いている。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Aa-ah, my shoulders hurt...❜, she muttered, patting her shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Aa-ah, my shoulders hurt...❜, she muttered, patting her shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとおばさんくさい。
MESSAGE.EN: Almost like a granny...
MESSAGE.Translation: Almost like a granny...

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「頼めない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Can I leave it to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Can I leave it to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…委員長の人が少し…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...The head prefect is sorta...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...The head prefect is sorta...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さん絡みのせいもあって、印象が悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, with the whole business between her and Haruka-san, I just didn't have a very good impression of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, with the whole business between her and Haruka-san, I just didn't have a very good impression of her.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あぁ、二木さん？　ふふ、確かにね。堅物だし融通利かないしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Aa, Futaki-san? Hehe, I know what you mean. She's pretty inflexible, strict on the rules and such.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Aa, Futaki-san? Hehe, I know what you mean. She's pretty inflexible, strict on the rules and such.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「でも、礼儀正しい真面目な子よ？　真面目すぎるとも言うか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝But, she's serious about her manners, right? Well, maybe even a little too serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝But, she's serious about her manners, right? Well, maybe even a little too serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「未だに冗談で言ったわたしの呼び名律儀に呼んでるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝To this day she still insists on calling me by a nickname I told her to use as a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝To this day she still insists on calling me by a nickname I told her to use as a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「結構恥ずかしい呼び名だし失敗したなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's a pretty embarrassing name too, guess it was my mistake...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's a pretty embarrassing name too, guess it was my mistake...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 素直に先輩って呼んで貰ったほうが良かったかしら、と寮長はぼやいた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I should have just told her to call me senpai,❜ she sighed to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I should have just told her to call me senpai,❜ she sighed to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…ま、見方はいろいろあるか。きみたちからみたら鬱陶しいもんね、風紀委員なんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...Well, everyone's got their own way of looking at the world. To kids like you, the prefects must be a pretty irritating existence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...Well, everyone's got their own way of looking at the world. To kids like you, the prefects must be a pretty irritating existence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「三枝さんは珍しく出頭するって言ってたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Seems like Saigusa-san decided to attend their meeting too, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Seems like Saigusa-san decided to attend their meeting too, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san did?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san did?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ええ、まあそういうわけだけど、お願いできる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Well, that's about it, so will you do it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Well, that's about it, so will you do it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえ、やっぱりちょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, I'd rather not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I'd rather not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは気になるけど、やっぱりあそこに近づく気にはなれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was my friend, but I didn't feel like opening that can of worms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was my friend, but I didn't feel like opening that can of worms.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「そう？　急ぎじゃないからあとでもいいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Really? There's no hurry, you can do it later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Really? There's no hurry, you can do it later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すみません、あまり気乗りしなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'm just not really up for it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'm just not really up for it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「いいのいいの。しょうがないもんね。風紀委員には誰だって近寄りたくないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's alright, no worries. I understand. Not many people want to mess with the prefects.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's alright, no worries. I understand. Not many people want to mess with the prefects.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長はそう言って笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head smiled as she said that.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head smiled as she said that.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「悪いわね。この書類の山のチェックが全然終わらなくって…あぁもぅ、ここも間違ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry. I'm nowhere near done checking this mountain of paperwork... oh geez, another mistake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry. I'm nowhere near done checking this mountain of paperwork... oh geez, another mistake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「いつになったら引き継げるのかしらねー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Man, when am I gonna have someone to pass this all onto...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Man, when am I gonna have someone to pass this all onto...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ失礼します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well then, excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well then, excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うん、ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Yep, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Yep, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は寮長室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: 気が重たい。
MESSAGE.EN: I was feeling tense already.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was feeling tense already.

MESSAGE.JP: でも渡すだけならいいか。
MESSAGE.EN: But I figured it'd be fine if I just dropped off the report.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I figured it'd be fine if I just dropped off the report.

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんのことも気になるし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Still, I was interested in what was going on with Haruka-san, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Still, I was interested in what was going on with Haruka-san, too.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（素直に出頭なんてしてるわけないけどね…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I can't believe she's just harmlessly attending their meeting...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I can't believe she's just harmlessly attending their meeting...)

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、空き教室へ向かうことにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: For the moment, I just headed toward the unused classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: For the moment, I just headed toward the unused classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あ。人の気配がする）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Ah. It's occupied now.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Ah. It's occupied now.)

MESSAGE.JP: 普段は静かな空き教室が、がやがやと騒がしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The normally silent classroom was now loud with a crowd of voices.
MESSAGE.Translation: The normally silent classroom was now loud with a crowd of voices.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろの扉からこっそりうかがってみると会議中のようだ。
